māyā avidyā upādhi bheda vādinām matam āha apare tu iti

iśvaraḥ tu sva vaśa varti vividha pariṇāma śīla māyā śaktyā adhigata sārvajñya sarva aiśvaya ardi mahimā iti amīṣām āśayaḥ

original: parīkṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattibhede kasmiṃścidapi vā pakṣe yāvatsatpramāṇatarkamūlakatvādiviśeṣo nāvadhāryate,

original: tathā ca samabalatayā pratīyamānānāṃ nānāpakṣasādhanānāṃ satpratipakṣabhāvena sādhyanirṇayo durghaṭaḥ /

na ca artha sandehāt eva muktiḥ

original: tathā ca pakṣabhede jāgrati yatra vāstavo viśeṣa iti vicāraḥ prāptāvasaraḥ /

tat mukti sādhana upayogi artha tattva nirṇayāya ātma svarūpa ādi gocara anyatama pakṣasya sat pramāṇa tarka mūlaka tva ādi viśeṣa vyavasthāpana parasya
vicāra granthasya ārambhaḥ yuktaḥ evā iti samudita āśayaḥ
nanu ātma paramātmanoḥ nānā vipratipatti nirasana artham pūrva ācārya prabandhānām pravartanam eva karyam

idam arthāni eva ātma paramātma tad saṃbandha ādi artha tattva nirṇaya arthāni eva

ācārya ṭaṅka ādiṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu kecid siddhāntinaḥ
anye tu mata antara anuyāyinaḥ syuḥ

original: tatprabandheṣu ca sitāsitatvam - asphuṭapratipādakatvamanyathāpratipādakatvaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam /
analyzed: tad prabandheṣu ca sita asita tvam asphuṭa pratipādaka tvam anyathā pratipādaka tvam ca yathāsaṃbhavam yojyam

original: yadvā - ṭaṅkaśrīvatsāṅkāvapi atra nirdiṣṭau matāntarasthau vākyavivaraṇakartṛbhinnau syātām /
analyzed: yat vā ṭaṅka śrīvatsa aṅkau api atra nirdiṣṭau mata antara sthau vākya vivaraṇa kartṛ bhinnau syātām
vākya kartuḥ ṭaṅka saṃjñā ca vedārthasaṅgraṭīkātaḥ vagamyate
tad pratipattaye ca iti
kecid asphaṭa tayā artha tattvam avagacchanti

original: kecitpunaḥ kenāpi hetunā matāntaragrantheṣu śraddhālavo 'ta eva vañcitabudadhayo
analyzed: kecid punar kena api hetunā mata antara grantheṣu te eva vañcita buda dhayaḥ
nyathā eva pratipadyante iti sphuṭa pratipattaye anya prabandhānām sita asita tva pratipattaye
ca prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ yuktaḥ eva iti āśayaḥ
pūrva ācārya prabandhānām śāstra rūpāṇām prakaraṇam idam ātma siddhi ādi iti ca hārdam
prakaraṇam ca idam śārīraka mīmāṃsāyāḥ
nyāya tattva śastrasya ca
tat uktam śāstra eka deśa saṃbaddha śāstra kārya antare sthitam
matam prakaraṇam nāma iti
prathamam tāvat ātma tattvam upavarṇayati tatra iti
dehaḥ iti

original: nirūpaṇīyatayopakṣitpeṣu ghaṭakībhūta ātmā dehādito vilakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ nityaḥ sūkṣmatayā sarvavyāptikṣamaḥ pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ ānandasvabhāva  #
analyzed: nirūpaṇīya tayā upakṣitpeṣu ghaṭakībhūtaḥ ātmā deha āditaḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ nityaḥ sūkṣma tayā sarva vyāpti kṣamaḥ pratiśarīram bhinnaḥ ānanda svabhāva
iti arthaḥ
dhīḥ viṣaya prakāśakam jñānam ātmanaḥ dharma bhūtam
tad ādhāra tvāt tad vilakṣaṇa tvam

original: ananyena svena sādhanaṃ siddhiḥ prakāśo yasya so 'nanyasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: an anyena svena sādhanam siddhiḥ prakāśaḥ yasya saḥ
nitya tvam utpatti vināśa rahita tvam
vyāpi iti anena aṇu sūkṣma tvam phalitam
svatas sukhī svarūpataḥ eva anukūla prakāśa lakṣaṇa sukhavān
sukha svarūpaḥ iti yāvat
yat vā svābhāvikam ānandi tvam asya
duḥkhi tvam tu aupādhikam eva iti bhāvaḥ
tatra deha indriya manaḥ prāṇa dhībhyaḥ nyaḥ na anya sādhanaḥ

original: nityo vyāpī pratikṣetramātmā bhinnaḥ svataḥ sukhī // 3 //
analyzed: nityaḥ vyāpī pratikṣetram ātmā bhinnaḥ svatas sukhī
nanu deham eva ātmānam pratyakṣataḥ pratidyāmahe

original: ahaṃ jānāmīti jñātā hyātmā ahamiti cakāsti /
analyzed: aham jānāmi iti jñātā hi ātmā aham iti cakāsti
dehaḥ ca ahaṅkāra gocaraḥ
sthūlaḥ ham kṛśaḥ ham iti darśanāt
dehasya hi sthaulya ādi yogaḥ
atas tad samāna adhikaraṇa tayā ayam ahaṅkāraḥ śarīra ālambanaḥ iti avaśya āśrayaṇīyam
itarathā sakala laukika parīkṣaka vyavahāra uparodhaḥ ca
na ca ayam lākṣaṇikaḥ vyavahāraḥ
mukhya vṛtti bhūmeḥ pṛthak asiddha tvāt
na ca aneka avayava yogi śarīra ālambana tve jñātṛ avabhāsasya tadīya rūpa avayava ādi avabhāsena anvayinā bhavitavyam
yena tad anvaya abhāvāt jānāmi iti pratyayaḥ śarīra atiriktam avagamayet
bāhya indriya pratyakṣaḥ eva tathā niyama darśanāt
svānta sya antara guṇa ādhāra tā avabhāsaḥ eva sāmarthya niyamāt
anavadhṛta avayava viśeṣasya api aneka avayava yoginaḥ mahima guṇa śālinaḥ tryaṇukasya prathama pratyakṣa abhyupagamāt
vāyoḥ ca tvac indriyeṇa sparśa adhiṣṭhāna mātra tayā upalambha darśanāt ca
deha vyatirikta ātma gocara tve pi yathā tadīya guṇa antara agrahaṇam tathā iha api
yathā tatra bāhya pratyakṣa gocaraḥ eva saṅkyā parimāṇa ādi grahaṇa niyamaḥ
evam ca pratyekam paramāṇuṣu caitanya anupalabdheḥ
tad abhyupagame ca eka śarīraḥ eva aneka sahasra cetanā pātāt
akāraṇa guṇa pūrvakasya kārya dravya vartinaḥ viśeṣa guṇasya asambhavāt na śarīra viśeṣa guṇaḥ cetanyam
ayāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt ca ityādayaḥ numāna bedāḥ pratyakṣa bādhita viṣaya tayā na parākramitum kṣamante
viśeṣa guṇa tve ca
prīti sidhyamāne deha guṇa tva abhyu pagama prasaṅgaḥ ca

original: api cecchānuvidhāyikriyatvendriyavattvādayaḥ śarīre dṛśyamānāḥ saṃpratipannācaitanyāddhaṭāderatyantavyāvartamānāḥ śarīrameva cetanamavagamayanti
analyzed: api ca icchā anuvidhāyi kriyatva indriyavat tva ādayaḥ śarīre dṛśyamānāḥ saṃpratipanna ācaitanyāt dhaṭa ādeḥ atyanta vyāvartamānāḥ śarīram eva cetanam avagamayanti
kramuka phala tāmbhūla dala avayava ādiṣu pratyekam avidyamānasya api rāgasya iva avayavini saṃyoga viśeṣāt
deha ārambhaka paramāṇu saṃśleṣa viśeṣāt eva dehe caitanyasya api āvirbhāvaḥ na anupapannaḥ

original: carvaṇajanitahutavahasaṃyogasaṃpāditapāṭalimabhiḥ paramāṇubhirdvyaṇukādikrameṇa kāraṇaguṇapūrva eva tatra rāgodaya iti cet; na;
analyzed: carvaṇa janita hutavaha saṃyoga saṃpādita pāṭalimabhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaḥ eva tatra rāga udayaḥ iti ced na
pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: api ca sitāsitāditantuṣu pratyekamavidyamānamapi citrarūpaṃ viśeṣaguṇaṃ tadārabdhe paṭe sphaṭamupalabhamānāḥ kathaṃ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvamuktaguṇasyādhyavasyema
analyzed: api ca sita asita ādi tantuṣu pratyekam avidyamānam api citra rūpam viśeṣa guṇam tad ārabdhe paṭe sphaṭam upalabhamānāḥ katham kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvam ukta guṇasya adhyavasyema

original: na cāvayarūpātirekeṇāvavini citraṃ nāma rūpāntaraṃ nāstyeva /
analyzed: na ca avaya rūpa atirekeṇa avavini citram nāma rūpa antaram na asti eva
avayavinaḥ cākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgāt
avayava rūpaiḥ eva tad upapādane sarvam eva kārya dravyam nīrūpam āpadyet
anubhava viredhaḥ
sarva vyavahā
ravi rodhaḥ ca

original: viśaṣaguṇaśca kāṭhinya karakadravyavarti akāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ dṛśyata ityanekāntaśca /
analyzed: viśaṣa guṇaḥ ca kāṭhinya karaka dravya varti akāraṇa guṇa pūrvakam dṛśyate iti anekāntaḥ ca
na ca saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ kāṭhinyam
tasya dviṣṭha tvāt
asya tu karaka dravya eka varti tvāt
sparśa viśeṣa tayā padārtha vidbhiḥ abhyupagamāt ca
dṛśyasya dehasya katham draṣṭṛ tvam iti ced
kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: ayameva yadekasyāṃ kriyāṃyāmekasya karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca na ghaṭata iti /
analyzed: ayam eva yat ekasyām kriyāṃyām ekasya karma tvam kartṛ tvam ca na ghaṭate iti

original: yadyevam, vyatirekavāde vā kathamātmani ahamiti pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam vyatireka vāde vā katham ātmani aham iti pratyayaḥ
rūpa bhedāt iti ced
samānam idam deha ātma vāde pi
api ca para samavāyi kriyā phala gāmi karma

original: svasamanetajñānaphalabhāginaḥ śarīrasya karmatvameva nāstīti na paryanuyogāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: śarīrasya karma tvam eva na asti iti na paryanuyoga avakāśaḥ
atas dehaḥ eva ātmā iti bārhaspatyāḥ
tathā ca pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ iti tattvāni
tebhyaḥ caitanyam
kiṇva ādibhyaḥ mada śakti vat iti sūtram
prathamam tāvat ātma tattvam upavarṇayati tatra iti
dehaḥ iti

original: nirūpaṇīyatayopakṣipteṣu ghaṭakībhūta ātmā dehādito vilakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ nityaḥ sūkṣmatayā sarvavyāptikṣamaḥ pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ ānandasvabhāva  #
analyzed: nirūpaṇīya tayā upakṣipteṣu ghaṭakībhūtaḥ ātmā deha āditaḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ nityaḥ sūkṣma tayā sarva vyāpti kṣamaḥ pratiśarīram bhinnaḥ ānanda svabhāva
iti arthaḥ
dhīḥ viṣaya prakāśakam jñānam ātmanaḥ dharma bhūtam
tad ādhāra tvāt tad vilakṣaṇa tvam

original: ananyena svena sādhanaṃ siddhiḥ prakāśo yasya so 'nanyasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: an anyena svena sādhanam siddhiḥ prakāśaḥ yasya saḥ
nitya tvam utpatti vināśa rahita tvam
vyāpi iti anena iṇa sūkṣma tvam phalitam
svatas sukhī svarūpataḥ eva anukūla prakāśa lakṣaṇa sukhavān
sukha svarūpaḥ iti yāvat
yat vā svābhāvikam ānandi tvam asya
duḥkhi tvam tu aupādhikam eva iti bhāvaḥ
uktam ātma tattvam asahamānaḥ śarīra ātma vātī cārvākaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate nanu deham eva iti
pratyakṣam hi mukhyam pramāṇam

original: na ca tadatilaṅghanena kaścanārthaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca tad atilaṅghanena kaścana arthaḥ sādhayitum śakyate

original: pratyakṣaṃ ca sathaulyādiyoginaṃ dehameva jñātāramahamarthamātmānaṃ pratipādayatīti deha evātmeti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣam ca sa thaulya ādi yoginam deham eva jñātāram ahamartham ātmānam pratipādayati iti dehaḥ eva ātmā iti bhāvaḥ
dehasya eva aham buddhi viṣaya tvam upapādayati dehaḥ ca ityādi vākya dvayena
atas iti
tad samāna adhikaraṇa tayā adeha abhinna artha viṣayaka tayā
ittham bhāve tṛtīyā
ayam ahaṅkāraḥ sthūlaḥ ham iti ahapratyayaḥ pratyakṣa rūpaḥ
śiṣṭam spaṣṭam
pratyakṣa atikrame doṣam āha itarathā iti

original: pratyakṣamūlā hi vyavahārāḥ samupalabhyante paṇḍitapāmarasādhāraṇā arthakriyākārimo mukhyā eva /
analyzed: pratyakṣa mūlāḥ hi vyavahārāḥ samupalabhyante paṇḍita pāmara sādhāraṇāḥ mukhyāḥ eva
tad virodhaḥ pratyakṣa atikrame prasajyate iti arthaḥ
nanu sthūlaḥ ham jānāmi iti pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva pāmarāṇām
paṇḍitānām tvaritikta ātma gocarā eva aham jānāmi iti

original: ahaṃ sthūla iti tu vyavahāraḥ paṇḍitānāṃ lākṣaṇika ityāśaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati 'na cāya'miti /
analyzed: aham sthūlaḥ iti tu vyavahāraḥ paṇḍitānām lākṣaṇikaḥ iti āśaṅkām anūdya pratikṣipati na ca ayam iti
ayam vyavahāraḥ ca na iti anvayaḥ
vācyam iti śeṣaḥ
pratikṣepa yuktim āha mukhya iti
ahaṃpada śakti viṣayasya deha vyatiriktasya anupalambha nirasta tvāt dehe eva mukhya tvam ahampratyaya vyavahahārayoḥ iti bhāvaḥ
jānāmi aham iti jñātṛ tva pratīteḥ deha gocara tve nupapattim āśaṅkate na ca ityādinā
anvayinā niyatena
sāvayava artha pratyakṣa tva vyāpakam tad avayava ādi prakāśaka tvam iti niyamaḥ na iti bhāvaḥ
sati niyame yat prasaktam tadā yena iti
iti sidhyet iti śeṣaḥ
tad anvaya abhāvāt śarīra avayava ādi prakāśa anvaya abhāvāt tad aprakāśaka tvāt śarīra atiriktam eva avagamayet aham jānāmi iti
na tu śarīram sa avayavam iti niyama phalam
jñātṛ tva pratyakṣam śarīra a viṣayakam
tad avayava aviṣayaka tvāt
yat yat akya vi viṣayam tat tat vayava gocaram
yathā ghaṭa ādi pratyakṣam iti atra prayoge nirukta niyamasya upayogaḥ
nirukta niyamasya asaṃbhave hetum āha
bāhyā iti sahacāra dṛṣṭeḥ hi niyama vijñānam

original: sahacāraśca bāhyapratyakṣa eva dṛṣṭa iti tadviṣaya eva niruktaniyama iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sahacāraḥ ca bāhya pratyakṣe eva dṛṣṭaḥ iti tad viṣayaḥ eva nirukta niyamaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu bhavatu sahacāra darśanam bāhye eva
niyamaḥ tu asaṅkocāt pratyakṣa mātra agocaraḥ u stu iti atra āha svāntasya iti
āntaraḥ guṇaḥ jñāna sukha ādiḥ yogyaḥ
tad ādhāra tva mātreṇa dharmi avabhāsaka tvam manasaḥ
na tu dharma antarasya
bahis a svātatryāt manasaḥ

original: tathāca rūpasāvayavatvadigrahāsaṃbhavāt manasā jñātṛtvamātreṇa śarīragraha iti pratyakṣasāmānye niyamo nopasaṃhartuṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca rūpa sāvayavatva digraha asaṃbhavāt manasā jñātṛ tva mātreṇa śarīra grahaḥ iti pratyakṣa sāmānye niyamaḥ na upasaṃhartum śakyate iti bhāvaḥ
bāhya tve pi śarīrasya jñāna ādi uparāga oṇa antara tvam iti abhimānaḥ
avayavi gocara bāhya pratyakṣa tva vyāpakam tad avayava gocara tvam iti niyame pi vyabhicāram āha anavadhṛta iti
tryaṇuka cākṣuṣe tīndriya tvena tad avayavasya agraha avdyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
aneka avayava yoginaḥ aneka avayava samavetasya
sva samaveta samavāyena aneka avayava viśiṣṭasya
mahima guṇa śālinaḥ mahā parimāṇavataḥ
trasareṇu pratyakṣa anantaram cākṣuṣa dravya tva ādinā tasya sāvayava tva anumānāt upanīta dvyaṇuka bhānam

original: dvitīyāditryaṇukapratyakṣe saṃbhavatīti vyabhicārasthalaṃ tryaṇukapratyakṣaṃ prathamatvena viśeṣitam /
analyzed: dvitīya ādi tryaṇuka pratyakṣe saṃbhavati iti vyabhicāra sthalam tryaṇuka pratyakṣam prathama tvena viśeṣitam

original: nanu yogyāvayavakāvayavibāhyapratyakṣasya tadavayavagocaratvamiti niyamo 'stviti cettatrāpi taṃ doṣamāha 'vāyośce'ti /
analyzed: nanu yogya avayavaka avayavi bāhya pratyakṣasya tad avayava gocara tvam iti niyamaḥ u stu iti ced tatra api tam doṣam āha vāyoḥ ca iti

original: sparśavattvamātreṇa vāyuspārśane tadavayavaviṣayakatvābhāvāttatra vyabhicāro niruktaniyamasyeti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sparśavat tva mātreṇa vāyu spārśane tad avayava viṣayaka tva abhāvāt tatra vyabhicāraḥ nirukta niyamasya iti bhāvaḥ
sati eva avadhāne vāyu avayava ādi grahaḥ

original: anyadā tu tvaksannikṛṣṭasya vāyoḥ sparśavattvenaivopalambha ityabhimānaḥ /
analyzed: anyadā tu tvac sannikṛṣṭasya vāyoḥ sparśavat tvena eva upalambhaḥ iti abhimānaḥ
aham jānāmi iti pratīte rūpa ādi aviṣaya tvena śarīra aviṣaya tva sādhane prayojaka tvam āha deha vyatirikta iti
jñātṛ tva pratīteḥ ityādiḥ
tathā iha api iti anantaram upapadyate iti śeṣaḥ
ayam bhāvaḥ dravya grāhi indriyasya yogya sannikṛṣṭa tad guṇa grāhaka tvam iti niyamaḥ
tathā ca atirikta ātmaṃvāde yathā saṅkyā

original: dīnāṃ tadguṇānāmayogyatvānna manasā grahaḥ evaṃ dehātmavāde 'pi tadīyarūpāderayogyatvādeva na manasā graha iti /
analyzed: tad guṇānām ayogya tvāt na manasā grahaḥ evam deha ātma vāde pi tadīya rūpa ādeḥ ayogya tvāt eva na manasā grahaḥ iti

original: na ca rūpavaddravyapratyakṣe rūpagrahaṇaṃ niyatamiti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca rūpavat dravya pratyakṣe rūpa grahaṇam niyatam iti vācyam
ghaṭa ādi sparśane na aikāntyān
yathā tatra iti

original: yathā tatra - atiriktātmavāde bāhyapratyakṣa eva dravyagrāhiṇastadgatasaṅkyādigrāhitvamiti niyamyate,
analyzed: yathā tatra atirikta ātma vāde bāhya pratyakṣe eva dravya grāhiṇaḥ tad gata saṅkya ādi grāhi tvam iti niyamyate
tathā deha ātma vāde pi niyamyatām iti bhāvaḥ
tathā iha api iti punar anusandheyam
evam aham jānāmi iti pratyakṣasya deha viṣayaka tvam samarthitam
anena deha caitanya bādhaka anumānānām bādhita tvam āha evam ca iti
caitanyam na śarīra viśeṣa guṇaḥ ākāraṇa guṇa pūrvakata tvāt
ayāvaddravyabhāvi tvāt vā saṃyoga vat iti deha caitanye bādhakam anumānam
tatra prathama hetoḥ asiddhim pariharati pratyekam ityādinā
nanu paramāṇuṣu deha āraṃbhakeṣu caitanyam mā astu
yena aneka cetana prasaṅgaḥ ekasmin dehe
akāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ ca rūpa ādiḥ pāka jaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tadvat bhavatu caitanyam iti atra āha kārya dravya iti
pīlupākaḥ tra abhimataḥ
tathā ca kārya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tva vyāpakam sva samavāyi samavāyi vṛtti sajātīya guṇa asamavāyi kāraṇaka tva rūpam kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakatvam

original: vyāpakanivṛttyā ca caitanye śarīraviśeṣaguṇatvasya nivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpaka nivṛttyā ca caitanye śarīra viśeṣa guṇa tvasya nivṛttiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: dvitīyānumāne ca yo yaḥ kāryadravyaviśeṣaguṇaḥ sa sa yāvaddravyabhāvīti sāmānyato vyatirekavyāptiḥ pīlupākanayena vācyā /
analyzed: dvitīya anumāne ca yaḥ yaḥ kārya dravya viśeṣa guṇaḥ sa sa yāvaddravyabhāvi iti sāmānyataḥ vyatireka vyāptiḥ pīlu pāka nayena vācyā

original: 'ityādaya' ityādipadena caitanyaṃ na dehasya viśeṣaguṇaḥ tanniṣṭhaviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyādityanumānaṃ grāhyam /
analyzed: ityādayaḥ iti ādi padena caitanyam na dehasya viśeṣa guṇaḥ tad niṣṭha viśeṣa guṇa antara vaidharmyāt iti anumānam grāhyam

original: na parākramituṃ kṣamantedehacaitanyaṃ bādhituṃ na pragalbhante /
analyzed: na parākramitum kṣamante deha caitanyam bādhitum na pragalbhante
kutas pratyakṣa bādhita viṣaya tayā
pratyakṣa bādhena nirukta anumānānām eva nā udayaḥ
saṃbhavati

original: prabala upajīvyatvena pratyakṣapramāṇabādhanaṃ ca durbalairetairanumānanairduṣkaramiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: prabalaḥ upajīvya tvena pratyakṣa pramāṇa bādhanam ca durbalaiḥ etaiḥ anumānanaiḥ duṣkaram iti bhāvaḥ

original: ayāvaddravyabhāvināmakāraṇaguṇapūrvakāṇāmapi saṃyogādīnāṃ śarīraguṇatvadṛṣṭerniruktahetubhirapi caitanye śarīraguṇatvasyābhāvo na sādhayituṃ  #
analyzed: ayāvaddravyabhāvinām akāraṇa guṇa pūrvakāṇām api saṃyoga ādīnām śarīra guṇa tva dṛṣṭeḥ nirukta hetubhiḥ api caitanye śarīra guṇa tvasya abhāvaḥ na sādhayitum
śakyate iti āśayena āha viśeṣa iti
śarīre eva upambhāt caitanyam tad guṇaḥ eva
nirukta hetubhiḥ tad viśeṣa guṇa tva niṣedhane na kṣatiḥ
paribhāṣikam hi viśeṣa guṇa tvam

original: bhāvanānyo yo vāyuvṛttivṛttidharmasamavāyī tadanyatve sati gurutvājaladravatvānyaguṇatvaṃ viśeṣaguṇatvamityatra garutvādereva jñānāderapyanyatvaṃ  #
analyzed: bhāvanā anyaḥ yaḥ vāyu vṛtti vṛtti dharma samavāyī tad anyatve sati guru tva ājala drava tva anya guṇa tvam viśeṣa guṇa tvam iti atra garu tva ādeḥ eva jñāna ādeḥ api anyatvam
prakṣipyatām iti bhāvaḥ
akāraṇa guṇa pūrvakatva ādi hetūnām aprayojaka tvāt śarīra viśeṣa guṇa tve pi jñānārdane kṣatiḥ iti abhiprayan āha api ca icchā iti
śarīra viśeṣa guṇa antara vaidharmyāt jñānasya aśarīra viśeṣa gu tvam ced iṣyate

original: tarhi saṃpratipannācetanaghaṭādividharmatvāddehasya caitanyavattvameva kuto neṣyate lāghavāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tarhi saṃpratipanna acetana ghaṭa ādi vidharma tvāt dehasya caitanyavat tvam eva kutas na iṣyate lāghavāt iti bhāvaḥ
indriya vāt tva ādayaḥ iti ādi padena prāṇavat tvam grāhyam
ghaṭa ādeḥ tu deha vyāpāra dvārakam eva tat iti bhāvaḥ

original: śarīraṃ cetanāvat icchānuvidhāyikriyatvādindriyādimattvādvā yannaiva tannaivaṃ yathā
analyzed: śarīram cetanāvat icchā anuvidhāyi kriyatvāt indriya ādimattvāt vā yat na eva tat na evam yathā

original: ghaṭādīti vyatirekānumānaṃ ca dehasya caitanye 'tra vākye garbhitam /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi iti vyatireka anumānam ca dehasya caitanye vākye garbhitam
kārya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tvasya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakatva vyāptau anaikāntyam api āha kramuka iti
kramuka phala saṃmiśri cūrṇaka upalipta tāmbūla patrasya danta saṅghaṭṭanaiḥ pūrva avayava vināśe

original: tadavayavānāṃ saṃśleṣaviśeṣato niṣpanne piṇḍitāvayavini raktaṃ rūpamavayaveṣvavidyamānaṃ
analyzed: tad avayavānām saṃśleṣa viśeṣataḥ niṣpanne piṇḍita avayavini raktam rūpam avayaveṣu avidyamānam

original: saṃśleṣaviśeṣata eva teṣāmutpannamiti tatra vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśleṣa viśeṣataḥ eva teṣām utpannam iti tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
ākṣipati carvaṇā iti

original: dantasaṃmardaiḥ pūrvāvayavino vdyuṇukaparyantasya nāśe paramāṇuṣu svatantreṣu carvaṇodbhūtamukhyāgnisaṃyogalakṣaṇapākavaśādraktarūpasyotpatteḥ
analyzed: danta saṃmardaiḥ pūrva avayavinaḥ vdi uṇuka paryantasya nāśe paramāṇuṣu svatantreṣu carvaṇa udbhūta mukhya agni saṃyoga lakṣaṇa pāka vaśāt rakta rūpasya utpatteḥ

original: kāraṇaguṇapūrvakameva piṇḍitāvayavini raktaṃ rūpamiti na vyabhicāra iti bhāva ākṣeptuḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakam eva piṇḍita avayavini raktam rūpam iti na vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ ākṣeptuḥ
pariharati na pramāṇa abhāvat iti
saṃśleṣa viśeṣasya eva kvacid rūpa antara prayojanaka tvam eṣṭavyam

original: yathā haridrācūrṇe cūrṇakajalasaṃyogenaiva hi raktaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: yathā haridrā cūrṇe cūrṇaka jala saṃyogena eva hi raktam rūpam dṛṣṭam
tathā atrā api saṃbhavāt pāka kalpanāyām māna abhāva

original: iti bhāvaḥ / carvaṇasthale pīlupākenaiva rūpāntaramityāgrahe 'pi sthalāntare vyabhicāramāha 'sitāsite'ti /
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ carvaṇa sthale pīlu pākena eva rūpa antaram iti āgrahe sthala antare vyabhicāram āha sita asita iti
na hi citra paṭa sthale vayaveṣu pāka saṃbhavaḥ
na ca avayaveṣu citram rūpam

original: tathā cacāvayaviviśeṣaguṇasya svasajātīyāvayavaguṇapūrvakatvamiti niyamasya citrarūpe 'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā sva sajātīya avayava guṇa pūrvakatvam iti niyamasya citra rūpe na aikāntyam iti bhāvaḥ
sājātyam rūpa tva ādi avāntara jātyāḥ vivakṣitam
na hi nīla tantubhiḥ śukla paṭa āraṃbhaḥ

original: rūpatvādinā sājātyavivakṣāyāṃ tu tasyāpi prasaṅga iti /
analyzed: rūpa tva ādinā sājātya vivakṣāyām tu tasya api prasaṅgaḥ iti
nanu citram nāma rūpa antaram na iṣyate
na ca evam nānā rūpa tantubhiḥ ārabdhaḥ cintra paṭaḥ nīrūpaḥ syāt
rūpa ādeḥ vyāpya vṛtti tva niyamāt avyāpya vṛtti nānā rūpavat tvasya satmin upagama asaṃbhavāt iti vācyam
avayava rūpeṇa eva cākṣuṣa tva upapattau citra paṭasya nīrūpa tve pi kṣati virahāt
samavāya sva samavāyi samaveta tva anyatara saṃbandhena udbhūta rūpasya dravya cākṣuṣe hetu tva upagamāt iti ced atra āha sarvam eva iti
evam avayava rūpeṇa eva ca akṣaṣa upapatteḥ sarvasya api avayavinaḥ rūpavat tavam neṣyatām iti arthaḥ
iṣyate evam eva lāghavāt iti atra āha anubhava iti
sākṣāt rūpavattva upalambha vyavahārayoḥ abādhitayoḥ sattvāt iṣṭa āpattiḥ nīrūpatve vayavinaḥ kartum na śakyate iti arthaḥ

original: citraḥ paṭa iti cābādhitapratītivyavahārataśritraṃ rūpamapyeṣṭavyayamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: citraḥ paṭaḥ iti ca ābādhita pratīti vyavahārata śritram rūpam api eṣṭa vyayam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu ayava nānā rūpaiḥ avyāpya vṛttyā iva nānā rūpam citra paṭaḥ upeyate pratīti balāt

original: tathā ca na tatra vyabhicāra ityatrāha - 'viśeṣaguṇaśce'ti /
analyzed: tathā ca na tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti atra āha viśeṣa guṇaḥ ca iti

original: jalīyasya karakasyāvayavasaṃśleṣaviśeṣādārambhakasahakārivaicitryācca dravatvarahitasya kaṭhinasparśa upalabhyamāno na kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaḥ /
analyzed: jalīyasya karakasya avayava saṃśleṣa viśeṣāt ārambhaka sahakāri vaicitryāt ca drava tva rahitasya kaṭhina sparśaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ na kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ
jala paramāṇu ṣu kaṭhina sparśasya abhāvāt

original: tathā ca karakasparśe kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca karaka sparśe kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakatva niyamasya vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu avayava saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ eva astu kāṭhinyam
tathā ca kka anaikāntyam iti atra āha na ca saṃyoga iti

original: avayavasaṃyogaviśeṣasya kāṭhinyarūpatve tasyāvayavinyavṛtteḥ kaṭhinaḥ karaka iti pratītivyavahārau na syātām /
analyzed: avayava saṃyoga viśeṣasya kāṭhinya rūpa tve tasya avayavinī avṛtteḥ kaṭhinaḥ karakaḥ iti pratīti vyavahārau na syātām

original: kathañcittadupapādane 'pi cākṣuṣadravyavṛttisaṃyogasya cākṣuṣatvātkāṭhinyasya cakṣuṣāpyupalaṃbhaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kathañcid tad upapādane cākṣuṣa dravya vṛtti saṃyogasya cākṣuṣa tvāt kāṭhinyasya cakṣuṣā api upalaṃbha prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
sparśa viśeṣa tayā iti
tvac bhātra grāhya guṇa tvāt kāṭhinyam sparśa viśeṣa
eva iti sāmpratam

original: padārthavidbhiḥ kāṇādaiḥ sparśaviśeṣatayaiva ca tadabhyupagatamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: padārtha vidbhiḥ kāṇādaiḥ sparśa viśeṣa tayā eva ca tat abhyupagatam iti bhāvaḥ
deha ātma vāde kartṛ karma bhāva virodham āśaṅkya pariharati dṛśyasya ityādinā
kaḥ viredhaḥ iti
viruddha arthe hi
draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tve virodhāt kā nāma kathantā iti bhāvaḥ
virodham āha ayam eva iti

original: tatkriyāyāṃ tadaiva kasyacitkartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca na yuktam /
analyzed: tad kriyāyām tadā eva kasyacid kartṛ tvam karma tvam ca na yuktam
kriyayā āptum iṣṭatamam hi karma sādhya rūpam
kriyā āśrayaḥ karttā ca siddha rūpaḥ
siddha sādhyayoḥ na aikyam saṃbhavati iti virodhaḥ kartṛ karma tvayoḥ iti bhāvaḥ
ākṣeptuḥ mukhena eva samādhim vācayitum pratibandīm āha yadi evam iti
samādhim āha ākṣeptā rūpa bhedāt iti
samādhi taulyam uttaram āha deha ātma vādī samānam iti
yathā ātariktātma vāde hantu ādinā karma tvam
manaḥ saṃyoga ttva ādinā ca kartṛ tvam jñāna kriyāyām iti ākāra bhedāt avirodhaḥ ucyate
tad nyāyasya na deha ātma vāde daṇḍa nivāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ
vastutas yādṛśasya karma tvasya kartṛ tvena virodhaḥ
na tādṛśam jñāna karma tvam

original: ato 'pi na doṣa ityāha - 'api ca pare'ti /
analyzed: na doṣaḥ iti āha api ca parā iti
sva samaveta jñāna phala bhāgini iti
sva niṣṭha jñāna nirūpita viṣayatāvataḥ iti arthaḥ
viṣaya tāyāḥ viṣayi nirūpya tvāt jñāna phala tva upacāraḥ
karma tvam eva na asti iti
mukhyam karma tvam na asti iti arthaḥ
ayam bhāvaḥ para samaveta kriyā janma phala āśraya tvam mukhyam karma tvam
yathā grāmasya gamana karma tvam
viṣaya viṣayi bhāva lakṣaṇam amukhyam eva tu jñāna ādi karmatvam

original: saviṣayārthadhātuyoge karmatvaṃ viṣayatārūpamiti hi tārkikāṇāṃ samayaḥ /
analyzed: sa viṣaya artha dhātu yoge karma tvam viṣaya tā rūpam iti hi tārkikāṇām samayaḥ
asya jñāna kartari api upagamāt na ātmānam jānāti ityādeḥ anupapattiḥ
mukhyasya eva
tu kartṛ tvena virodhaḥ iti
na ca amukhyam idam karma tvam na anuśāsana siddham iti vācyam
kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti asya eva tantreṇa asmin api pramāṇa tva upagamāt
kartuḥ jñātuḥ
kriyayā ajñānena

original: āptumiṣṭatamaṃ - jñātavyatvenābhimataṃ karmeti cātra pakṣe 'kṣarārtho vācyaḥ /
analyzed: āptum iṣṭatamam jñātavya tvena abhimatam karma iti ca atra pakṣe kṣara arthaḥ vācyaḥ

original: aniṣṭasya jñātasya tu 'tathā yuktaṃ cānīpsita'mityanenaiva kriyāyuktaṃ - jñānena viṣayatayā saṃbaddhaṃ anīpsitaṃ jñeya
analyzed: aniṣṭasya jñātasya tu tathā yuktam ca anīpsitam iti anena eva kriyā yuktam jñānena viṣaya tayā saṃbaddham anīpsitam jñeya
tvena icchā viṣaya bhūtam api karma iti ca arthaḥ mukhya karma tva pakṣe

original: vyavahārasya jñānaphasatve 'pi tadāśrayatvābhāvānna viṣayasya mukhyaṃ karmatvam /
analyzed: vyavahārasya jñāna phasa tve pi tad āśraya tva abhāvāt na viṣayasya mukhyam karma tvam

original: ātmanaḥ svavyavahārāśrayatve 'pi taddhetusvagocarasvaniṣṭhajñānasya na parasamavetatvamiti na tat /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sva vyavahāra āśraya tve pi tad hetu sva gocara sva niṣṭha jñānasya na para samaveta tvam iti na tat
vyavahāra ānuguṇya lakṣaṇa jñāna phala vivakṣāyām tu viṣayasya ghaṭa ādeḥ jñāna karma tvam mukhyam syāt nāma
adhika marge vakṣyāmaḥ
samarthitam deha ātma tvam nigamayati atas iti
bārhaspatyāḥ bṛhaspati praṇīta lokāyata tantra niṣṭhāḥ cārvākāḥ

original: aiśvaryamahimakṣayāyāsurāṇāṃ vaidikaścaddhāvilopakaṃ mohakaṃ tantraṃ nirmitaṃ suraguruṇāsurendrānunayavivaśeneti ca prasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: aiśvarya mahima kṣayāya asurāṇām mohakam tantram nirmitam suraguruṇā asura indra anunaya vivaśena iti ca prasiddhiḥ
dehasya eva caitanye tat sūtram pramāṇayati tathā ca iti
pṛthivī ādi iti catvāri eva bhūtāni tattvāni

original: taiḥ saṃhatya niṣpādite dehe pratyekamasadapi caitanyamudbhavati /
analyzed: taiḥ saṃhatya niṣpādite dehe pratyekam asat api caitanyam udbhavati

original: kiṇvādibhyo niṣpādite surādravya ivāpūrvā madaśaktiriti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: kiṇva ādibhyaḥ niṣpādite surā dravye iva apūrvā mada śaktiḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ
atra pratividhiḥ dehaḥ na ātmā pratyakṣa bādhataḥ
na khalu aham idaṅkārau ekasya ekatra vastuni  /
aham jānāmi iti aham iti matiḥ idaṅkāra gocarāt śarīrāt nīṣkṛṣṭam eva sva viṣayam upasthāpayati
ghaṭa ādeḥ iva

original: parāgvṛttiridamiti śarīraviṣayiṇī ca śemuṣī svaviṣayamahaṅkāragocarādvivecayati yathāyaṃ ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: parāc vṛttiḥ idam iti śarīra viṣayiṇī ca śemuṣī sva viṣayam ahaṅkāra gocarāt vivecayati yathā ayam ghaṭaḥ iti
itarathā sva para vibhāga anupapatteḥ
na ca ekasmin eva rūpa bhedāt evam pratītiḥ

original: na hi devadatto daṇḍinamātmānaṃ daṇḍyayamiti pratyeti /
analyzed: na hi devadattaḥ daṇḍinam ātmānam daṇḍī ayam iti pratyeti

original: anyacca, niyamitabahirindriyavṛtteravahitamanaso 'hamiti svātmānamavayataḥ karacaraṇodarādyavayavā na bhāsante /
analyzed: anyat ca niyamita bahis indriya vṛtteḥ avahita manasaḥ ham iti sva ātmānam avayataḥ kara caraṇa udara ādi avayavāḥ na bhāsante
svathīyasi ca avayavini śarīre ham iti mati gocare bhyupagabhyamāne vaśyam avayava pratibhāsena api anvayinā bhāṣyam

original: na hyāsti saṃbhavaḥ - avayavī sthavīyān pracakāsti ;
analyzed: na hi āsti saṃbhavaḥ avayavī sthavīyān pracakāsti
avayavāḥ tu na kecana prathante iti
yat tu tryaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ iti tat na
vātāyana vivara dṛśyani
pratyakṣa yogya avayavasya tathā pratibhāsa niyamāt vā na vyabhicāraḥ

original: na cāvayavini bahirandriyagrāhya evāyaṃ niyama ityutprekṣyam /
analyzed: na ca avayavini bahis andriya grāhyaḥ eva ayam niyamaḥ iti utprekṣyam
pramāṇa abhāvāt
antaḥkaraṇasya ca kevalasya avayavini vṛtti asambhavāt ca
vāyoḥ tu rūpa ādi abhāvāt kevala sparśa ādhāra tayā upalambhaḥ

original: tatrāpi tādṛśānekāvayavapratibhāso 'styeva spṛśyamāna iva ghaṭādāviti na tena vyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra api tādṛśa aneka avayava pratibhāsaḥ u sti eva spṛśyamānaḥ iva ghaṭa ādau iti na tena vyabhicāraḥ

original: yattu sthūlo 'haṃ kṛśo 'hamiti śarīre 'haṃpratyayo dṛśyata iti ;
analyzed: yat tu sthūlaḥ ham kṛśaḥ ham iti śarīre haṃpratyayaḥ dṛśyate iti
tat api paryālocanīyam
tatra api antar śarīram aham ākāram eva kim api vastu ahaṅkāraḥ gocayati
na punar cākṣuṣaḥ iva deha pratyayaḥ sthaulya bālya ādi yogi deha mātram

original: ata eva mamedaṃ gṛhamitivāt mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedapratibhāso vyavahāraśca /
analyzed: atas eva mama idam gṛham iti vāt mama idam śarīram iti bheda pratibhāsaḥ vyavahāraḥ ca

original: na hyasau sākṣātpratītabhedanimittaḥ pratāyamānaḥ śilāputrakaśīravyapadeśavadaupacāriko yukta āśriyituṃ mamātmetivat /
analyzed: na hi asau sākṣāt pratīta bheda nimittaḥ pratāyamānaḥ śilāputraka śīra vyapadeśa vat aupacārikaḥ yuktaḥ āśriyitum mama ātmā itivat
tatra ātma śabdasya ātmani vṛttaiḥ aikārthyāt avivādāt ca yuktam tathā āśrayaṇam
na ca evam atra

original: ato dehavyatirekiṇaḥ cetanasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāccatsaṃbandhini lākṣaṇiko dehe 'haṃśabdaprayogaḥ /

original: atha tadguṇāntaravaidharmyā dityetadvivṛṇoti api ce ti /
analyzed: atha tad guṇa antara vaidharmyāt iti etat vivṛṇoti api ca iti

na khalu te diti

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- agnisaṃyogena rūpaparāvṛttāvapi tadaprasaṅge rūpasya yāvaddravyabhāvitvaṃ dṛṣṭam /

na ca uttara uttara viśeṣa guṇaḥ eva pūrva pūrva jñāna ādi virodhi iti vācyam
evam api antyasya ciram avasthāna prasaṅgāt iti
ayāvaddravyabhāvittvam jñāna ādeḥ śarīra viśeṣa guṇa antarataḥ vaidharmyam iti uktam bhavati
atha vaidharmya antaram dvidhā āha ātmanaḥ iti

original: svātmamātragrāhyatvaṃ manomātragrāhyatvaṃ ca jñānādeḥ śarīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyamiti phalitam /

rūpa ādayaḥ hi śarīra guṇāḥ sva para grāhyāḥ bahis indriya grāhyāḥ ca
na ca tathā jñāna ādiḥ ti

original: atra prayogaḥ-jñānaṃ na śarīraviśeṣaguṇaḥ ayāvaddravyabhāvitvānmanomātragrāhyatvādvā yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā rūpādīti /
analyzed: atra prayogaḥ jñānam na śarīra viśeṣa guṇaḥ ayāvaddravyabhāvi tvāt manaḥ mātra grāhya tvāt vā yat na evam tat na evam yathā rūpa ādi iti

original: evaṃ jñānasya śarīradharmatvābhāvasādhanena śarīrasyātmatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam jñānasya śarīra dharma tva abhāva sādhanena śarīrasya ātma tvam pratikṣiptam bhavati
yathā dehaḥ na ātmā ājñātṛ tvāt dhaṭa ādi vat iti
kiñca autpattimat tvāt sanniveśa viśeṣataḥ
rūpa ādimat tvāt bhūta tvāt dehaḥ na ātmā ghaṭa ādi vat
sa chidra tvāt adehi tvāt deha tvāt mṛta deha vat
ityādi sādhanaiḥ nyāyyaiḥ niṣedhyā varṣmaṇaḥ citiḥ
evam pratyakṣa virodhāt
anvaya mukhena sādhyam upasthāpadbhiḥ udīrita sādhanaiḥ apahṛta viṣaya tayā indriya āśraya tva ādi vyatireki hetavaḥ na sādhyam upasthāpayitum īśate
iti deha ātma vāda nirāsa prakaraṇam

original: tavdyāpāraphalaṃ ca jñānaṃ tadgāmi yuktaṃ snānādhyayanādiphalavat /

original: anyathā ca praṣṭurmṛtyupapattiṃ śaraṇāgataparityāgasya nṛśaṃsatāṃ cā'locya satyatapasastathā vacanam /

iti indriya ātma vāda nirāsa prakaraṇam

original: tathā sati hi pūrvoktā doṣāḥ parihṛtā bhavanti /

original: ya eva hi cakṣurādibhī rūpādin āntarakaraṇena ca sukhādīṃścetayate, sa evā'tmā /

original: yāvadanubhūtasakalaviṣayasusmūrṣayā sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtacetasaḥ sādhāraṇyena praṇidadhayo 'pi na sarva evārthāḥ smṛtimadhirohanti /

original: ātmanaḥ ; tathā sati bahirindriyeṣu ca yathā
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tathā sati bahis indriyeṣu ca yathā

original: yathaṃ svaviṣayasaṃprayukteṣu tathaiva yugapajjñānānutpattirupapadyata iti kṛtamindriyāntareṇa /
analyzed: sva viṣaya saṃprayukteṣu tathā eva yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ upapadyate iti kṛtam indriya antareṇa
syāt matam kādācitkasya sukha ādeḥ ātma samavāyinaḥ bāhya viṣaya adṛṣṭa ādi nimitta kāraṇasya asamavāyi kāraṇena bhāvyam
tat ca ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ iti manaḥ dravya siddhiḥ iti
tat asat
sukha duḥkha ādi pūrva kāla janmanaḥ bhimata anabhimata viṣaya saṃparka ja jñānasya ātma samavāyinaḥ eva asamavāyi kāraṇa tvāt
tasya ca viṣaya saṃprayukta indriya saṃprayogaḥ eva ātma samavetaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam
tad hetuḥ api indriya vyāpāraḥ prayatnam adṛṣṭam ca ātma samavetam apekṣamāṇāt ātma indriya sānnikarṣāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt
prayatnasya tu sva pūrva kṣaṇa varti kartavya tā jñānam

original: prayatna eva tvadṛṣṭasyāpīti nātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādīnāmasamavāyikāraṇasāpekṣatayāpi dravyāntaraparikalpanaṃ nyāyyam /

yat tu nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇasya dravya antara saṃyogaḥ eva asamavāyi kāraṇam
pārthiva paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyogāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt rūpa utpatteḥ iti
tat api sthavīyaḥ
pārthiva paramāṇuṣu rūpa ādayaḥ dahana saṃyogāt iti kṛtaḥ
kārya dravye tathā darśanāt iti ced

original: iha vā tahri kiṃ na dṛśyate iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptyavagamānantaraṃ sukhādirjāyata iti ?/
analyzed: iha vā tahri kim na dṛśyate iṣṭa aniṣṭa prāpti avagama anantaram sukha ādiḥ jāyate iti
dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vyabhicāre hi kāraṇa antara anumāna avasaraḥ
na ca iha asti vyabhicāraḥ

original: ataḥ prasiddhakāraṇabhāveṣveva yatra kāryasamavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam,
analyzed: atas prasiddha kāraṇa bhāveṣu eva yatra kārya samavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam

yat anyat tat nimittim iti vyavasthā āśrayaṇam ucitam
na tu anapekṣita aprasiddha dravya antara saṃyoga abhyupagamena tasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tva āśrayaṇam
kāraṇa antara anupalabdheḥ
dṛṣṭa anusārāt ca aṇugata rūpa ādau tathā abhyupagamaḥ
iha tu tad viparyayaḥ pradārśitaḥ eva
evam api vyāpti balena yadi dravya antara saṃyogaḥ numātavyaḥ

original: sa tarhi sparśavaddravyasamaveto bhautika eva copalabdha iti prasiddhadehādisaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna navama
analyzed: sa tarhi sparśavat dravya samavetaḥ bhautikaḥ eva ca upalabdhaḥ iti prasiddha deha ādi saṃyogaḥ eva anumāna paryavasānāt na navama
atha ucyeta bhautika tve hi manasaḥ pṛthivī ādi anyatama tvena bhavitavyam
tat ca anumāna antaraiḥ vyatirekam āpādayadbhiḥ pratyāsiddham
tathā hi na pārthivam manaḥ rasa avagama nimitta indriya tvāt rasanā vat
na pāthasīyam
gandha grahaṇa nimitta undriya tvāc ghrāṇa vat
evam ataijasa tva ādi api tad tad indriya agocara grahaṇa nimitta tayā śakya adhyavasānam iti abhautika tvam manasaḥ iti
tat anupapannam
dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanāt
rasa avagama nimitta indriya tvam apārthiva tvam iva pāthasīya tvam api samarthayati
evam sādhana antarāṇi api bhūta antara vyatikeram iva amīya bhūta bhāvam āpādayanti
atha śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandheṣu yat guṇa grāhi yat indriyam
tat eva tad guṇaka bhūta ārabdham
hanta tarhi tat eva tad itara bhūta vyatireki tayā api avagatam iti na tad avagamaka tā mātreṇa abhimata vyatireka siddhiḥ
api ca śabda ādi guṇa avagama sādhāraṇa sādhanatayā śarīram iva pāñcabhautikam
eka dvitra ādi mayam vai itara bhūta saṃsṛṣṭam astu manaḥ

original: yathā'mnāyate annamayaṃ hi somya mana iti /

original: evaṃ sukhādāvasamavāyihetutvena dravyāntasaṃyogasya sādhanaṃ na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
analyzed: evam sukha ādau asamavāyi hetu tvena dravya anta saṃyogasya sādhanam na saṃbhavati iti uktam

original: atha tatsādhanābhyupagame 'pi vivakṣitamabhautikaṃ manastattvāntaraṃ na setsyatīti prapañcayati /

tatra śaṅkā atha ucyete ti
pratyāsiddham pratiṣiddham

śakya adhyavasānam śakya niścayam

original: mano na pārthivaṃ taijasādi vā rasāvagamanimittendriyatvādrasanāvat /
analyzed: manaḥ na pārthivam taijasa ādi vā rasa avagama nimitta indriya tvāt rasanā vat
manaḥ na gandha grāhaka indriya tvāt ghrāṇa vat iti bhautika tva niṣedhaḥ
yugapad jñāna anutpatti liṅgena aṇu tvena siddheḥ na vibhu dravya antarbhāvaḥ
atas navama dravya tva siddhiḥ manasaḥ iti abhimānaḥ

dharmī ti
manasi pakṣe bhimataḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ bhautika tva rūpaḥ

original: rasagrāhakendriyatvaṃ jalīyatvaṃ gandhagrāhakendriyatvādi pārthivatvādi ca manasaḥ sādhayediti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: rasa grāhaka indriya tvam jalīya tvam gandha grāhaka indriya tva ādi pārthiva tva ādi ca manasaḥ sādhayet iti bhāvaḥ
atra śaṅkate atha śabde ti
rūpa ādiṣu madhye gandha mātra grāhaka tvam pārthiva tva sādhakam
evam rasa mātra grāhaka tva ādi ca jalīya tva ādeḥ
tathā ca manasaḥ pārthiva tva ādi sādhaka hetoḥ asiddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
atra uttaram hanta tarhi iti
yat bhūta guṇa mātra grāhakam yat indriyam tat eva bhūta antara vyatirikta tvena saṃpratipannam iti
bhūta antara guṇa grāhaka tā mātreṇa na tad tad bhūta guṇa grāhakasya manasaḥ tad tad bhūta vyatireka siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
tat ca manasaḥ bhautika anumāne pakṣe manasi asiddham iti bhāvaḥ
apārthiva tva ādi anumāne tad tad bhūta guṇa agrāhaka tvam upādhiḥ iti ca uktam bhavati

original: evamabhautikatvānumānaṃ pradūṣya manaso bhautikatvānumānamupasthāpayati api ca śabdādī ti /
analyzed: evam abhautika tva anumānam pradūṣya manasaḥ bhautika tva anumānam upasthāpayati api ca śabda ādī ti
manaḥ pāñcabhautikam pañca bhūta guṇa avagama sādhana tvāt deha
vat iti prayogaḥ

original: pañcabhūtopādanakatve gauravājjātisāṅkaryabhītyā ca pakṣāntaramāha ekadvī ti /
analyzed: pañcabhūta upādanaka tve gauravāt jāti sāṅkarya bhītyā ca pakṣa antaram āha iti
dehasya iva eka bhautikasya bhūta antara upaṣṭabdha tvāt bhūta antara guṇa upalambha sādhanatva upapattiḥ manasaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: asya pārthivatve śrutimapi saṃvādarūpeṇodāharati annamayaṃ hī ti /

anna rasa āpyāyitasya eva manasaḥ saṅkalpanā ādi vyāpāra kṣama tayā anna maya tvam śrūyate nna rasa paripoṣita tva lakṣaṇam

original: muktasya manoyogamuktvā nityamuktasvabhāvasyeśvarasyāpi tatra pramāṇamudāharati tathe ti /
analyzed: muktasya manaḥ yogam uktvā nitya mukta svabhāvasya īśvarasya api tatra pramāṇam udāharati tathā iti

original: ata eva svāśayaṃ prakaṭīkaroti manoviṣaye paramārthatastu ityādinā /

buddhau eva i ti
buddhau eva manaḥ śabdaḥ vācaka tvena vartate iti arthaḥ
muktasya īśvarasya ca buddhimat tvāt eva samanaska tva vācoyuktiḥ
tayoḥ amanaska tva vacanam tu karma kṛta buddhi vṛtti niṣedha abhiprāyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: buddhereva manastve laukikavyavahāramuktvā laukikapratyakṣamapi pradarśayati manasaḥ iti /
analyzed: buddheḥ eva manaḥ tve laukika vyavahāram uktvā laukika pratyakṣam api pradarśayati manasaḥ iti

na tu atīndriya manaḥ gocaram iti bhāvaḥ
buddhi śabdena jñānam vivakṣitam

original: nanu buddherjñānasyaiva manastve 'ntaḥkaraṇatvoktistasya kathaṃ saṅgacchata ityatrāha evaṃ ce ti /
analyzed: nanu buddheḥ jñānasya eva manaḥ tve ntaḥkaraṇa tva uktiḥ tasya katham saṅgacchate iti atra āha evam ca iti
viṣaya smṛti ādi hetu bhūta vyāpāravat tva pradarśana artham buddheḥ antaḥkaraṇa tva vyapadeśaḥ
adhyavasāya ādi hetu vyāpāravattva pradarśana artham buddhi ādi vyapadeśaḥ iva atireka vāde pi iti bhāvaḥ

original: atra vimarśakena sukhādisākṣātkārakaraṇatvena manaso 'numānaṃ tārkikābhimataṃ na vimṛṣṭam /
analyzed: atra vimarśakena sukha ādi sākṣātkāra karaṇa tvena manasaḥ numānam tārkika abhimatam na vimṛṣṭam
ayam atra āśayaḥ indriya sauṣṭhava upaghātayoḥ eva sukha duḥkha rūpa tvāt tayoḥ ca atīndriya tvāt na tad sākṣātkāra kāraṇatayā manaḥ numeyam
yat vā jñāna viśeṣa rūpa tvāt tayoḥ jñāna svayam prakāśa tva balāt eva tad pratibhāsa upapattiḥ iti

original: āhe tyādinā vimarśakenātiriktamanonirāse kṛte siddhāntīsvāśayamāviṣkaroti ucyata ityādinā /

yathā sattā saṃbandhāt pṛthivī ādiṣu sat vyavahāraḥ

original: evaṃ saṃvitsaṃbandhātpravartamāno ghaṭādiṣu prakāśata iti vyavahāraḥ prakāśamānatvaṃ vā dharmaḥ saṃvidi tu paridṛśyamāno na saṃvitsaṃbandhāpekṣaḥ,

original: api tu tatsvarūpaprayukta iti svayaṃprakāśatvāt saivā'tmeti /

analyzed: na ca nīra ālambana pratibhā bheda mātra tayā iha samādheyam nirālambana tva pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa ādi sakala

atha atīta anāgateṣu artheṣu jñāta tāyāḥ utpatti asaṃbhavāt tatra jñānena eva jñāta tā pratītiḥ upapādyā

original: samaiva ceyaṃ rītiḥ pratyakṣe 'pītyāśayenā'ha atīte ti /
analyzed: samā eva ca iyam rītiḥ pratyakṣe pi iti āśayena āha atīte ti
atra grahaṇam anumāna ādi lakṣaṇam
vyāhāraḥ śabdaḥ vyavahāraḥ
vyavahāraḥ kāyikaḥ hāna upādāna ādiḥ
ubhau vidita tva pratīti mūlau atra grāhyau

original: viditapratītimūlayostayoḥ sadbhāve 'sadbhāve vā viditatvavyavahārātpūrvameva viditatvapratītestanmūlabhūtāyā udaya iti na tatra vyāhāraliṅgena  #
analyzed: vidita pratīti mūlayoḥ tayoḥ sadbhāve sadbhāve vā vidita tva vyavahārāt pūrvam eva vidita tva pratīteḥ tad mūla bhūtāyāḥ udaye iti na tatra vyāhāra liṅgena
vidita tvam anumāya tatas vedanā anumā

original: nam / kintu svayaṃprakāśavedanabalādeva viditatvapratītiḥ atha ca tanmūlavyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kintu svayam prakāśa vedana balāt eva vidita tva pratītiḥ atha ca tad mūla vyavahāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
ānumānikī tatra
viṣaya siddhiḥ iti kvacid pāṭhe yam arthaḥ viṣayasya siddhiḥ prakāśa rūpa anumāna pramāṇa pratipannā iti

original: viṣayaprakāśasiddhi riti pāṭhe tu anumānapramāṇajanitā viṣayaprakāśānumitirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya prakāśa siddhiḥ iti pāṭhe tu anumāna pramāṇa janitā viṣaya prakāśa anumitiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vyavahārātpūrvameva jñātatvapratītiṃ smṛtisthale udāharati kenaci diti /
analyzed: vyavahārāt pūrvam eva jñāta tva pratītim smṛti sthale udāharati kenacid iti

original: smaraṇenaivārthasya smṛtatvamavabuddhya vyāharati smṛtamadya maye ti /
analyzed: smaraṇena eva arthasya smṛta tvam avabuddhya vyāharati smṛtam adya maye ti
yadi laiṅgikī smṛta tva pratītiḥ

original: tarhyanenaiva vyāhāreṇa liṅgena svasyārthe smṛtatvapratītirānumānikīti vācyam /
analyzed: tarhi anena eva vyāhāreṇa liṅgena svasya arthe smṛta tva pratītiḥ ānumānikī iti vācyam
tatra ca anyonya āśrayaṇam prasajyate
smṛta tva pratītyā tad vyavahāraḥ
tena eva ca sā svasya iti
tathā ca jñāna sva prakāśa tva nibandhanā eva jñāta tva pratītiḥ eṣṭavyā iti bhāvaḥ
sva vyāhāreṇa eva iti
nirapatrapaḥ iva kaḥ iti anvayaḥ
nirapatrapaḥ nirlajjaḥ
sva vyāhāreṇa aham
jānāmi iti sva niṣṭha jñāna vyavahāreṇa
sva jñāna anumānam sva niṣṭha jñāna pratītim laiṅgikīm

original: vyavahāre vyavahartavyajñānasya hetutvāt svakīyajñānavyavahāreṇaiva svasya svakīyajñānānumānamiti pratijñānupapannātyantamiti yāvat /
analyzed: vyavahāre vyavahartavya jñānasya hetu tvāt svakīya jñāna vyavahāreṇa eva svasya svakīya jñāna anumānam iti pratijñā anupapanna atyantam iti yāvat

original: parakīyena parātmano jñānavyavahāreṇa tadanyasya parātmaniṣṭhajñānānumānasaṃbhavāt svavyāhāreṇa svajñānānumānam iti nirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: parakīyena para ātmanaḥ jñāna vyavahāreṇa tad anyasya para ātma niṣṭha jñāna anumāna saṃbhavāt sva vyāhāreṇa sva jñāna anumānam iti nirdiṣṭam
evam jñāta tāyāḥ asiddhiḥ
jñātaḥ iti pratīti vyavahārayoḥ sva prakāśa jñānataḥ eva upapatteḥ

original: jñānasya svaprakāśatvaṃ cajāte jñāne svātmani jñānasaṃśayajñānābhāvaniścayānudayabalāt niśceyamiti varṇitam /
analyzed: jñānasya sva prakāśa tvam ca jāte jñāne sva ātmani jñāna saṃśaya jñāna abhāva niścaya anudaya balāt niśceyam iti varṇitam

original: idānīmabhyupagamyāpi viṣayaniṣṭhaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prakāśaṃ tadavaṣṭambhenaiva jñānasya svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ samarthayati prakāśānumeyajñānavādanirāsārtham  #
analyzed: idānīm abhyupagamya api viṣaya niṣṭham dharma antaram prakāśam tad avaṣṭambhena eva jñānasya svayaṃprakāśa tvam samarthayati prakāśa anumeya jñāna vāda nirāsa artham
anyaḥ ca ityādinā
atra prayoga dvayam anubhūtiḥ ananya adhīna tad dharmā sva saṃbandhāt artha antare tad dharma hetu tvāt yathā rūpam

original: taddhi svasaṃbandhāddhāṭādau cākṣuṣatve hetuḥ svasmin rūpāntarānapekṣataddharmavat;
analyzed: tat hi sva saṃbandhāt hāṭa ādau cākṣuṣa tve hetuḥ svasmin rūpa antara anapekṣa tad dharma vat
anubhūtiḥ ananya adhīna sva vyavahārā sva saṃbandhāt artha antare vyavahāra hetu tvāt
yathā sattā

original: sā hi svasaṃbandhāddhaṭādau saditi vyavahārahetuḥ svīyasadvyavahāre sattāntarā
analyzed: sā hi sva saṃbandhāt dhaṭa ādau sat iti vyavahāra hetuḥ svīya sat vyavahāre sattā antarā
napekṣāḥ iti
ādyaḥ jñātatā rūpam dharma antaram abhyupetya
dvitīyaḥ tu tad anupagamena
anena jñāna niṣṭha prakāśasya jñāna antara anapekṣa tva siddhyā jñānasya svayaṃprakāśa tva upapattiḥ
tathā ca tasya eva ātma tvam iti āha svayam prakāśa tvāt iti

original: atredamākūtam-ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ tāvat atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotirbhavatī tyādiśrutisiddham /
analyzed: atrā idam ākūtam ātmanaḥ svayam prakāśa tvam tāvat atra ayam puruṣaḥ svayan jyotiḥ bhavati ityādi śruti siddham
jñānasya svayam prakāśa tvam ca nirukta anumānataḥ
atas tasya eva ātmatvam nyāyyam iti

original: saṃvida ātmatve lāghavamapyāha kiṃ ce ti /
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ ātma tve lāghavam api āha kim ca iti
veditrī jñātṛ rūpāḥ ātmā iti yāvat
bhavatu iti kāmacāra abhyanujñāyām
iti padam anuṣañjanīyam
saṃvidaḥ eva prakāmam ātma tvam iti abhyanujñānam śreṣṭham iti arthaḥ
saṃvidaḥ ātma tve bādhakam āśaṅkate nanu aham iti
prādhānyāt ahamarthasya eva ātma tvam pratīyate

original: natu dharmatayā bhāsamānāyāḥ saṃvida iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu dharma tayā bhāsamānāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
ardha aṅgīkāreṇa pariharati satyam iti
jñātṛ tva pratītau upagamaḥ
tad prāmāṇye n upagamaḥ
tad aprāmāṇye hetum āha sa tu iti
jñātā tu bheda rūpa tayā na sākṣāt pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddhaḥ
kintu bhrānti siddhaḥ
sva lakṣaṇa vastu mātra avagāhi nirvikalpakam eva hi pramāṇam
dharma dharmi bhāva ādi kalpita bheda avagāhi sa vikalpakam tu
bhrama lakṣaṇam ati hārdam
jñātṛ bheda pratīteḥ yauktika bādham api āha bheda jñāne ti
siddhavatkāreṇa iti asya agre pi iti yojyam
apṛthak vastutaye ti pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate
vā aprakāśa ātmanaḥ iti padacchedaḥ
tathā ca ayam arthaḥ bheda jñāna siddhavatkāreṇa api kvacid bheda jñānasya prāmāṇya upagamena api
saṃvedanānām bhedasya saugataiḥ tattvataḥ iṣyamāṇa tvāt
apṛthak vastu tayā abhinna vastu tvena sādhyena
gṛhīta avyabhicāreṇa gṛhīta vyāptikena
saha upalambha niyamena jñāna jñātroḥ mahā upambha niyama rūpa hetunā
jñātuḥ aprakāśa svabhāva tve prakāśa ayogaḥ svabhāva virodhāt eva

original: prakāśasvabhāvatve ca saṃvedanatvamevetyādinā vā saṃvidabhedasādhakena saṃvidbhedavādhakena
analyzed: prakāśa svabhāva tve ca saṃvedana tvam eva ityādinā vā saṃvid abheda sādhakena saṃvid bheda vādhakena

original: hetunā aprakāśātmanaḥ saṃvidbhinnasya jñāturahamarthasyātmanaḥ tattvaṃ-svarūpaṃ durupagamam-upagantumaśakyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: hetunā aprakāśa ātmanaḥ saṃvid bhinnasya jñātuḥ ahamarthasya ātmanaḥ tattvam svarūpam durupagamam upagantum aśakyam iti arthaḥ
tṛtīya anta dvayam durupagamam iti anena anvitam

original: jñātā saṃvidabhinnaḥ saṃvidā sahaivopalabhyamānatvāt prakāśasvabhāvatvādvā iti prayogo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
analyzed: jñātā saṃvid abhinnaḥ saṃvidā saha eva upalabhyamāna tvāt prakāśa svabhāva tvāt vā iti prayogaḥ tra bodhyaḥ
yat vā pṛthak vastuta yena tvāt syāt pāṭhaḥ
avyabhicāra nirūpakasya abheda rūpa sādhyasya upasthitiḥ tu arthāt

saha upalambha niyamena

original: prakāśasvābhāvye ca saṃvedanatvamityādinā vā hetunā prakāśātmanaḥ saṃvidabhinnasya siddhyata ātmanaḥ,
analyzed: prakāśa svābhāvye ca saṃvedana tvam ityādinā vā hetunā prakāśa ātmanaḥ saṃvid abhinnasya siddhyataḥ ātmanaḥ
durupagamam iti arthaḥ
niruk prakāram grāhaka bheda nirāsa hetum grāhya bheda nirāse pi atidiśati grāhye ti

original: sahopalambhaniyamāt prakāśasvabhāvye ca saṃvedanatvamityādito vā saṃvidabhinnatvaṃ nīlāderviṣayasyeti jñānabhinnatvena nīlādyarthabhedasyāpyasattvamityarthaḥ
analyzed: saha upalambha niyamāt prakāśa svabhāvye ca saṃvedana tvam iti āditaḥ vā saṃvid abhinna tvam nīla ādeḥ viṣayasya iti jñāna bhinna tvena nīla ādi artha bhedasya api asattvam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu grāhyagrāhakayoḥ saṃvidabhede jñātṛjñeyabhedānāṃ jñānatobhedenāvabhāsaḥ kathamityatrāha ata iti /
analyzed: nanu grāhya grāhakayoḥ saṃvid abhede jñātṛ jñeya bhedānām jñānataḥ bhedena avabhāsaḥ katham iti atra āha atas iti
mithyā
saṃvid ābhāsa mātram satyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: tatra vāsanā doṣa iti prakaṭānāṃ saugatānāṃ yogācārāṇāṃ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra vāsanā doṣaḥ iti prakaṭānām saugatānām yoga ācārāṇām pakṣaḥ
anādya vidyā doṣaḥ iti pracchannānām māyā vādinām

original: uktārthe prakaṭānāṃ saugatānāṃ saṃmatiṃ pradarśayati avibhogo 'pī ti /
analyzed: ukta arthe prakaṭānām saugatānām saṃmatim pradarśayati avibhogaḥ ti

original: sā ca nirbhedāpi bhrāntijñānaiḥ nīlabhedādigrāhyabhedacaitramaitrādigrāhaka bheda- pratyakṣatvānumānatvādilakṣaṇajñānabhedavatīva pratīyata  #
analyzed: sā ca nirbhedā api bhrānti jñānaiḥ nīla bheda ādi grāhya bheda caitra maitra ādi grāhaka bheda pratyakṣa tva anumāna tva ādi lakṣaṇa jñāna bhedavatī iva pratīyata
iti kārikā arthaḥ
māyinām saṃmatim upadarśayati śuddham iti
bheda prapañcasya śuddham tattvam na upādānam
tathā sati paramārtha tva āpattyā anivṛtti prasaṅgāt
tatas tasya prapañcasya māyā eva vividha vicitra mithyā artha pratibhāsa hetuḥ mithyā bhū
tān ādya vidyā eva jananī upādānam iti kārikā arthaḥ
nirviśeṣa sanmātram cit rūpam paramārthaḥ

ātmanaḥ svayam prakāśa tvam śrautam
saṃvidaḥ tathātvam ca yukti siddham
tat tasyāḥ eva ātma tvam

original: tadbhinnasya tu sarvasya doṣamūlatvādābhāsamātratvamiti saṃvidātmatvaṃ pūrvapakṣitam /
analyzed: tad bhinnasya tu sarvasya doṣa mūla tvāt ābhāsa mātra tvam iti saṃvid ātma tvam pūrvapakṣitam

kṣaṇika vijñānam ātmā
nitya vijñānam ātmā iti ca

original: tatra kṣaṇikavijñānātmatvamataṃ prakaṭasaugatānāṃ tāvannirasyati atrā'he tyādinā /

nitya ātma vāda īkṣaṇika vijñāna ātma vāde dūṣaṇam āha iti arthaḥ

original: atha pratibhāyā iva nirviṣayatvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ śaṅkate na ca nirālambane ti /
analyzed: atha pratibhāyāḥ iva nirviṣaya tvam pratyabhijñāyāḥ śaṅkate na ca nirālambane ti

atra bādhita tvam āha nirālambana tve ti

original: jñānasāmānyasya saviṣayakatvaniyamānnirviṣayakatve jñānatvāyogāt jñānaviśeṣe nirviṣayakatvasādhanaṃ bādhitaviṣayamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna sāmānyasya sa viṣayaka tva niyamāt nirviṣayaka tve jñāna tva ayogāt jñāna viśeṣe nirviṣayaka tva sādhanam bādhita viṣayam iti arthaḥ
pratibhāyām api na atyantāya nirviṣaya tvam
anyatra sataḥ eva anyatra bhānāt
kvacid yāthārthyasya api dṛṣṭeḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: jñānasāmānyasya nirviṣayakatvamiti pakṣe svapravṛttivyāghātamapyāha sādhanasya ce ti /
analyzed: jñāna sāmānyasya nirviṣayaka tvam iti pakṣe sva pravṛtti vyāghātam api āha sādhanasya ca iti
nirviṣayaka tva sādhaka anumānasya sa viṣayaka tve tad aviśeṣeṇa aśeṣa jñānānām sa viṣayaka tvam syāt

original: tasya nirviṣayakatve ca na nirviṣayakatvarūpasādhyasiddhiriti sādhanārthapravṛttivaighaṭyamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasya nirviṣayaka tve ca na nirviṣayaka tva rūpa sādhya siddhiḥ iti sādhana artha pravṛtti vaighaṭyam iti bhāvaḥ
prapañcitaḥ ca iti

original: pūrvamīmāṃsāprathamādhyāyaprathamapāde uttaramīmāṃsādvitīyādhyāyacaraṇe ca jñānanirālambanatvamatanirākaraṇaṃ sūtratadvyākhyākartṛbhiḥ kṛtam
analyzed: pūrva mīmāṃsā prathama adhyāya prathama pāde uttara mīmāṃsā dvitīya adhyāya caraṇe ca jñāna nirālambana tva mata nirākaraṇam sūtra tad vyākhyā kartṛbhiḥ kṛtam
śāstre ca nyāya tattau akhye sarva vijñāna yāthārthya samarthanena kṛtam iti arthaḥ

original: atra pūrvottaramīmāṃsābhāgayorityanena mīmāṃsāyā viṃśatilakṣaṇyā aikaśāstrayaṃ tatpūrvottarabhāgarūpatvaṃ ca karmabrahmavicārayorabhimatam
analyzed: atra pūrva uttara mīmāṃsā bhāgayoḥ iti anena mīmāṃsāyāḥ viṃśati lakṣaṇyāḥ aikaśāstrayam tad pūrva uttara bhāga rūpatvam ca karma brahma vicārayoḥ abhimatam

tatra ādyam nīla pīta ādi jñānam

original: kṣaṇikatve 'pyubhayavidhavijñānasyā'layavijñānadhārānuvṛttyā pratyabhijñopapadyata ityatrāha- ata eve ti /

ma prasaṅgaḥ ca iti bhāvaḥ
anabhyupagamaḥ iti

santāna antargatasya pūrvasya anubhavituḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt
uttarasya ca ananubhavitṛ tvena pratisandhāna ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
atrā idam anusandheyam kṣaṇikānām samudāya bhāvaḥ na ghaṭate
sthira eka deśa kāla ādi upādhi kroḍīkāra asaṃbhavāt saugate naye
eka buddhi kroḍīkāraḥ tu ati prasaktaḥ

pūrva tva mātrasya ati prasakta tvāt ca
tad santāna niyama anupapattiḥ eva iti

original: nanvālayavijñānasya sausādṛśyena aikyabhrāntyā pratisandhānaṃ bhramātmakaṃ ghaṭata iti śaṅkate na ci ti /
analyzed: nanu ālayavijñānasya sausādṛśyena aikya bhrāntyā pratisandhānam bhrama ātmakam ghaṭate iti śaṅkate na ti

original: bhrāntirūpā ca pratyabhijñā na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /

ghaṭate iti śeṣaḥ
dṛṣṭānta vaiṣamyam upapādayati yujyate iti

original: dṛṣṭānte bhinnakālikadīpakalikayoḥ susadṛśayoḥ sākṣātkartā sthiraścetanaḥ prasiddho bhrāntibhāktvayogyaḥ /

original: nanvata evāsmābhiḥ saṃvitprāgabhāvāsiddhirucyata iti cettatrāha aindriyike ti /

original: tathā cānyonyāśrayaḥ-saṃvitprakāśādhīno 'haṅkāraprakāśaḥ ahaṅkāraprakāśādhīnaśca saṃvidaḥ prakāśa iti /
analyzed: tathā ca anyonya āśrayaḥ saṃvid prakāśa adhīnaḥ haṅkāra prakāśaḥ ahaṅkāra prakāśa adhīnaḥ ca saṃvidaḥ prakāśaḥ iti

original: uktalakṣaṇātprātikūlyādvādhakopanipātānna mitho vyaṅgyavyañjakatvaṃ saṃvidahaṅkārayoḥ saṃbhavatīti ca tātparyāntaraṃ varṇitaṃ śrīmannigamāntagurucaraṇaistattvaṭīkāyām
analyzed: ukta lakṣaṇāt prātikūlyāt vādhaka upanipātāt na mithas vyaṅgya vyañjaka tvam saṃvid ahaṅkārayoḥ saṃbhavati iti ca tātparya antaram varṇitam śrīmat nigama anta guru caraṇaiḥ tattvaṭīkāyām
para mate saṃvidaḥ haṅkāra vyaṅgya tve dūṣaṇa antaram āha vyaṅgya tve iti
anya adhīna prakāśa tve nubhūteḥ ananubhūti tva prasaṅgaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ iva iti arthaḥ
tad vya ṅgyasya api tad vyañjaka tve na virodhaḥ
dṛṣṭa tvāt iti śaṅkām apanudati dinakare ti
hasta talasya vātāyana vivara praviṣṭa sūrya kiraṇānām gati pratirodhena saṃhati mātra hetu tvam

original: saṃhatānāṃ ca teṣāṃ sphuṭaprakāśaḥ svata evetyāha karatalasye ti /
analyzed: saṃhatānām ca teṣām sphuṭa prakāśaḥ svatas eva iti āha kara talasya iti
gati pratirodhena api saṃvid sphuṭa prakāśa hetu tvam kara talasya iva durghaṭam ahaṅkārasya amūrtasya iti hārdam
evam ahaṅkāra vyaṅgya tvam saṃvid ātmanaḥ na apekṣitam anupapannam ca iti uktam

original: abhivyaktiprakārāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ prakṛte 'nupapatterapi nāhaṅkārasya tadabhivyañjakatvamityāha api ce tyādinā /
analyzed: abhivyakti prakārāṇām saṃbhāvitānām prakṛte nupapatteḥ api na ahaṅkārasya tad abhivyañjaka tvam iti āha api ca ityādinā
sva prakāśa tvena anya apekṣu prakāśa tva abhāva upagamāt na saṃvid prakāśa hetu tvam ahaṅkārasya
saṃvidaḥ jñāna antara agocara tvena tad viṣayaka jñāna janaka tvam api tad abhivyañjaka tvam ahaṅkārasya na iti prakāśana prakāśaka jñāna janaka tva rūpa abhivyañjaka tva prakāra dvayam
dūṣitam
atas eva iti
ananubhāvya tvāt eva anubhavasya tad viṣayaka anubhava karaṇasya aprasiddhyā tad anugraha lakṣaṇa abhivyakti prakāraḥ pi na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ
astu vā tad jñāna karaṇam kiñcid

original: tadanugrahaprakārāḥ prakṛte na saṃbhavantīti vadan anugrahaṃ vikalpayatitāvat sa hī ti /
analyzed: tad anugraha prakārāḥ prakṛte na saṃbhavanti iti vadan anugraham vikalpayati tāvat sa hi iti
saḥ anugrahaḥ grāhakasya sahakāri sampatti āpādana lakṣaṇaḥ
vedya gate ti
dvitīyam āha vedye ti
karaṇasya grāhya sannikarṣa prayojaka tvena iti yāvat
vyaktiḥ hi sva dvārā cakṣuḥ ādeḥ vedya jāti ādi sannikarṣam saṃpādayati
darpaṇa ādiḥ ca cākṣuṣa raśmi gati parāpartanena mukha ādi sannikarṣam cakṣuṣaḥ
tṛtīyam āha vettṛ gate ti
na a virataḥ duścaritāḥ dityādinā ca śama ādeḥ tattva jñāna janaka śāstra sahakāri tvam jñāyate

original: niṣkāmakarmaṇā śamādinācāpākṛtapāparāgādidoṣasya śuddhacittasyaiva hi śāstreṇa tattvajñānotpattiḥ /
analyzed: niṣkāma karmaṇā śama ādinā ca apākṛta pāpa rāga ādi doṣasya śuddha cittasya eva hi śāstreṇa tattva jñāna utpattiḥ
prakṛte prathama anugraha kalpasya anupapattim aha na tāvat iti

original: nanvajñānameva jñānotpattivirodhi vedye 'nubhavātmani vartata iti cettatrāha ajñānam iti /
analyzed: nanu ajñānam eva jñāna utpatti virodhi vedye nubhava ātmani vartate iti ced tatra āha ajñānam iti
jñānena samānau āśraya viṣayau yasya evaṃbhūtam ajñānam
jñāna samāna āśrayam jñāna samāna viṣayam ca iti yāvat
nikṣepam padanyāsam
saṃbandham iti yāvat

original: ajñānaṃ hi jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ tatsamānayogakṣemaṃ vānyat jñātṛtvaprasaktiśūnye bhavadabhimate 'nubhavātmani na ghaṭate ghaṭādāviveti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: ajñānam hi jñāna prāgabhāva rūpam tad samāna yogakṣemam vā anyat jñātṛ tva prasakti śūnye bhavat abhimate nubhava ātmani na ghaṭate ghaṭa ādau iva iti bhāvaḥ
bhavat api iti abhyupagamya vādaḥ
ātma āśrita tve pi ajñānasya ahaṅkāreṇa nivartya tva abhāvāt vedya doṣa āpanāyaka tva rūpam abhivyañjaka tvam na tasya iti bhāvaḥ

original: parābhimate 'nubhavātmani ajñānasyopagame 'niṣṭaṃ cāha jñānaṃ ce ti /
analyzed: para abhimate nubhava ātmani ajñānasya upagame niṣṭam ca āha jñānam ca iti
ātma niṣṭham ātma viṣayam ca ajñānam ātmanaḥ nanu bhāvya tvāt jñāna a nivartyam
sajyate samāna āśraya viṣaya tvena eva jñāna ajñānayoḥ bādhaka bādhya bhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
etena antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti vyāpya tvam eva iṣyate ātmanaḥ
yena jaḍa tva ādi prasajyeta
ātma ākāra antaḥkaraṇa vṛttyā eva ātma ajñāna nivṛttiḥ iti api nirastam
vṛtteḥ jaḍa bhūtāyāḥ ajñāna nivartaka tva ayogāt
jñānam eva hi ajñānasya nivartakam
ajñānam ca kim jñāna prāgabhāva rūpam
āhosvit bhāva rūpam iti vikalpya dūṣayati jñāne tyādi vākya dvayena
karaṇānām abhūmi tvāt na tad saṃbandha hetu tā
ahamarthasya boddhṛ tvāt na sa tena eva śodhyate
na ca sva āśraya tayā abhivyaṅgya prakāśanam abhivyañjayituḥ svabhāvaḥ
pradīpa ādau adarśanāt
yathā avasthita vastu prakāśa anukūla svabhāva tvāt ca jñāna tad sādhana tad anugrāhakāṇām
tat ca svatas prāmāṇya nyāyāt
tad anabhyupagame ca sarvatra an āśca a saprakaṅgāt
vyakteḥ tu jātiḥ ākāraḥ eva iti tathā pratyāyanam
na vyañjaka tva prayuktam
uktāt eva vyabhicārāt
darpaṇa ādiḥ tu na ayanam ahar pratiphalana lakṣaṇa doṣa hetuḥ na abhivyañjakaḥ vadana ādeḥ
vyañjakaḥ tu āloka ādiḥ eva
vyañjaka tve pi pratīpa gamana doṣa prayuktaḥ tatra anyathā avabhāsaḥ
na ca iha tathā ahamarthasya tādṛśa doṣa āpādaka tvam svabhāvaḥ

original: tathā sati sarvasyāpi pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgānna kiñcittathyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati sarvasya api pratyakṣa ādeḥ aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt na kiñcid tathyam syāt
tasmāt jñātṛ tayā siddhyan ahamarthaḥ eva pratyagātmā
na jñapti mātram
iti ahaṅkārasya saṃvid abhivyañjaka tva nirākaraṇa prakaraṇam
yat tu suṣupti suktayoḥ jñapti mātra tayā sphuraṇam
aham iti tu na pratibhāti iti
tatra suṣuptau tathā avasthitiḥ purastāt eva nirastā
aham iti eka rūpeṇa ā prabodhāt tatra api ātmanaḥ sphuraṇāt

original: yadi paraṃ parāgarthānanubhavāttamoguṇābhibhavācca na vivicya sphuṭaṃ cakāsti;
analyzed: yadi param parāc artha ananubhavāt tamaḥ guṇa abhibhavāt ca na vivicya sphuṭam cakāsti

original: bhavadabhimatānubhūtirapi tadānīṃ tathaiva hi prathata iti vācyam /
analyzed: bhavat abhimata anubhūtiḥ api tadānīm tathā eva hi prathate iti vācyam
na aham aham na api artha antaram

original: api tvanubhūtimātramajñānasākṣitayāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃvidhaṃ svāpasamayabhavamanubhavaṃ nahi suptotthitaḥ kaścit parāmṛśannupalabdhacaraḥ /
analyzed: api tu anubhūtimātram ajñāna sākṣi tayā avatiṣṭhate iti evaṃvidham svāpa samaya bhavam anubhavam nahi supta utthitaḥ kaścid parāmṛśan upalabdha caraḥ

original: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamavediṣamiti parāmarśanādeva tathātvaṃ labhyata iti cet; kathamiva?
analyzed: etāvantam kālam na kiñcid aham avediṣam iti parāmarśanāt eva tathātvam labhyate iti ced katham iva
na kiñcid iti nirdeśāt iti ced
nanu evam anubhūti pratibhāsaḥ pi pratyākhyātaḥ syāt

original: api ca suṣuptisamayasiddhamātmānamahamiti parāmṛśya na kiñcidavediṣaṃmiti tasya vedane pratiṣidhyamāne tātkālikīṃ
analyzed: api ca suṣupti samaya siddham ātmānam aham iti parāmṛśya na kiñcid avediṣam iti tasya vedane pratiṣidhyamāne tātkālikīm

original: vittisiddhimahamarthasya cāsiddhimabhidadhāno 'nubhavavirodhamapi na jānāti devānāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: vitti siddhim aham arthasya ca asiddhim abhidadhānaḥ nubhava virodham api na jānāti devānām priyaḥ
nirviṣayā nirāśrayā ca vittiḥ na asti iti uktam eva

original: nanu māmapyahaṃ na jñātavān prasupta ityasti hi prabodhe pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu mām api aham na jñātavān prasuptaḥ iti asti hi prabodhe pratyayaḥ

original: satyam; sa tu varṇāśramādiviśiṣṭatayā prabodhasamayasaṃvedyamānaṃ dehinaṃ māmityādāya
analyzed: satyam sa tu varṇa āśrama ādi viśiṣṭa tayā prabodha samaya saṃvedyamānam dehinam mām iti ādāya
sva apyaya avasthā prasiddha a viśada sva anubhava eka tāna ahamarthasya tena rūpeṇa ajñāta tvam prajñāta tvam prajñāpayati
na punar jña svabhāvasya ahamarthasya api

original: evamiva khalvayamanubhavaḥ-atra supto 'hamīdṛśaścetyevaṃ māmapi na jñātavānahamiti /
analyzed: evam iva khalu ayam anubhavaḥ atra suptaḥ ham īdṛśaḥ ca iti evam mām api na jñātavān aham iti

original: api ca, ātmā suṣuptau ajñānasākṣitvenā'sta iti hi yauṣmākī sthitiḥ /
analyzed: api ca ātmā suṣuptau ajñāna sākṣi tvena āste iti hi yauṣmākī sthitiḥ
sākṣi tvam ca sākṣāt jñātṛ tvam iti uktam

original: sa cāyaṃ jānāmīti pratibhāsamāno 'smadartha eveti kathamiva tadānīmahamartho na pratheta /
analyzed: sa ca ayam jānāmi iti pratibhāsamānaḥ smad arthaḥ eva iti katham iva tadānīm aham arthaḥ na pratheta
svasmai prakāśamānaḥ ham iti eva hi prakāśate iti
tat siddham svāpa ādi daśāsu api ātmā prakāśamānaḥ ham iti eva prakāśate iti
iti svāpe hamartha bhāna samarthana prakaraṇam
yat tu muktau aham arthaḥ na upāvartate iti tat vārtam

original: yatastathā sati vaināśikadarśana ivātmanāśa evāpavargaḥ prakārāntareṇa pratijñātaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yatas tathā sati vaināśika darśane iva ātma nāśaḥ eva apavargaḥ prakāra antareṇa pratijñātaḥ syāt
no khalu aham iti dharma mātram
yena tad apagame pi avidyā nivṛttyām iva ātmanaḥ sva rūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate iti ucyate
aham iti eva hi tasya svarūpam

original: jñānamapi hi taddharmatvena tasyaiva prakāśate jñānaṃ me jātamiti /
analyzed: jñānam api hi tad dharma tvena tasya eva prakāśate jñānam me jātam iti
kā kathā punar artha antarasya ātma tve

original: anyaśca-yaḥ sāṃsārikaduḥkhaiḥ duḥkhitvenā'tmānaṃ tattvatobhrāntyā vā pratyeti duḥkhyahamiti,
analyzed: anyaḥ cayaḥ sāṃsārika duḥkhaiḥ duḥkhi tvena ātmānam tattvataḥ bhrāntyā vā pratyeti duḥkhī aham iti

original: saḥ sarvamidamaniṣṭajātaṃ kathamahamapunarūdayapanudyāvyākulaḥ svastho bhūyāsamiti sañjātamumukṣaḥ tatsādhane pravartate /
analyzed: saḥ sarvam idam aniṣṭa jātam katham aham a punar ūdaya apanudya a vyākulaḥ svasthaḥ bhūyāsam iti sañjāta mumukṣaḥ tad sādhane pravartate
sa yadi sādhana anuṣṭhānāt aham eva na bhaviṣyāmi iti avagacchati
apagacchet asau mokṣa kathā prasaṅgāt api

original: tataścāsambhavadadhikāritayā sarva eva vedāntavidhayaḥ sarvāṇi ca mokṣaśāstrāṇi prāmāṇyādeva pracyaveran /
analyzed: tatas ca asambhavat adhikāri tayā sarve eva vedānta vidhayaḥ sarvāṇi ca mokṣa śāstrāṇi prāmāṇyāt eva pracyaveran
aham upalakṣitaḥ upavarge vasthāsyate iti ced kim atas

original: na hi mayi naṣṭe 'pi ko 'pi prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti kaścitprekṣāvān prayasyati /
analyzed: na hi mayi naṣṭe pi kaḥ pi prakāśaḥ sthāsyati iti kaścid prekṣāvān prayasyati

original: asmatpratyaye yo 'nidamaṃśaḥ cidekarasaḥ prakāśaḥ sa ātmā /
analyzed: asmat pratyaye yaḥ nidam aṃśaḥ cit ekarasaḥ prakāśaḥ saḥ ātmā

original: tasmiṃstadbalanirbhāsitatayā lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha evāhaṃ jānāmīti sidhyannartha
analyzed: tasmin tad bala nirbhāsita tayā lakṣaṇataḥ yuṣmad arthe eva aham jānāmi iti sidhyan artha
iti pratyakṣa virodhāt

original: ahaṃ jānāmīti sidhyaścetano suṣmadartha iti mātā bandhyetivadvyāhatārthaṃvacaḥ /
analyzed: aham jānāmi iti sidhyaḥ cetano suṣmad arthaḥ iti mātā bandhyā itivat vyāhata arthaṃvacaḥ
na ca asau anya adhīna avabhāsaḥ
caitanya svabhāva tayā svayam jyotiḥ tvāt
prakāśaḥ ca prakāśa tvāt eva kasyacid bhavet dīpa ādi prakāśa vat iti na ātmā bhavitum arhati
atas jñātṛ tayā aham iti siddhi an arthaḥ eva ātmā
sa ca muktau api ātmane ham iti eva prakāśate
svasmai prakāśamāna tvāt

original: yo yaḥ svasmai prakāśate sa sarvo 'hamityeva prakāśamānodṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ svasmai prakāśate sa sarvaḥ ham iti eva
yathā tathā avabhāsamāna tvena ubhaya vādi saṃmataḥ saṃsārī ātmā

original: yaḥ punarahamiti na cakāsti nāsau svasmai prakāśate,
analyzed: yaḥ punar aham iti na cakāsti na asau svasmai prakāśate
yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ
svasmai prakāśate ca ayam mukta ātmā
tasmāt saḥ ham iti eva prakāśate
na ca evam prakāśamāna tve muktasya ajñāni tva saṃsāri tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ āpādanīyaḥ
mukta tva virodhāt
a tad upādhi tvāt ca tad pratyayasya
na hi ajñāna upādhiḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ
brahma ātma parokṣa jñāna kṣapita niravaśeṣa avidyānām api vāmadeva ādīnām ame
tad pratyaya darśanāt

original: śrayate hi 'taddhaitatpaśyan ṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ suryaśca ahameva ca vartāmi bhaviṣyāmī'tyādi /
analyzed: śrayate hi tat ha etat paśyan ṛṣiḥ vāmadevaḥ pratipede aham manuḥ abhavam suryaḥ ca aham eva ca vartāmi bhaviṣyāmi ityādi
tathā kathañcid api avidyā ādi kleśaiḥ leśataḥ jātucit aparāmaṣṭasya paramapuruṣasya api aham iti ātma parāmarśaḥ

original: prajñāyate 'hantāhamimāstistro devatāḥ' 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' 'sar ikṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti',
analyzed: prajñāyate hanta aham imāḥ tistraḥ devatāḥ bahu syām prajāyeya saḥ ikṣata lokān nu sṛjai iti

atas smiloke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
teṣām aham samuddhartā aham bīja pradaḥ pitā veda aham samatītāni iti evamādibhiḥ

original: evaṃ ca sākṣādahamarthādātmano vilakṣaṇe 'pi dehe yenā'vyaktikapariṇāmabhedenāhamiti bhramaḥ,
analyzed: evam ca sākṣāt ahamarthāt ātmanaḥ vilakṣaṇe dehe yena avyaktika pariṇāma bhedena aham iti bhramaḥ

original: bahumantavyajanāvadhīraṇahetuścāsau garvāparaparyāyaḥ tatra tatra śāstreṣu prāyaśoheyatayopadiśyate /

original: anātmani tu śarīre bhavantī avidyeti yuktam /

uktam ca śrūyatām ca api avidyāyāḥ svarūpam kula nandana

indriya agrā
hya tvāt ātmanaḥ na ātma indriya sannikarṣa upādhi tvena abhivyañjaka tvam ahaṅkārasya saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ
tṛtīye dūṣaṇam aham arthasya i ti

original: svagatakalmaṣasya svenaiva kevalena nivartanāyogānna tṛtīyo 'pi kalpaḥ kalpata ityarthaḥ //13//
analyzed: svagata kalmaṣasya svena eva kevalena nivartana ayogāt na tṛtīyaḥ api kalpaḥ kalpate iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nirasya parābhimataṃ vyañjakasvabhāvamapi nirasyati nace ti /
analyzed: evam vyañjaka tvam nirasya para abhimatam vyañjaka svabhāvam api nirasyati na ca iti

original: pradīpo hi ghaṭādeḥ prakāśako na svavṛttitayā taṃ prakāśayati /
analyzed: pradīpaḥ hi ghaṭa ādeḥ prakāśakaḥ na sva vṛtti tayā tam prakāśayati

original: na khalvevaṃ pratītiḥ pradīpe ghaṭa iti,
analyzed: na khalu evam pratītiḥ pradīpe ghaṭaḥ iti
pradīpaḥ ghaṭavān iti vā

original: kintu yathāvasthitaveṣeṇaiva bhūtale ghaṭa itīti bhavadukte niyame 'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kintu yathā avasthita veṣeṇa eva bhū tale ghaṭaḥ iti iti bhavat ukte niyame na aikāntyam iti bhāvaḥ
jñāna ādīnām yathā avasthita vastu prakāśa hetutvam eva iti atra yuktim āha tat ca iti
prāmāṇya svatastva ātmaka yukteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: jñānasāmagrīprayojyatvaṃ jñānabhāsakasāmagrībhāsyatvaṃ ca prāmāṇyasyotpattau jñaptau ca svatastvam /
analyzed: jñāna sāmagrī prayojya tvam jñāna bhāsaka sāmagrī bhāsya tvam ca prāmāṇyasya utpattau jñaptau ca svatastvam
nanu svatas prāmāṇye kvacid jñāne viparīta ākāra avagāhanam kutas
jñāna sāmagrayām atirikta doṣa saṃvalanāt eva
svatas prāmāṇya grahe pi anabhyāsa daśā āpanna jñāne prāmāṇya saṃśayaḥ ca doṣa mūla tva saṃśayāt eva iti ca bodhyam
prāmāṇyasya svatas tva anupagame bādhakam āha tad anabhyupagamaḥ iti
sarva jñāneṣu api aprāmāṇya śaṅkā prasakteḥ prāmāṇyasya svatas tva anupagame svatas tvam eṣṭavyam

original: anyathā tu jāte 'pi prāmāṇyaniścaye 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā nirargalaprasarā bhavedeva /
analyzed: anyathā tu jāte pi prāmāṇya niścaye prāmāṇya śaṅkā nirargala prasarā bhavet eva
niṣkampa pravṛttiḥ ca kutra api na ghaṭeta iti bhāvaḥ
vyakteḥ iti
vyakteḥ na abhivyañjaka tva prayuktam sva āśrita tayā jāteḥ prakāśanam
kintu vyaktaya pṛthak siddha prakāra tva rūpa vastu svabhāvāt eva
vyañjakaḥ tu āloka ādiḥ eva
vyakteḥ vyañjaka tvam api na saṃpratipannam iti bhāvaḥ
darpaṇa ādiḥ riti

original: darpaṇādi pratihatagateścākṣuṣatejasaḥ pratinivṛtya mukhābhimukhatayā prasaraṇameva mukhasyānyathāpratītau doṣarūpaṃ prayojakam /
analyzed: darpaṇa ādi pratihata gateḥ cākṣuṣa tejasaḥ pratinivṛtya mukha abhimukha tayā prasaraṇam eva mukhasya anyathā pratītau doṣa rūpam prayojakam
pratiloma gati rūpa doṣa prayojakasya darpaṇa ādeḥ vyañjaka tvam bhavatu mā vā
na vyañjaka tva prayuktam anyathā bhānam iti bhāvaḥ
na ca iha iti
tādṛśa doṣa āpādaka tvam jñāna karaṇānām viparīta grahaṇa upayogi vyāpṛti rūpa doṣa āpādaka tvam
tathā asati ti

original: pramāṇādhīnapramitāvahamarthasyāpi hetutvāt pramāṇadoṣasaṃpādakatve tasya na kiñcidapi yathārthajñānaṃ saṃbhavetpramāṇajanyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa adhīna pramitau ahamarthasya api hetu tvāt pramāṇa doṣa saṃpādaka tve tasya na kiñcid api yathārtha jñānam saṃbhavet pramāṇa janyam iti arthaḥ
tasmāt diti
jñātṛ tva pratīteḥ nirukta diśā bhrānti tva ayogāt jñātṛ tayā siddhyan ahamarthaḥ eva ātmā
na jñāpti mātram iti bhāvaḥ
atra ayam prayogaḥ jñānam na ātmā dharma tayā pramita tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti
evam jñātuḥ ahamarthasya ātma tvam samarthitam

original: atha svāpe muktau cāhamarthasya bhānaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: atha svāpe muktau ca ahamarthasya bhānam na asti

original: tannāhamarthasyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti paramatamanūdya nirasyati yattu suṣuptī tyādinā /

original: viśadabhānābhāve 'pi sūkṣmatayāhamarthasya bhānaṃ parābhimatasaṃvida iva svāpe 'stīti ca hārdam /

original: nanu kiñciditi jaḍamātrasya parāmarśa iti cettarhyahamarthasyāpi na niṣedhaḥ pratyaktvenājaḍatvāditi bhāvaḥ /

original: yadvā jñeyamātrasya kiñciditi parāmarśo na jñānasyeti cettulyanayena jñāturapi na parāmarśa iti bhāvaḥ /

para pakṣe pratisandhāna virodham āha api ca iti
devānām priyaḥ murkhaḥ

original: na hi bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyasya ghaṭasadbhāvabhūtalaniṣedhaviṣayakatvaṃ kasyacinmatam /

original: nanu saviṣayasaṃvinniṣedhe 'pi nirviśeṣasaṃvitprakāśe na virodha ityatrāha nirviṣaye ti /

original: tacca dharmabhūtaṃ naiva tadā prakāśata iti tu siddhāntinaḥ /

original: svāpe 'hamarthānanubhave pratisandhānāntaraṃ pramāṇatvena śaṅkate nanu mām iti /

original: to 'hamartha eveti ahamajña ityajñānasākṣitayā svāpe 'hamarthabhānaṃ setsyatyeveti bhāvaḥ /

original: ahamartho yuṣmadartha iti pratijñāvākye virodhamāha aham iti /

original: nanu yuṣmadartha iti ḷ ākṣaṇikaṃ parāktvaparam /

na atas virodhaḥ

original: parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasya cidadhīnaprakāśatvādityatrā'ha na cāsā viti /

atra prayogaḥ aham arthaḥ caitanya dharmaka tvāt
yat na evam yat na evam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti
prātyakṣikī dharma tvena pramitiḥ caitanyasya ātma tve pūrvam bādhaka tvena uktā
atha ānumānikīm tām tathātvena āha prakāśaḥ ca iti
muktau aham arthasya sadbhāve pūrvam tarkaḥ uktaḥ

original: atha tadā muktasyāhantvena bhāne 'numānaṃ samagrāṅgakanyāyamukhena prapañcayati sa ce ti /
analyzed: atha tadā muktasya ahantvena bhāne numānam samagra aṅgaka nyāya mukhena prapañcayati sa ca iti
na ca evam iti

original: evaṃ bhāsamānatve- ahantvena bhāsamānatve muktasya saṃsāriṇa ivājñatvādi nāpādayituṃ śakyate,

mukta tva virodhāt śāstra siddha mukti daśā bhāvya jñāna nivṛtti ādi virodhāt iti arthaḥ

original: muktātmā ajñānavān saṃsaraṇadharmavān vā ahantvena bhāsamānatvāt saṃsāryātmavaditi anumānaṃ muktaviśeṣa- pratipādakaśāstrabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: muktātmā ajñānavān saṃsaraṇa dharmavān vā ahantvena bhāsamāna tvāt saṃsārya ātma vat iti anumānam mukta viśeṣa pratipādaka śāstra bādhitam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu nā asmābhiḥ ajña tva ādi muktasya sādhyate
kintu ahantvena bhāseta yadi mukta ātmā

original: tarhyajñānādimān syāditi prasañjanameva kriyata iti cettatrāpyāha atadupādhitvā diti /
analyzed: tarhi ajñāna ādimān syāt iti prasañjanam eva kriyate iti ced tatra api āha a tad upādhi tvāt iti
tad pratyayasya aham iti pratyayasya
a tad upādhi tvāt ca ajñāna kāraṇaka tva abhāvat ca iti arthaḥ
āpādya āpādakayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāve sati hi āpādanam yujyate
na atra saḥ sti tad niyāmaka hetu hetumat bhāva ādi abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
ajñāna upādhiḥ iti bahuvrīhiḥ ajñānam upādhiḥ prayojakam yasya iti
vāmadeva ādīnām iti ādi padena mahādeva ādiḥ grāhyaḥ
a tad pratyaya iti prācīna mudrita pāṭhaḥ tu aśuddhaḥ
etad pratyaya iti vā
ahaṃpratyaya iti vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate
aham eva ca iti rudra vākyam atharvaśirasi
nivṛtta sa vāsanā avidyā doṣāṇām api ahaṃpratyaya darśanāt na asya ajñāna upādhi tvam saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ
aham annam ityādi mukta anusandhāna vākyam api atra anusandheyam
nanu eteṣām bādhita anuvṛtti rūpaḥ haṃpratyayaḥ iti atra api āha tathā iti
avidyā asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ pañca kleśāḥ
kleśa grahaṇam karma vipāka āśayānām upalakṣaṇam

original: kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣar iśvara iti hi yogatantre prasiddham /
analyzed: kleśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ iśvaraḥ iti hi yoga tantre prasiddham

original: sarvadā sarvathāvidyārahitasyeśvarasyāhamiti svātmani pratyayo nāvidyādimūlaḥ saṃbhavediti hārdam /
analyzed: sarvadā sarvathā avidyā rahitasya īśvarasya aham iti svātmani pratyayaḥ na avidyā ādi mūlaḥ saṃbhavet iti hārdam
sṛṣṭi prāc kāle haṅkāra ādi upādheḥ abhāvāt tadānīntanaḥ haṃpratyayaḥ nā īśvarasya para upādhi prayuktaḥ
kintu sva rūpa prayuktaḥ eva iti pradarśanāya sṛṣṭi saṅkalpa vākya upādānam
rūpa pāmarśī hanta aham iti ahaṃśabdaḥ
mukta prāpya para svarūpa vācī yasmāt iti gītā vākye bhagavataḥ haṃ śabdaḥ

original: naca sopādhirīśvaro 'ntaryāmī muktaprāpyo vā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sa upādhiḥ īśvaraḥ ntaryāmī mukta prāpyaḥ vā bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: tathā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgaratārakaṃ śuddhameva svarūpaṃ bhagavato 'hamiti nirdiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaha mityatra /
analyzed: tathā mṛtyu saṃsāra sāgara tārakam śuddham eva svarūpam bhagavataḥ ham iti nirdiṣṭam teṣām aham iti atra
nahi svayam sa upādhiḥ itara upādhi mocana samarthaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
pitṛ tva rakṣaka tva ādi abhiprāyam ca aham bīja pradaḥpite ti
aham śabditam jagat kāraṇa svarūpam na ajñāna upahitam
na vā jñāna mātram

original: kintu sarvajñamiti jñāpanāya copāttaṃ vedāham iti vacanam /
analyzed: kintu sarvajñam iti jñāpanāya ca upāttam veda aham iti vacanam
na ca eṣām niṣkṛṣṭa sva rūpa viṣayāṇām ahaṃśabdānām bahūnām amukhya tvam yuktam
kintu pratyaktva pravṛtti nimittaka tvāt mukhya tva mahat tvena svarūpa bhāna prayukta tvam eva ca iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvevamahambhāvasyā'tmasvarūpatve 'haṅkārasya kṣetrāntarbhāvavacanaṃ tyājyatvapratipādanaṃ ca gītāsthaṃ kathamityatrā'ha evaṃ ce ti /
analyzed: nanu evam ahambhāvasya ātma svarūpa tve haṅkārasya kṣetra antarbhāva vacanam tyājya tva pratipādanam ca gītā stham katham iti atra āha evam ca iti
āvyaktika pariṇāma bhedena pradhāna pariṇāma mahat pariṇāmena ahaṅkāreṇa
an aham aham kriyate nena iti ahaṅkāraḥ
karaṇam ca mānasam

original: tathā cānahami dehe 'hamabhimānaheturanātmani ātmabhramaheturahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrāntargatatvenopadiṣṭa iti phalitam /
analyzed: tathā ca dehe ham abhimāna hetuḥ anātmani ātma bhrama hetuḥ ahaṅkāraḥ kṣetra antargata tvena upadiṣṭaḥ iti phalitam

original: atha ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpam iti tyājyatvenoktasyāhaṅkārasyābhijanādinimittadurabhimānamūlagarvarūpatvamāha bahumantavye ti /
analyzed: atha ahaṅkāram balam darpam iti tyājya tvena uktasya ahaṅkārasya abhijana ādi nimitta durabhimāna mūla garva rūpa tvam āha bahu mantavye ti
an ahamaham kriyate iti ca atra vyutpattiḥ

original: cvyarthamanantarbhāvya tu vyutpanno 'haṅkāra iti ātmani ahaṃ buddhivācīti vivekaḥ /

original: sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyo rityevaṃ hi teṣāṃ pratijñā /
