original: naca pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ vā bhedasyā'parokṣye tvapekṣitavyam,
analyzed: na ca pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣa tvam dṛśya tvam vā bhedasya āparokṣye tu apekṣitavyam
siddhi mātreṇa tad upapattau aprayojaka tvena tad viśeṣasya anākṣepāt

original: anavabhāsamāne 'pi pratiyogini bhāvāḥ svarūpata eva vilakṣaṇāḥ pratyakṣyanta iti sarvalokasvasākṣikametat /
analyzed: an avabhāsamāne pi pratiyogini bhāvāḥ svarūpataḥ eva vilakṣaṇāḥ pratyakṣyante iti sarva loka sva sākṣikam etat

original: nanu jīvato bhedapratyakṣasya śirasi padanidhānena sahopalambhaniyamasyābhedena pratibandhagrahaṇamiti kathamiva tatastadvādhasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: nanu jīvataḥ bheda pratyakṣasya śirasi pada nidhānena saha upalambha niyamasya abhedena pratibandha grahaṇam iti katham iva tatas tad vādha saṃbhavaḥ
tathā asati hi jvālā bheda anumānam api tad ekatva pratyabhijñayā apodyeta
a viśeṣa jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: tatra hi kḷptakāraṇadoṣānuvṛttau satyāṃ jāyamāno 'parokṣāvabhāso na niravadyapratyakṣapūrvakamanumānaṃ bādhitumarhati /
analyzed: tatra hi kḷpta kāraṇa doṣa anuvṛttau satyām parokṣa avabhāsaḥ na niravadya pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānam bādhitum arhati

original: tathāhi-aciranirvāpitāropiteṣvekavartibhāgavartiṣu bahuṣudīpeṣu tadbhedādarśinaḥ susadṛśatayā sa evāyamiti smṛtirupajāyate iti dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: tathā hi acira nirvāpita āropiteṣu eka varti bhāga vartiṣu bahuṣu dīpeṣu tad bheda adarśinaḥ su sadṛśa tayā saḥ eva ayam iti smṛtiḥ upajāyate iti dṛṣṭam
atas nyatra api apratibandha puṣkala kāraṇa krama upanipātāt avayava viśleṣāt ca su sadṛśa nirantara pravṛtta pradīpa pravāha ālambanā eva tathā matiḥ iti niścīyate
tathā eka nānātva pratyayaḥ svatas prāpta indriya vṛtti viparyaya prayuktaḥ sama samaya upajāyamāna aneka anavadya pratyakṣa pratikṣipta viṣayaḥ ca dvi candra ādau
dṛṣṭaḥ iti na asau tatra ekatva anumānam abhibhavitum prabhavati
na ca evam iha jñātṛ jñāna jñeya viveka sākṣātkārī pratyayaḥ iti pratiruṇaddhi eva ayam iha abheda anumāna udaya prasaktim
na ca upalabdhi sāhitya niyamāt eva tathātvam atra anumeyam iti yuktam
vipakṣe bādhaka anupalabdheḥ
saṃvid adhīna siddhi tayā api tathā niyama upapatteḥ
an aindriyika tvena ca tad vṛtti viparyayasya akiñcitkara tvāt
yogya anupalambha parākṛta tvāt ca bādhaka pratyayasya
api ca viṣaya siddhiḥ hi saṃvid
sā ca svayam prakāśā iti avivādaḥ
tena avarjanīyaḥ tathā niyamaḥ
na ca bhedaḥ pi siddhim antareṇa sidhyet iti anunmattena yuktam āpādayitum iti alam anena anubhava parāhata mata ati vyākulīkaraṇena
iti saugata abhimata grāhya grāhaka vikalpa pratyuddhāra nirākaraṇam

original: aprakāśātmanaśca nīlādeḥ prakāśa ityanubhavasiddhatvānna samarthanāntaraṃ prārthayate /
analyzed: aprakāśa ātmanaḥ ca nīla ādeḥ prakāśaḥ iti anubhava siddha tvāt na samarthana antaram prārthayate
ātmā tu prakāśa svabhāvaḥ eva
na ca tāvatā ajñāna tvam
svatantra tvāt
paratantram āgantu yāvat artha indriya sannikarṣa ādi kāraṇa sannidhānam avatiṣṭhamānam artha avacchinna rūpam jñānam iti prāk eva avocāma

original: ātmā tu svatantro jñātā ahamiti pratyātmaṃ prathate /
analyzed: ātmā tu svatantraḥ jñātā aham iti pratyātmam prathate
yadi punar īdṛśaḥ pi ayam ananya adhīna siddhi tayā jñānam abhilapyate
abhilapyatām kāmam
tathā api jñāna vat eva idam jñānam
na jñapti mātra tayā
iti advaiti abhimata grāhya grāhaka vikalpa pratyuddhāra nirākaraṇam

original: ata eva hi cchandogāḥ-'atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā' ityādyāmananti /
analyzed: atas eva hi chandogāḥ atha yaḥ veda idam jighrāṇi iti saḥ ātmā ityādi āmananti

original: tathā 'katama ātmā' iti praśnapūrvakamidameva lakṣaṇamāmananti vājasaneyinaḥ 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' iti /
analyzed: tathā katamaḥ ātmā iti praśna pūrvakam idam eva lakṣaṇam āmananti vājasaneyinaḥ yaḥ yam vijñāna mayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdi antar jyotiḥ puruṣaḥ iti

original: atra hi yo 'yaṃ sarvalokānubhavasiddho vividhaviṣayavedanapracuraḥ prāṇeṣu prerakatayā sthito hṛdayāyatane antarjyotiḥ ahamiti pratyaktvena
analyzed: atra hi yaḥ yam sarva loka anubhava siddhaḥ vividha viṣaya vedana pracuraḥ prāṇeṣu preraka tayā sthitaḥ hṛdaya āyatane antar jyotiḥ aham iti pratyaktvena
sa puruṣaḥ iti yathā uditam eva ātma svarūpam upadiśyate

original: 'eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ' ityātharvaṇāḥ /
analyzed: eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñāna ātmā puruṣaḥ iti ātharvaṇāḥ

original: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāditi' 'na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām'
analyzed: tathā vijñātāram are kena vijānīyāt iti na paśyaḥ mṛtyum paśyati na rogam na uta duḥkha tām

original: 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ nopajanaṃ smarannidaṃ śarīram' 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśakalāḥ
analyzed: saḥ uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ na upajanam smaran idam śarīram evam eva asya paridraṣṭuḥ imāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ
puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣam prāpya astam gacchanti tasmāt ha etasmāt manaḥ mayāt anyaḥ ntara
ātmā vijñāna mayaḥ ityādyāḥ

original: 'satyaṃ jñāna' mityatrāpi brahmalakṣaṇanirdeśe jñānaśabdo na jñānamātravacanaḥ ;
analyzed: satyam jñāna miti atra api brahma lakṣaṇa nirdeśe jñāna śabdaḥ na jñāna mātra vacanaḥ
api tu tadvat vacanaḥ
tad vacana tve iti ādi udātta tva prasakteḥ
anta udāttaḥ ca ayam jñāna śabdaḥ
matvarthīya a c pratyaya anta tve tathātvam ghaṭate
na anyathā iti etat paramātma nirūpaṇe ati nipuṇam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ

original: aitareyopaniṣadapi 'prajñānaṃ brahye'tyuktvā 'sa etena prājñenātmanā' iti prakṛṣṭajñānavantameveśvaraṃ darśayati /
analyzed: aitareya upaniṣad api prajñānam brahyā iti uktvā saḥ etena prājñena ātmanā iti prakṛṣṭa jñānavantam eva īśvaram darśayati
tat siddham jñātā eva ayam ātmā iti
iti deha ādi vilakṣaṇa pratyagātma svarūpa nirūpaṇa prakaraṇam

original: kiṃ punarasmin dehādivyatirekiṇi cetane pratyagātmani pramāṇam? / anu
analyzed: kim punar asmin deha ādi vyatirekiṇi cetane pratyagātmani pramāṇam anu
mānam iti kṣapādaḥ
yat āha icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam iti
kim amīṣām ātmanā avinābhāvaḥ dhūma dhvaja viśeṣeṇa iva dhūma viśeṣasya dṛṣṭaḥ
hanta evam tatas eva tad pramiteḥ kim anumānena
mā abhūt viśeṣataḥ darśanam
sāmānyatas tu bhaviṣyati
tathā hi icchā ādayaḥ kārya tva anitya tva guṇa tva ādibhiḥ śabda ādayaḥ iva āśritatayā anumīyante
yaḥ ca eṣām āśrayaḥ saḥ ātmā
guṇa tvam ca pariśeṣāt
na sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya abhāvāḥ anitya tvāt
na dravyam karma vā
vyāpaka dravya samavāyāt iti
viśeṣa guṇa tvam ca anitya tve sati asmat ādi eka indriya grāhya tva niyamāt rūpa ādi vat

original: evamāśrayamātramupasthāpayanto 'nvayavyatirekiṇo hetavaḥ dravyāntaraguṇatvaṃ ca pratyācakṣāṇaiḥ kevalavyatirekisādhanairātmagocaratayā niyamyante
analyzed: evam āśraya mātram upasthāpayantaḥ nvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ hetavaḥ dravya antara guṇa tvam ca pratyācakṣāṇaiḥ kevala vyatireki sādhanaiḥ ātma gocara tayā niyamyante
tathā hi bhavati icchā ādayaḥ na mahābhūta guṇāḥ
sva ātmanaḥ eva pratyakṣa tvāt
a bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt hā
ye bhūta guṇāḥ te sva ātma para ātma pratyakṣāḥ bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣāḥ ca
yathā rūpa ādayaḥ
na tathā icchā ādayaḥ iti na tad guṇāḥ
diś kāla manāṃsi punar na viśeṣa guṇavanti

original: nāpi tadguṇānāṃ pratyakṣatvamiti na teṣāmapi guṇāḥ /
analyzed: na api tad guṇānām pratyakṣa tvam iti na teṣām api guṇāḥ
akāraṇa guṇa pūrva tvāt ayāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt ityādayaḥ śarīra viśeṣa guṇa tva pratiṣedha hetavaḥ prācīnāḥ ca atra anukraṣṭavyāḥ

original: tenecchādayo na śarīraguṇāḥ tadguṇabhāvāpavādapramāṇavattve sati guṇatvāt /
analyzed: tena icchā ādayaḥ na śarīra guṇāḥ tad guṇa bhāva apavāda pramāṇavat tve sati guṇa tvāt
ye yathā ukta sādhyāḥ na bhavanti
te yathā ukta sādhanāḥ api na bhavanti
yathā rūpa ādayaḥ
yathā ukta sādhanāḥ punar icchā ādayaḥ iti yathā ukta sādhyāḥ eva iti

original: vimatipadāspadebhyaḥ śarīrādibhyor'thāntaraguṇā icchādaya iti vā pratijñā /
analyzed: vimati pada āspadebhyaḥ śarīra ādibhyaḥ artha antara guṇāḥ icchā ādayaḥ iti vā pratijñā
yathā uktaḥ eva hetuḥ
udāharaṇam ca prayoktavyam

original: sāmānyena vānvayaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ-yo yadguṇabhāvāpavādakapramāṇavattve sati guṇaḥ,
analyzed: sāmānyena vā anvayaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ yaḥ yad guṇa bhāva apavādaka pramāṇavat tve sati guṇaḥ
sa tatortha antarasya guṇaḥ
yathā pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti ākāśa siddhi vat ātma siddhiḥ iti
iti vilakṣaṇa ātmanaḥ ānumānika tva pakṣa nirūpaṇam
idam api na samīcīnam iti eke
tathā hi anvaya vyatireki hetubhiḥ deha ādi sādhāraṇam āśraya mātram avagamitam
na ca tāvatā ātma siddhiḥ
kevala vyatirekī tu sādhana daśām eva na āsādayati
sapakṣa anvaya virahāt
asādhāraṇa vat
na ca evam kevala anva
vipakṣa vyatireka darśana vikala tayā sādhāraṇa vat asādhana tvam
deśa kāla ādi śaṅgita upādhi vigame pi anvaya darśanena sādhya anvita svabhāva tayā pariniścita tvāt

original: naca sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvadarśanamātreṇa sādhyānvitasvabhāvatvaṃ śakyaṃ niścetum /
analyzed: na ca sādhana abhāve sādhya abhāva darśana mātreṇa sādhya anvita svabhāva tvam śakyam niścetum
abhāvasya ananta deśa vyāpitayā anavayavena grahaṇasya eva duṣkara tvāt
kalayā api anyatravṛttau saṃbandhe niyama asaṃbhavāt
sandeha grasta tvāt ca kim sādhana abhāva prayuktaḥ sādhya abhāvaḥ
kim vā nimitta antara prayuktaḥ iti
pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antara guṇa tva pratijñā api dravya antara aprasiddheḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇā
iti naiyāyika abhimata ātma anumāna nirāsaḥ
etena sāṅkhya udīrita sādhana bhedāḥ api apoditāḥ veditavyāḥ saṅghāta para artha tva ādayaḥ
tathā ca tān eva tāvat āditas vyākurmahe
saṅgāt a para artha tvāt triguṇa ādi viparyayāt adhiṣṭhānāt
puruṣaḥ sti bhoktṛ bhāvāt kaivalya artham pravṛtteḥ ca
ayam arthaḥ deha indriya ādayaḥ para arthāḥ
pratyakṣam ca śarīrasya saṅghāta tvam
bhūtānām ca
avyakta mahat ahaṅkāra indriyāṇām ca sukha duḥkha moha ātma tayā tathātvam anumeyam tadvat eva
na ca indriyāṇām āhaṅkārika tvasya abhyupetasya
sādhya ntva abhimata pārārthya dharmasya ca asaṃhata parārtha tvasya anyathātva āpādanāt ubhaya viśeṣa viruddha tvam hetoḥ

original: ahaṅkārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānena ” devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ ” ityādyāgamabalena prakāśalāghavaguṇānvayena
analyzed: ahaṅkāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānena devāḥ vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ ityādi āgama balena prakāśa lāghava guṇa anvayena
ca vaikārika abhidhāna sāttvika ahaṅkāra bheda yoni tvasya indriyāṇām pramāṇa siddhasya apavāda anupapatteḥ
ātmanaḥ tu saṅghāta tve tasya api saṅghāta antara artha tayā anavasthā āpattyā niṣpramāṇaka aneka kalpanā prasaṅgāt
aprayojaka tvāt ca saṅghāta tvasya śeṣi tve
dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa aśeṣa dharma upasthāpane numāna prāmāṇya sya eva asambhava āpatteḥ tad asaṅghāta tvasya ca apracālya tvāt
na ca pramāṇa antara balena anāhaṅkārika tva saṅghāta antarārtha tvayoḥ bādhe bādhitena saṅghāta parārtha tvena api na bhavitavyam
evam ca saṃhata tva vyāpaka avaruddha traiguṇya ādi rahitaḥ saṃhataḥ ātmā siddhaḥ
tathā deha ādayaḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātmaka tayā pareṇa adhiṣṭhīyante
yantra ādibhiḥ iva ratha ādayaḥ api
ca anukūla pratikūla vedanīye sukha duḥkhe bhṛtya bhrātṛvya vat anukūlanīya prati
kūlanīyavatī
dṛśya tvāt deha ādayaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ iva vilakṣaṇa draṣṭṭakāḥ iti
adhiṣṭhātuḥ anukūla pratikūla vedakasya draṣṭuḥ traiguṇya ādi viparyayaḥ pūrvavat eva nirṇetavyaḥ
tathā deha ādeḥ avyakta antasya kṛtsnsya triguṇa ātmaka tayā atyanta duḥkha upaśamana lakṣaṇa mokṣa daśā anupapatteḥ

original: tadarthaṃ ca śāstrāṇāṃ mahādhiyāṃ ca pravṛtterasti dehādivyatirikto 'saṃhataḥ traiguṇyādyasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa iti //
analyzed: tad artham ca śāstrāṇām mahā dhiyām ca pravṛtteḥ asti deha ādi vyatiriktaḥ saṃhataḥ traiguṇya ādi a saṃspṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ iti
iti sāṅkhya abhimata ātma anumāna nirūpaṇam

original: atrāpi saṅghātapārārthyādibhiryadyapi paraḥ ko 'pyadhiṣṭhātā draṣṭā siddhaḥ,
analyzed: atrā api saṅghāta pārārthya ādibhiḥ yadi api paraḥ kaḥ pi adhiṣṭhātā draṣṭā siddhaḥ
tathā api na tasya asaṃhata tva a triguṇa tva ādiḥ abhimata viśeṣaḥ śakya niścayaḥ
tathā hi saṅghātasya saṅghāta antara artha tva niyama darśana balāt āpatantī parāparā saṅghāta kalpanā na doṣāya
kārya tayā iva anādi kāraṇa paramparā parikalpanā
na ca aprayojaka tvam api
asaṅghātasya asaṅgasya aśeṣa vikriyā śūnyasya anādheya atiśaya kūṭastha citi mātra vapuṣaḥ puruṣasya saṅghātam prati paratva anupapatteḥ
tat vi tasya śeṣi bhavati
tat ca tad artham
yat yena upakriyate kriyate vā
yat ca upakaroti karoti vā

original: na ca tathā sāṅkhyapuruṣa iti kataṃ tasya saṅghātaṃ prati paratvam ?
analyzed: na ca tathā sāṅkhya puruṣaḥ iti katam tasya saṅghātam prati paratvam
kathantarām ca saṅghātasya tādarthyam

kāmam manyatām

original: na khalu bālāstalamalinatādimattayā gaganamabhimanyanta iti tasya tathātvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na khalu bālāḥ tala malina tā ādimat tayā gaganam abhimanyante iti tasya tathātvam bhavati

original: api ca tathāvidhabhramo 'pi kasya kathamudayata iti vivecanīyam /

original: yathā'ha tatrabhavān patañjaliḥ ” yadā citireva puruṣaḥ kimatra kena vyapadiśyata ” iti /

original: api ca citisannidhānādhīnāṃ buddhisiddhimabhidadhānaḥ kathamiva tadajaḍimānaṃ pratijānīyāt?
analyzed: api ca citi sannidhāna adhīnām buddhi siddhim abhidadhānaḥ katham iva tad a jaḍimānam pratijānīyāt
na ca citi svāntayoḥ bimba pratibimba ādhāra abhimatayoḥ anyatarasmin api avidyamānasya viṣaya viśeṣa uparakta jñātṛ tva lakṣaṇa dharma bhedasya pratibimbe sambhavaḥ
pratyuktaḥ ca ayam pratibimba vādaḥ pracchanna bāhya mata pratyādeśe
yat ucyate nirvikārāya api puṃse tad sannidhi mahima samutthāpita pramāṇa viparyaya ādi vicitra vṛtti bhedam svāntam eva sva vṛttim viṣaya viśeṣān ca upadarśayati
sāmanta cakram iva parākramīyaḥ pratibala vilolana ādi vṛttīḥ svāmine
tatas sākṣī bhoktā ca apadiśyate
rājā iti vikramī vijayī ca iti
tat anupapannam
draṣṭre hi darśanīyam dṛśyate

original: naca dṛśimātrātmavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ tadupajīvināṃ ca pracchannānāṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ vāstavamasti /
analyzed: na ca dṛśi mātra ātma vādinām sāṃkhyānām tad upajīvinām ca pracchannānām draṣṭṛ tvam vāstavam asti
na ca kālpanikena śeṣi tva sambhavaḥ
kalpanā api na sambhavati iti uktam eva

original: rājā tu sāmānyato viśeṣato vā teṣu karmasvamātyān niyuñjānaḥ tatphalamaiśvaryādi
analyzed: rājā tu sāmānyatas viśeṣataḥ vā teṣu karmasu amātyān niyuñjānaḥ tad phalam aiśvarya ādi
ca aśruvānaḥ sva svāmi bhāva hetu kraya pratigraha janana ādi vyāpāra yogī na niṣkriyasya anādheya atiśayasya
puṃsaḥ nidarśanam iti yat kiñcid etat
iti kāpila abhimata ātma anumāna nirasanam
sthūlaḥ ham gaccha abhi aham ityādi pratyakṣa mṛdita viṣaya tayā prasiddhā eva atīta kāla tā
vyatoḥ eka anumāna bhedānām iti ānumānikīm api ātma siddhim aśraddadhānāḥ śrautīm eva tām śrotiyāḥ saṅgirante
śrutayaḥ hi sākṣāt eva ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi vyatirekam ādarśayanti

original: 'sa eṣa neti neti' 'akāyamavraṇamasnāviraṃ śuddhamapāpaviddham' 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa na iti na iti akāyam avraṇam a snāviram śuddham a pāpa viddham yonim anye prapadyante śarīra tvāya dehinaḥ

original: sthāṇumanye' 'na jāyate mriyate vā kadācit' 'jīvāpetaṃ vāvakiledaṃ mriyate' 'na hi vai saśarīrasya sataḥ
analyzed: sthāṇumanye na jāyate mriyate vā kadācid jīva apetam mriyate na hi vai sa śarīrasya sataḥ
priya apriyayoḥ apahatiḥ asti

original: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: aśarīram vāva santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ ityādyāḥ
kāla antara bhāvi svarga ādi sādhana vidhayaḥ ca ākṣipanti deha ādi vyatiriktam nityam cetanam iti śruti tad anupapatti pramāṇakaḥ yam pratyagātmā iti
iti vilakṣaṇa ātmanaḥ śāstra eka pramāṇaka tva pakṣa nirūpaṇam

original: nanu hitāhitaprāptiparihāramātraparasyā'mnāyasya śirasi kimiti mahānayaṃ bhāraḥ prakṣipyate?
analyzed: nanu hita ahita prāpti parihāra mātra parasya āmnāyasya śirasi kim iti mahān ayam bhāraḥ prakṣipyate
anumāna āgama ādi aśeṣa pramāṇa mūla bhūtena pratyakṣeṇa eva hi enam pratipadyāmahe
mama idam śarīram

original: idamahaṃ jānāmīti ghaṭādidṛśyebhya ivāyaṃ draṣṭā dehādapi pṛthagbhūtaḥ pratyakṣaṃ parisphurati /
analyzed: idam aham jānāmi iti ghaṭa ādi dṛśyebhyaḥ iva ayam draṣṭā dehāt api pṛthak bhūtaḥ pratyakṣam parisphurati
iti ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tva pakṣa upakṣepaḥ
mā evam vocaḥ
indriya artha sannikarṣa jam hi vijñānam pratyakṣam

original: na cendriyāṇi rūpādivyatirekiṇi niratiśayasūkṣme pratīci parāgartha iva sannikarṣeṇa jñānaṃ janayitumarhanti /
analyzed: na ca indriyāṇi rūpa ādi vyatirekiṇi niratiśaya sūkṣme pratīci parāc arthe iva sannikarṣeṇa jñānam janayitum arhanti
yathā āmnāyate parāñciravāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūḥ iti
aprayojaka tvam eva upapādayati ki m ityādinā sārdha ślokena
kim nīla ādiḥ viṣayaḥ svayam prakāśa tvāt sva vyavahārāya prakāśam sva prakāśakam jñānam ākāṅkṣate

original: utāho tadabhedataḥ-saṃvidabhinnatvāt prakāśamanurudhyate iti saṃdehānnīlatadviyorabhedo 'śakyanirṇaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: uta aho tad abhedataḥ saṃvid abhinna tvāt prakāśam anurudhyate iti saṃdehāt nīla tad viyoḥ abhedaḥ śakya nirṇayaḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃvid anurodhi tvam nīla ādeḥ saṃvidā saha eva upalabhyamāna tva lakṣaṇam

original: idaṃ ca kiṃ saṃvidabhedaprayuktamuta svaprakāśe nīlāderjaḍasya svaprakāśasaṃvidapekṣāprayuktamiti viśaye yāvadabhedaprayuktatvanirṇayo na bhavati,
analyzed: idam ca kim saṃvid abheda prayuktam uta sva prakāśe nīla ādeḥ jaḍasya sva prakāśa saṃvid apekṣā prayuktam iti viśaye yāvat abheda prayukta tva nirṇayaḥ na bhavati
na tāvat asya abheda sādhaka tvam
abheda prayukta tva nirṇāyakam ca na asti
tathā ca aprayojaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ
syāt vā asaha upalambha niyamaḥ bodhyayoḥ evā abheda sādhakaḥ
na tu buddhi bodhyayoḥ buddhi boddhroḥ vā iti āha bodhya sthaḥ iti
buddhīnām boddhṝṇām vā saha upalabhyamānānām na abhedaḥ
buddhasya baddha tva āpātāt
na api buddhi bodhyayoḥ buddhi ddhroḥ vā
buddheḥ jaḍa tva ādi prasaṅgāt satya mithyā arthayoḥ aikya prasaṅgāt ca

original: kintu bodhyayoreva tathābhūtayorabheda iṣyatāṃ guṇaguṇiprabhṛtyoḥ kathañcidityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kintu bodhyayoḥ eva tathābhūtayoḥ abhedaḥ iṣyatām guṇa guṇi prabhṛtyoḥ kathañcid iti arthaḥ
buddhi boddhṛ gaḥ iti tu prakṛta abhiprāyeṇa
yat vā bodhyayoḥ eva saha upalambha niyamaḥ saṃbhavati
na punar buddhi boddhadhroḥ
buddhim antarā api boddhuḥ prakāśāt svāpa ādau iti arthaḥ
jñāna jñātroḥ abheda sādhane pratyakṣa bādhita tvam api āha spaṣṭaḥ ca iti

original: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti hi sphuṭo jñeyajñātṛjñānānāṃ bhedapratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti hi sphuṭaḥ jñeya jñātṛ jñānānām bheda pratibhāsaḥ
tad vādhaḥ iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate na ced ti
jñāna viṣaya tvam vā pratiyoginaḥ tad bheda pratyakṣe kāraṇa tvena apekṣitam

original: prakṛte saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena svayaṃprakāśatvāttadbhedapratyakṣaṃ jñātari na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛte saṃvidaḥ jñāna antara agocara tvena svayam prakāśa tvāt tad bheda pratyakṣam jñātari na saṃbhavati iti śaṅkituḥ āśayaḥ
parihati siddhi mātreṇa i ti
pratiyoginaḥ saṃvidaḥ siddhi mātreṇa prakāśa mātreṇa
tad upapattau saṃvid bheda pratyakṣa upapattau
pratyakṣa ādi jñāna antara adhīnasya anākṣepāt ākṣepa ayogāt iti arthaḥ
ayam bhāvaḥ anyonya abhāva pratyakṣe dhikaraṇasya pratyakṣam eva apekṣitam
pratiyoginaḥ prakāśa mātram ca
na tu pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣam
stambhe piśāca bhedasya apratyakṣa tva āpatteḥ

original: pratiyoginaḥ prakṛte vedanasya prakāśastu svata evāsti /
analyzed: pratiyoginaḥ prakṛte vedanasya prakāśaḥ tu svatas eva asti
tatas eva veditari tad bheda pratyakṣe nā anupapattiḥ iti
vastutas tad tad asādhāraṇa ākāraḥ eva itara tādātmya dhī virodhi tvena tasya tasya itarasmāt bheda rūpaḥ

original: sa ca pratiyogyanavabhāse 'pi bhāsata evotyāha anavabhāsamāna iti /
analyzed: sa ca pratiyogi anavabhāse bhāsate eva iti āha anavabhāsamānaḥ iti

original: tathā ca jñāturahantvena bhānameva saṃvidbhedagrahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca jñātuḥ ahantvena bhānam eva saṃvid bheda grahaṇam iti bhāvaḥ
tad bhinna tva vyavahāre punar pratiyogi parāmarśa sahakṛtam asādhāraṇa ākāra jñānam hetuḥ iti bodhyam
sarva loke ti
etena bhedasya pratyakṣam na saṃbhavati
kṣaṇikasya pratyakṣasya pratiyogi grahaṇa pūrvaka bheda grahaṇa paryantam anavasthānāt
yugapad pratiyogi abhāva adhikaraṇa grahe tu samūha ālambana vat upaśleṣa viśeṣa asiddhi prasaṅgāt
atas bhrama rūpaḥ eva bheda grahaḥ iti apāstam

original: tattadasādhāraṇa dharmasyaivetarabhedarūpatvāttasya ca dharmiṇi prathamakṣaṇa eva gṛhīteḥ /
analyzed: tad tad asādhāraṇa dharmasya eva itara bheda rūpa tvāt tasya ca dharmiṇi prathama kṣaṇe eva gṛhīteḥ

original: ata evāpūrvavastudarśane vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ kaścana padārtha iti bhedapratītirlokasammatā svānubhavasiddhā ca nāpahnavārhā iti sarvalokasvasākṣika  #
analyzed: atas eva apūrva vastu darśane vilakṣaṇaḥ yam kaścana padārthaḥ iti bheda pratītiḥ loka sammatā sva anubhava siddhā ca na apahnava arhā iti
m iti uktam

tathā asati pratyakṣasya anumāna bādhaka tve
apodyeta bādhyeta

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- bhinnatvena gṛhyamāṇayoreva hi sahopalambhaniyamo 'bhedavyāpyatvena gṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ bhinna tvena gṛhyamāṇayoḥ eva hi saha upalambha niyamaḥ bheda vyāpya tvena gṛhītaḥ

original: tena cābhedānumāne pratyakṣe bhedagrahaṇāṃśobhramalakṣaṇa iti niścīyate /
analyzed: tena ca abheda anumāne pratyakṣe bheda grahaṇa aṃśaḥ bhrama lakṣaṇaḥ iti niścīyate
na ca upajīvya virodhaḥ
pratyakṣa siddha vastu svarūpasya vyāpti graha upayoginaḥ bhyupagamāt
bhedasya ca vyāpti graha anupayukta tvāt iti
pariharati a viśeṣa jñaḥ iti
dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭāntikayoḥ vaiṣamyam na jānāsi iti arthaḥ
tat eva upapādayati

original: tatre ti / na pratyakṣatvamanumānatvaṃ vā bādhyatve bādhakatve vā prayojakam /
analyzed: tatra iti na pratyakṣa tvam anumāna tvam vā bādhya tve bādhaka tve vā prayojakam
kintu doṣa mūla tvam adoṣa mūla tvam ca eva tathā
tathā ca yathā jvālā bheda anumāna mada uśa mūlam bādhakam
jvālā aikya pratyakṣam tu sādṛśya doṣa mūlam bādhyam bhavati
na evam prakṛte jñātṛ jñeya jñāna bheda grahasya doṣa mūla tvam iti samudita āśayaḥ
jvālā aikya pratyakṣe kḷpta kāraṇa doṣa anuvṛttim upapādayati tathā hi ityādinā
acira praśamita tva punar uddīpita tva uktyā jvālayoḥ vāstava bhedaḥ jñāpyate
tad adarśanam eka varti vṛtti tva jñānam ca aikya bhrame tayoḥ hetuḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: nirvāpaṇapunaruddīpanadraṣṭuśca jvālayorbhedaprtyakṣaṃ vartata iti tena bādhitatvamapi nirvāpaṇādyadraṣṭṛniṣṭha jvālayokyapratyakṣe viva
analyzed: nirvāpaṇa punaruddīpana draṣṭuḥ ca jvālayoḥ bheda prtyakṣam vartate iti tena bādhita tvam api nirvāpaṇa ādya draṣṭṛ niṣṭha jvāla yokya pratyakṣe vivartate
taila vartī avayava agni saṃyogasya dīpa hetoḥ anyānyatayā jvālā bhedaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ nirvāpaṇa sthale pi
kāraṇa dhārā anuvṛtti balāt ca kārya dhārā anuvṛttiḥ
pūrva pūrva jvālāyāḥ tu kāraṇa nivṛttyā nivṛttiḥ eva
tad hetuḥ hi taila vartī avayavi śeṣa agni saṃyogaḥ
agneḥ āśraya āśi tvāt varti avayava viśeṣa nāśe tad agni saṃyogasya nāśaḥ hi āvaśyakaḥ

original: evaṃ pūrvottaradīpajvālayorbhede siddhe sajātīyadīpadhārāyāṃ bhedāgrahātsādṛśyarūpadoṣadarśanāccaikyabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: evam pūrva uttara dīpa jvālayoḥ bhede siddhe sajātīya dīpa dhārāyām bheda agrahāt sādṛśya rūpa doṣa darśanāt ca aikya bhramaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nānā bhūte aikya bhramam pratyakṣa rūpam udāhṛtya ekasmin nānātva bhramam api pratyakṣa rūpam udāharati tathā eke ti
svābhāvika cākṣuṣa raśmi prasaraṇasya viparyayaḥ dvaitībhāvaḥ ṅguli avaṣṭambha ādi prayuktaḥ candra dvi tva bhrame doṣaḥ
asya ca sama samaye tyādinā ucyate

original: dṛṣṭāntitāt dārṣṭāntike vaiṣamyamupapādayati na caivam iti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntitāt dārṣṭāntike vaiṣamyam upapādayati na ca evam iti
jñātṛ jñāna jñeya bheda nirūpita laukika viṣayitā śālī ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti sākṣātkāraḥ doṣa mūlaḥ
abheda pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ vā nā eva dṛśyate
tad abheda anumāna bādhaka tvam susthitam iti bhāvaḥ

original: viparītaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyatrāha na copalabdhī ti /
analyzed: viparītam kasmāt na bhavati iti atra āha na ca upalabdhi iti
tathātvam jñāna abhinna tvam jñātṛ jñeyayoḥ
pūrva uktam aprayojaka tvam smārayati vipakṣaḥ iti

original: vipakṣe bādhakatarkavirahādvyāptyasiddhyāsiddhamabhedānumānaṃ na jñānajñātṛjñeyabhedapratyakṣe bādhakatvena śakyaśaṅkamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vipakṣe bādhaka tarka virahāt vyāpti asiddhyā asiddham abheda anumānam na jñāna jñātṛ jñeya bheda pratyakṣe bādhaka tvena śakya śaṅkam iti bhāvaḥ
jñāna ādi bheda grahaḥ indriya vṛtti prasṛti bheda rūpa doṣa mūlaḥ bhavet iti atra āha anaindriyika tvena iti
bāhya indriya agrāhya tvena jñāna jñātroḥ tad bheda grahasya na indriya vṛtti bheda prayukta tvam saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atra bādhakapratyayo 'pi nāsti candradvitvabhrama ivetyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
analyzed: atra bādhaka pratyayaḥ na asti candra dvi tva bhramaḥ iva iti āha yogya anupalambhe ti

original: na caivamihe ti vākyābhipretamanena vākyadvayena vivṛtam /
analyzed: na ca evam iha iti vākya abhipretam anena vākya dvayena vivṛtam

original: saṃvidadhīne tivākyoktaṃ prapañcayati api ce ti /
analyzed: saṃvid adhīne ti vākya uktam prapañcayati api ca iti
tathā niyamaḥ saṃvidā saha upalambha niyamaḥ
avarjanīyaḥ abhedasya anupagame durvāraḥ

original: nanu saṃvidamantarāpi viṣayādiḥ sidhyatvityatrāha na ca bhedo 'pī ti /

bhedaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhedaḥ
siddhiṃjñānam
apasiddhāntaḥ ca evam kathane iti bhāvaḥ
yat vā saha upalambha niyamasya abheda sādhaka tve
sva vyāghātam api āha na ca bheda ūpī ti

original: bhedapratibhāso 'pi saṃvidaiva vācya iti niruktahetorbhedasyāpi saṃvidabhede bhedaghaṭito heturapi na sidhyediti yāvat /
analyzed: bheda pratibhāsaḥ saṃvidā eva vācyaḥ iti nirukta hetoḥ bhedasya api saṃvid abhede bheda ghaṭitaḥ hetuḥ api na sidhyet iti yāvat

original: yadvā bhavadabhimataḥ saṃvidāṃ bhedopi na sidhyediti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: yat vā bhavat abhimataḥ saṃvidām bhedaḥ api na sidhyet iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ pradūṣya pracchannasaugatābhimataṃ prakāśasvabhāvatvamapi dūṣayati aprakāśe  #

ti
aprakāśa ātmanaḥ aprakāśa svabhāvasya jñāna bhinnasya ca
anena jñeyasya jñāna abheda anumāne pratyakṣa bādhaḥ
hetoḥ pakṣe siddhiḥ ca prādarśiṣātām

jñātā jñāna abhinnaḥ prakāśa svabhāva tvāt iti atra tu hetuḥ upagamyate

original: na sādhyamityāha na ca tāvate ti /

kādācitka tvam

avatiṣṭhamānam anuvartamānam dhārā rūpa tayā

original: dhārāvāhikavijñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ mataṃ hi naḥ iti pakṣe tu svarūpata evānuvartamānaṃ yāvadviṣayāntarasaṃcāramiti vivekaḥ /
analyzed: dhārāvāhika vijñānam ekam jñānam matam hi naḥ iti pakṣe tu svarūpataḥ eva anuvartamānam yāvat viṣaya antara saṃcāram iti vivekaḥ
ātma svabhāvam āha ātmā iti
dharmi tvam jñātṛ tvam ahat tvena bhānam ca ātmanaḥ dharmāḥ

original: nanvevaṃ jñānabhinnatve ātmano jñānamiti vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha yadī ti /

tena tathātvam sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpa guṇatraya saṅghāta ātmaka tvam anumeyam kārya rūpeṇa śarīra ādi vat eva iti arthaḥ
saṅghāta tva hetoḥ viruddha tvam śaṅkate na ca indriyāṇām iti
anāhaṅkārika tvena saṅghāta tvasya bhūta bhautikeṣu
saṃhata parārtha tvena ca geha śayyā ādiṣu bhūyas sahacāra dṛṣṭeḥ vyāpteḥ gṛhīta tayā pakṣa antargata indriyāṇām abhimata āhaṅkārika tva viruddhasya anāhaṅkārika tvasya

original: sādhyaghaṭakasya ca parasyābhimatāsaṃhatatvaviruddhasya saṃhatatvasyā'pādakatvādviruddhatvaṃ saṅghātatvahetoriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sādhya ghaṭakasya ca parasya abhimata asaṃhata tva viruddhasya saṃhata tvasya āpādaka tvāt viruddha tvam saṅghāta tva hetoḥ iti bhāvaḥ
hetoḥ ubhaya viśeṣa viruddha tvam ca na iti anvayaḥ
aviruddha tvam upapādayati ahaṅkāre tyādinā

original: ahaṅkāravṛttau satyāmevendriyāṇāṃ manaḥparyantānāṃ vṛtterdarśanāttadabhāve ca svāpe 'darśanādāhaṅkārikatvaṃ teṣāmavasīyate /
analyzed: ahaṅkāra vṛttau satyām eva indriyāṇām manaḥ paryantānām vṛtteḥ darśanāt tad abhāve ca svāpe darśanāt āhaṅkārika tvam teṣām avasīyate
tatra api sattvaṅkārya lāghava prakāśa yogāt sātvika ahaṅkāra kārya tvam iti bhāvaḥ
āgamaḥ ca devāḥ vaikārikāḥ daśa
ekādaśam manaḥ ca iti smṛti rūpaḥ
devāḥ indriyāṇi prakāśa yogāt deva dhiṣṭhita tvāt vā
vaikārikasya sāttvika ahaṅkārasya ime kārya bhūtāḥ iti vaikārikāḥ
apavāda anupapatteḥ bādhana anupapatteḥ
saṅghāta tvasya ānuhaṅkārika tvena na vyāptiḥ
traiguṇya ātmakasya indriya jātasya āhaṅkārika tvena pramāṇa pratipanna tvena anaikāntyāt iti bhāvaḥ
pakṣa viśeṣa viruddha tvam parihṛtya asādhya viśeṣa viruddha tvam pariharati
ātmanaḥ tu iti
aprayojaka tvāt ca iti

original: asaṃhatasyāpyātmanaścetanatvādeva bhoktṛtvasyopapatteḥ bhoktatvalakṣaṇe paratve prādhānye saṅghātatvasyāprayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃhatasya api ātmanaḥ cetana tvāt eva bhoktṛ tvasya upapatteḥ bhoktatva lakṣaṇe paratve prādhānye saṅghāta tvasya aprayojaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ

original: yadi saṅghātatvasya paratve prayojakatvaṃ syāttarhi saṃhataparārthatvena vyāptiḥ sambhavennāma saṅghātatvasya /
analyzed: yadi saṅghāta tvasya paratve prayojaka tvam syāt tarhi saṃhata parārtha tvena vyāptiḥ sambhavet nāma saṅghāta tvasya
vyāpti balāt aneka saṅghāta kalpanā api soḍhavyā bhavet
na ca evam

original: tathā ca saṃhataparārthatve saṅghātatvasya vyāpyatvāsiddhatvamiti hārdam /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃhata parārtha tve saṅghāta tvasya vyāpya tva asiddha tvam iti hārdam
saṅghāta paratvena anumitasya ātmanaḥ saṅghāta tvam yogya anupalabdhi bādhitam ca iti bodhyam

original: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptistu pramāṇāntaravirodhābhāvātprasetsyatītyāha na ca pramāṇāntare ti /
analyzed: saṅghāta tvasya parārtha tvena vyāptiḥ tu pramāṇa antara virodha abhāvāt prasetsyati iti āha na ca pramāṇa antare ti
saṅghāta parārtha tva anumānena ātma asiddhim nigamayati evam ca iti
saṅghāta tva vyāpaka parārtha tva vat sattva ādi guṇatraya tad kārya rahitaḥ iti saṃhata tve tyādeḥ arthaḥ

original: parasya saṃhatatve 'navasthāprasakteḥ traiguṇyaviparyayaḥ atraiguṇyātmakatvarūpo mantavya ityuktam asaṃhata iti /
analyzed: parasya saṃhata tve navasthā prasakteḥ traiguṇya viparyayaḥ a traiguṇya ātmaka tva rūpaḥ mantavyaḥ iti uktam asaṃhataḥ iti
triguṇa ādi viparyayāt iti antaḥ kārikā aṃśaḥ vivṛtaḥ
atha adhiṣṭhānāt iti aṃśam vivṛṇoti tathā deha ādayaḥ iti
sukha duḥkha moha ātmaka tayā a sukha ādi ātmaka sattva ādi saṅghāta rūpa tayā
cetanena
adhiṣṭhīyante kārya anuguṇa tayā preryante
yantra ādibhiḥ sārathi prabhṛtibhiḥ
bhoktṛ bhāvāt iti etat vivṛṇoti api ca anukūle ti
anukūlanīyaḥ anukūla buddhi bhāj
anukūla vedanīyaḥ anukūla tva prakāraka buddhi viṣayaḥ
evam pratikūlanīya pratikūla vedanīyau ūhyau
bhrātṛvyaḥ śatruḥ
bhoktṛ bhāvāt ityasya draṣṭṛ tva para tayā yojana antaram dṛśya tvāt iti
adhiṣṭhātuḥ ityādi
saṅghāta pravṛtteḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ antara adhīna tayā adhiṣṭhātuḥ saṅghāta tve tad pravṛtteḥ api adhiṣṭhātṛ antara adhīna tvam syāt
evam agre pi iti anavasthā prasaṅgāt adhiṣṭhātuḥ asaṅghāta tvam eṣṭavyam

original: evaṃ sukhenānukūlanīyasya duḥkhena pratikūlanīyasya vā bhoktuḥ triguṇatve tasyāpi
analyzed: evam sukhena anukūlanīyasya duḥkhena pratikūlanīyasya vā bhoktuḥ triguṇa tve tasya api
anukūla pratikūla vedanīya tvasya prāpteḥ anukūlanīya pratikūlanīya antara āpādaka tvāt anavasthā prasaṅga
iti a triguṇa tvam eṣṭavyam
deha ādi pakṣaka vilakṣaṇa draṣṭṛ anumānena ca ātmanaḥ deha ādi vailakṣaṇyam api siddham iti bhāvaḥ

original: kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteśce tyaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti tathā dehāde riti /
analyzed: kaivalya artham pravṛtteḥ ca iti aṃśam vivṛṇoti tathā deha ādeḥ iti
atra ayam prayogaḥ kaivalya sādhana pravṛttiḥ kaivalya daśā prāpti yogya ātma tattva jñāna pūrvikā
kaivalya sādhana pravṛtti tvāt
yā yā phala viśeṣa sādhana prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ sā sā tad tad phala prāpti yogya ātma tattva jñāna pūrvikā
yathā svarga sādhana pravṛttiḥ iti

original: dehādeḥ pradhānaparyantasya pariṇāmasvabhāvasya triguṇasya kaivalyānupapattijñānācca vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: deha ādeḥ pradhāna paryantasya pariṇāma svabhāvasya triguṇasya kaivalya anupapatti jñānāt ca vilakṣaṇa ātma siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vilakṣaṇa ātma sādhakatayā sāṅkhyaiḥ upakṣiptam saṅghāta parārtha tva anumānam tāvat dūṣayati
atra api ityādinā
para apare ti
anya anya iti arthaḥ
pūrvāparībhūtā iti vā
para apara saṅghāta iti vā samasta pāṭhaḥ syāt
kārya tayā iva iti
kāryāt kāraṇam anumeyam
kāraṇasya api kādācitka tvena kārya tvāt tad kāraṇam api anyat

original: evamuparyuparīti kāraṇaparamparākalpanā yathā prāmāṇikī na doṣāya,
analyzed: evam upari upari iti kāraṇa paramparā kalpanā yathā prāmāṇikī na doṣāya
evam avinābhāva balāt āpatantī saṅghāta paramparā kalpanā api iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu saṅghātatvasya bhoktṛtvalakṣaṇe paratve 'hetutvānna saṅghātaparārthatvena saṅghātatvasya vyāptigraha ityatrā'ha na ce ti /
analyzed: nanu saṅghāta tvasya bhoktṛ tva lakṣaṇe paratve hetu tvāt na saṅghāta parārtha tvena saṅghāta tvasya vyāpti grahaḥ iti atra āha na ca iti
saṅghāta para tvam tad adhīna atiśaya bhāji sambhavet
tad adhīna atiśayaḥ ca asaṃhate nirlepe nirvikārataḥ eva atiśaya ādhāna anarhe sāṅkhya abhimate puruṣe
na sambhavati iti saṃhatasya eva kasyacid saṅghāta śeṣiṇaḥ numānena siddhiḥ na asaṃhatasya
sāṅkhya mata puruṣasya iti bhāvaḥ
bhoga rūpaḥ pi atiśayaḥ na sāṅkhya puruṣasya sambhavet iti hārdam
etena puruṣaḥ sti bhoktṛ bhāvāt iti api parāstam
dṛśyate ca khaṭvā ādeḥ śarīra artha tvam
śarīrasya ca śarīra antara artha tvam

original: atastadadhīnātiśayabhāktvarūpe tatparatve saṅghātatvasya prayojakatvena tadavacchinnaparārthatvena vyāptigrahaḥ sambhavatyeveti cābhimatam
analyzed: atas tad adhīna atiśaya bhāktva rūpe tad paratve saṅghāta tvasya prayojaka tvena tad avacchinna parārtha tvena vyāpti grahaḥ sambhavati eva iti ca abhimatam
tat hi ti

original: yadyenopakriyate kriyate vā tattasya śeṣi pradhānamaṅgi bhavati,
analyzed: yat yena upakriyate kriyate vā tat tasya śeṣi pradhānam aṅgi bhavati

original: yattūpakaroti karoti vā tattadarthaṃ taccheṣaḥ tadaṅgamityanvayārthaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu upakaroti karoti vā tat tad artham tad śeṣaḥ tat aṅgam iti anvaya arthaḥ
upakriyate atiśayavān kriyate
strakū candana ādinā iva deha ādiḥ
prayāja ādinā iva ca yāga ādiḥ
kriyate niṣpādyate

upakārakam kārakam vā aṅgam iti vivekaḥ
na ca tathā ti
tathā atiśaya ādhāna arhaḥ
sāṅkhya puruṣaḥ kāpila abhimataḥ ātmā

original: nanvanupakāryatve 'pyātmana etairupakṛto 'hamityupakṛtatvabhramalakṣaṇa evopakāro dehādibhiḥ sādhya iti tatparatvamupapadyata iti cettatrāha  #
analyzed: nanu anupakārya tve pi ātmanaḥ etaiḥ upakṛtaḥ ham iti upakṛta tva bhrama lakṣaṇaḥ eva upakāraḥ deha ādibhiḥ sādhyaḥ iti tad paratvam upapadyate iti ced tatra āha
api ca ti
citi śakteḥ caitanya svarūpasya puruṣasya

na bhrāmyati ti

a cit api ti
acetanam api caitanya pratibimba āśraya tayā cetana vat bhāti iti arthaḥ
cit cetana śabdau svayam prakāśa abhiprāyau atra
nīrūpāyāḥ iti

original: chāyāyāḥ kāntilakṣaṇāyā ujjavalarūpavaddharmabhūtāyā nīrūpe caitanye 'sambhavānnīrūpe cāntaḥkaraṇe tatpratiphalanalakṣaṇasaṅkrānterayogādityarthaḥ
analyzed: chāyāyāḥ kānti lakṣaṇāyāḥ ujjavala rūpavat dharma bhūtāyāḥ nīrūpe caitanye sambhavāt nīrūpe ca antaḥkaraṇe tad pratiphalana lakṣaṇa saṅkrānteḥ ayogāt iti arthaḥ

original: rūpavatyeva hi sphaṭikādau japākusumalohitādipratiphalanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: rūpavati eva hi sphaṭika ādau japā kusuma lohita ādi pratiphalanam dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ
śaṅkate chāyā iva iti
na chāyā śabdena mukhyā kāntiḥ vivakṣitā
api tu sādṛśyam
cit sādṛśya āpattiḥ cetanāyamāna tvam iti ced iti arthaḥ
prativakti kaḥ kha lu iti
sādṛśyam kena ākāreṇa iti arthaḥ
atra āha
citi sarūpa tvam iti
vṛtti pariṇāma sāmānya abhāvavat tvena sādṛśyam iti arthaḥ
dūṣayati hantā evam iti

original: bhramādayo hi vṛttayo 'ntaḥkaraṇasya nirvṛttikatve nopapadyanta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bhrama ādayaḥ hi vṛttayaḥ ntaḥkaraṇasya nirvṛttika tve na upapadyante iti arthaḥ
bhrama upapādana artham hi pariṣkriyate cetanāyamāna tvam
tat ced nirvṛttika tva rūpam
nā eva prasaṅgaḥ bhrama ādi udayasya
tathā ca yad artham ayam ārambhaḥ tat kāryam avasāditam iti bhāvaḥ
prakāra antaram śaṅkate cetana tvena iti
jñātṛ tvena iti arthaḥ
pariharati ajaḍa tvam iti
jñātuḥ ahamarthasya ātmanaḥ eva itara anapekṣa prakāśa tva lakṣaṇam ajaḍa tvam sambhavati iti jñātṛ ātma samarthana avasare proktam

original: tathā caivaṃvidhājaḍatvasya jñātṛtvasamānāśrayatvājjñātṛtvenaiva jñātṛtvasamanarthanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca evaṃvidha ajaḍa tvasya jñātṛ tva samāna āśraya tvāt jñātṛ tvena eva jñātṛ tva samanarthanam kṛtam bhavet iti bhāvaḥ
tena eva iti
jñātṛ tva eka āśrayeṇa a jaḍa tvena eva iti arthaḥ
na kiñcid na artha sādhakam
vivakṣita bhramavat tā upapādakam na bhavati
asiddham asiddhena sādhyate iti yāvat

original: yadvā na kiñcidetat-anatiprasaktaṃ prakṛtārthopapādakaṃ durnirūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā na kiñcid etat anatiprasaktam prakṛta artha upapādakam durnirūpam iti bhāvaḥ

original: antaḥkaraṇasyājaḍatvopagame sāṅkhyasyāpasiddhāntaṃ cāha api ce ti /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇasya a jaḍa tva upagame sāṅkhyasya apasiddhāntam ca āha api ca iti

original: nanvantaḥkaraṇasya citisārūpyāsambhave 'pi tasmin citipratibimba eva jñātṛtvādimānastu ityatrāha na ca citī ti /
analyzed: nanu antaḥkaraṇasya citi sārūpya asambhave tasmin citi pratibimbaḥ eva jñātṛ tva ādimān astu iti atra āha na ca citi ti
bimba tvena abhimatā acit
pratibimba ādhāra tvena abhimatam antaḥkaraṇam
dvandvasya abhimata śabdena karmadhārayaḥ

original: bimbagatasya vakratādeḥ pratibimbādhāragatasya vā mālinyādeḥ pratibimbe āropasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: bimba gatasya vakra tā ādeḥ pratibimba ādhāra gatasya vā mālinī ādeḥ pratibimbe āropa sambhavaḥ

original: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ bhramo vā prakṛte 'nyatarasminnapyasti,
analyzed: na ca jñātṛ tvam bhramaḥ vā prakṛte nyatarasmin api asti
yasya cit pratibimbe āropaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ

nyāya tattva śāstra ādau iti śeṣaḥ
nanu antaḥkaraṇe eva viṣaya ākāra pariṇāma lakṣaṇa jñāna vṛtteḥ upagamāt anyatarasmin api avṛtti tvam asiddham

original: tataśca citibuddhyorvivekāgrahācciti jñātṛtvapratibhāso yujyata eveti śaṅkate yaducyata ityādinā /
analyzed: tatas ca citi buddhyoḥ viveka agrahāt citi jñātṛ tva pratibhāsaḥ yujyate eva iti śaṅkate yat ucyate ityādinā

original: nirvikārāyā api citiśakteḥ sannidhānabalādevāntaḥkaraṇasya pratyakṣādipramāṇajñānabhrāntyādilakṣaṇā vṛttibhedāḥ samudayante /
analyzed: nirvikārāyāḥ api citi śakteḥ sannidhāna balāt eva antaḥkaraṇasya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa jñāna bhrānti ādi lakṣaṇāḥ vṛtti bhedāḥ samudayante

original: prādhānyāt citeḥ tāsāṃ sākṣitvaṃ bhoktatvaṃ ca,
analyzed: prādhānyāt citeḥ tāsām sākṣi tvam bhokta tvam ca

original: yathā niśceṣṭasyāpi sārvabhaumasya prādhānyāt prabalasāmantacakrakartṛkayuddhaparākramavijayabhāktvaṃ tadvaditi śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā niśceṣṭasya api sārvabhaumasya prādhānyāt prabala sāmanta cakra kartṛka yuddha parākrama vijaya bhāj tvam tadvat iti śaṅkituḥ āśayaḥ
parākramīyaḥ atiśayena parākramavat
pariharati tat anupapannam iti
sākṣi tvam hi na caitanya mātra tvam
kintu sākṣāt draṣṭṛ tvam
na tad citeḥ

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ kalpitamiti cet nirvikāre nirdharmake kūṭasthe caitanye draṣṭṛtvabhramo 'pi na sambhavatītyuktameva /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam kalpitam iti ced nirvikāre nirdharmake kūṭasthe caitanye draṣṭṛ tva bhramaḥ na sambhavati iti uktam eva

original: dṛṣṭānte tu na nirvyāpāratvaṃsārvabhaumasya nirdharmakatvaṃ vā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte tu na nirvyāpāra tvam sārvabhaumasya nirdharmaka tvam vā
sva svāmi bhāve hetavaḥ ca kraya pratigraha utpādana bharaṇa ādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ
rājñaḥ ca bharaṇa ādi hetukam svāmi tvam upapannam
na tu sāṅkhya abhimatasya puruṣasya iti
samudita āśayaḥ

original: nanu sāṅkhyābhimatasyātmano 'numānāsambhave 'pi naiyāyikādibhirādheyātiśayatvena bhoktatvena cābhimatasyātmanaḥ saṅghātaparārthatvānumānena  #
analyzed: nanu sāṅkhya abhimatasya ātmanaḥ numāna asambhave naiyāyika ādibhiḥ ādheya atiśaya tvena bhoktatvena ca abhimatasya ātmanaḥ saṅghāta parārtha tva anumānena
sādhanam syāt iti ced na

original: saṅghātasya saṃhataparārthatvena vyāprerasaṃhatasya parasya siddherayogāt / naca
analyzed: saṅghātasya saṃhata para artha tvena vyāpreḥ asaṃhatasya parasya siddheḥ ayogāt na ca
bhoktṛ artha tvena eva saṅghāta tvasya vyāptiḥ astu
tathā ca asaṃhata ātma siddhiḥ apratyūhā iti vācyam
śarīrasya api śarīra antara rūpa bhoktṛ artha tva sādhana paryavasānāt vivakṣita asiddheḥ

original: śarīrādivyatiriktasya bhoktaranumānātpūrvamasiddhyā ca vilakṣaṇabhoktrarthatvena vyāpteragrahādvilakṣaṇātmasādhanāyoga iti dik /
analyzed: śarīra ādi vyatiriktasya bhoktar anumānāt pūrvam asiddhyā ca vilakṣaṇa bhoktṛ artha tvena vyāpteḥ agrahāt vilakṣaṇa ātma sādhana ayogaḥ iti diś
ātmani deha ādi bheda sādhaka anumānānām pratyakṣa bādham api āha sthūlaḥ ham iti
pratyakṣa mṛdita viṣaya tayā apratyakṣa bādhita sādhyaka tayā
atīta kāla tā bādhita hetvābhāsa tā
vyatireka anumāna bhedānām vilakṣaṇa ātma anumānānām kāpila naiyāyika abhimatānām

original: dehādibhede ātmanaḥ śrutimeva pramāṇatayopanyasyanti śrotriyāḥ sa eṣa iti /
analyzed: deha ādi bhede ātmanaḥ śrutim eva pramāṇa tayā upanyasyanti śrotriyāḥ saḥ eṣaḥ iti
ti ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi gata prakāra niṣedhaḥ
śarīra bhinnam śarīra dharma vraṇa ādi rahitam ca ātma svarūpam iti akāyam ityādeḥ arthaḥ
yonim iti
atra śarīra prāpaka yoni sambandha pratipādanena ātmanaḥ śarīra bhinna tvam sidhyati
śarīra tvāya śīryamāṇa tvāya
idam ca na sva rūpeṇa
kintu śarīra viśiṣṭa veṣeṇa

original: tathāca dehāderevotpattyādi nātmana ityatra śrutirna jāyata iti /
analyzed: tathāca deha ādeḥ eva utpatti ādi na ātmanaḥ iti atra śrutiḥ na jāyate iti
śarīra bhinna tvam uktam ātmanaḥ
śarīra saṃsṛṣṭa tvam api aupādhikam eva

original: muktautvaśarīratvamevetyatra śrutimupādatte na ha vai iti /
analyzed: muktau tva śarīra tvam eva iti atra śrutim upādatte na ha vai iti

original: śrutiṃ pramāṇamuktvā vilakṣaṇātmani śrutyarthāpattimapi pramāṇamāha kālāntare ti /
analyzed: śrutim pramāṇam uktvā vilakṣaṇa ātmani śruti arthāpattim api pramāṇam āha kāla antare ti
tad anupapattī ti
vidhi anyathā anupapatti iti vā

original: dehavināśordhvabhāvisvargādisādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ tadvidhānaṃ vā bhoktarātmano dehātirekaṃ nityatvaṃ ca vinā hi na ghaṭate /
analyzed: deha vināśa ūrdhva bhāvi svarga ādi sādhana karma anuṣṭhānam tad vidhānam vā bhoktar ātmanaḥ deha atirekam nitya tvam ca vinā hi na ghaṭate
nanu eva deha vyatireke siddhe pi indriya ādi bhedaḥ na sidhyati iti ced
atrā ucyate golaka atirikta indriyasya api na śāstram antarā siddhiḥ

original: śāstratastu vilakṣaṇātmana upakaraṇatvenaiva tatsiddhiriti vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiḥ śāstrato niṣpratyūheti /
analyzed: śāstrataḥ tu vilakṣaṇa ātmanaḥ upakaraṇa tvena eva tad siddhiḥ iti vilakṣaṇa ātma siddhiḥ śāstrataḥ niṣpratyūhā iti

original: vilakṣaṇātmani anumānaikapramāṇakatvamāgamaikapramāṇakatvaṃ ca matabhedenopapādya pratyakṣatvaṃ mīmāṃsakamatena nirūpayitumupakramate nanu  #
analyzed: vilakṣaṇa ātmani anumāna eka pramāṇaka tvam āgama eka pramāṇaka tvam ca mata bhedena upapādya pratyakṣa tvam mīmāṃsaka matena nirūpayitum upakramate nanu
hita ahite ti
hitam balavat aniṣṭa ananubandhi iṣṭa sādhanam śāstra eka samadhigamyam
ahitam balavat aniṣṭa anubandhi
hita ahita pravartana nivartana eka parasya śāstrasya upari tattva para tvasya api parikalpanam mahā bhāra nikṣepa lakṣaṇam eva
sahyetava an anya labhye tattva aṃśe pi kārya upayogini śāstrasya tātparya kalpanam
na tu anya labhye
deha ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ ca ātmā

original: pratyakṣeṇaiva sphuṭamadhigamyata iti nātra purovāditālakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sambhavatīti śrotriyopari pratyavasthānaṃ mīmāṃsakasya /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa eva sphuṭam adhigamyate iti na atra purovādi tā lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam śāstrasya sambhavati iti śrotriya upari pratyavasthānam mīmāṃsakasya

original: ātmana indriyāgrāhyatvaṃ śaṅkate 'tra śrotriyaḥ maivaṃ voca ityādinā /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ indriya a grāhya tvam śaṅkate śrotriyaḥ mā evam vocaḥ ityādinā
rūpa ādi vyatireki ṇi rūpa sparśa rahite
dravya pratyakṣe hi udbhūta rūpa sparśa anyatarasya kāraṇa tvam
tad abhāvāt na ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tvam sambhavati
niratiśaya sūkṣmaḥ iti anena indriya grahaṇa ayogya tvam vivakṣitam

original: yogya eva hi pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati nāyogya iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yogyaḥ eva hi pratyakṣam prabhavati na ayogyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
indriya agrāhya tve ātmanaḥ śrutim udāharati parāñcī ti
parāc artha mātra grahaṇa samarthāni indriyāṇi iti arthaḥ
acit tva pratibaddhaḥ ca sarvaḥ pīndriya gocaraḥ
tena na aindriyikam jñānam ātmānam spraṣṭum arhati
syāt matam bhautika tvāt bahis indriyāṇi mā nāma ātmani pravartiṣata
manaḥ tu pravartiṣyate abhautika tvāt iti
tat na
tasya api indriya tve bhautika tvasya aparihārya tvāt
yathā āmnāyate anna mayam hi somya manaḥ iti
prapañcitam ca etat nirūpaṇe
iti ātmano pratyakṣa tva śaṅkā
atha ucyeta asti tāvat aham iti aparokṣa avabhāsaḥ pratyayaḥ
na ca aindriyika tvam antareṇa asau sambhavati

original: kḷptaṃ ca bahirindriyāgocare 'pi sukhādau svāntasvātantryamiti tannimitta evāyamahaṃpratyayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: kḷptam ca bahis indriya agocare sukha ādau svānta svātantryam iti tad nimittaḥ eva ayam ahaṃpratyayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: prayogaśca bhavati-ātmā mānasapratyakṣagrāhyaḥ bahirindriyāyogyatve sati pratyakṣatvātsukhādivat iti /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca bhavati ātmā mānasa pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ bahis indriya ayogya tve sati pratyakṣa tvāt sukha ādi vat iti
iti bhāṭṭa mukhena ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa tva anumāna upakṣepaḥ
tat na saṃvedanena vyabhicārāt
na ca tat apratyakṣam
jānāmi iti an anya upādhika tayā pratibhānāt
apratyakṣa tve ca saṃvedanasya asiddhiḥ eva syāt iti uktam eva
na ca tat api mānasa pratyakṣa tayā sapakṣe nikṣepam arhati
vimarda asaha tvāt
yadā khalu kutaścid ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt viṣaya saṃvid udayam āsādayati

original: tadaiva kiṃ tata eva tadgocaramapi vedanaṃ janyate,
analyzed: tadā eva kim tatas eva tad gocaram api vedanam janyate
uta anyadā anyena iti vācyam
na ca yugapad ubhaya jananam sambhāvyate
tathā hi sati
parāpara tad tad gocara niravadhika dhī nikurumba janma tad kālam eva āpadyeta
na ca tat asti
yugapad utpattau viṣaya viṣayi tva niyamaḥ ca nirnibandhanaḥ
asama samaya janmanā jñānena vedya tve na pratyakṣa tvam
kṣaṇika tvena agrima jñānasya āgrāhaka jñāna udayam avasthāna abhāvāt bhāve ca
sarva jñānānām sarvadā avasthāna prasaṅgāt

original: kāryavirodhitve cānantarameva saṃskārodayānna kālāntare sthitiriti saṃvido na mānasapratyakṣavedyatvam /
analyzed: kārya virodhi tve ca anantaram eva saṃskāra udayāt na kāla antare sthitiḥ iti saṃvidaḥ na mānasa pratyakṣa vedya tvam
na ca apratyakṣā saṃvid iti sphuṭaḥ vyabhicāraḥ
aindriyika tvasya anātma tva pratibaddha tvāt viruddha tā ca
sādhya vikalaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ
sukha duḥkhayoḥ pratyakṣa tva anabhyupagamāt
anabhyupagamaḥ ca indriya pauṣkalya nāśayoḥ eva sukha duḥkha tvāt

original: na hi tasminnapratyakṣe tatpauṣkalyaṃvaikalyaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi tasmin a pratyakṣe tat pauṣkalyam vaikalyam vā pratyakṣam bhavati
indriya sva rūpe iva abhyāsa pāṭavāt tayoḥ aparokṣa tva abhimānaḥ
manaḥ vasthā bhedeṣu iva ca anumeya manaḥ vādinām
yaḥ tu sugata mata avalambī vijñāna abhinna hetu ja tayā tayoḥ api tad antarbhāvam abhimanyate
kaṇabhakṣa pakṣa āśrayaṇena vā tayoḥ ātma viśeṣa guṇa tvam
tābhyām sukha duḥkha adhikaraṇam vyācakṣīta
svatas sukhī iti etad vimarśam vā atratyam
rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ tu caitanyasya eva avasthā viśeṣāḥ tadvat eva pratyakṣībhavanti iti na tad nidarśanena anumāna udayaḥ
tad virodha prayukta viṣayīkāram tat eva dveṣaḥ
bhūta duḥkha jñānena cetaḥ calanam śokaḥ
āgāmi tad jñānena cetaḥ calanam bhayam ityādi lakṣaṇa granthāt evā avagantavyam iti alam pravistareṇa
iti guru mukhena ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa tva anumāna dūṣaṇam

original: ekasya cātmano niraṃśasya na svāpekṣayā grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: ekasya ca ātmanaḥ niraṃśasya na sva apekṣayā grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ
virodhāt iti api uktam eva
aṃśa bheda āśrayaṇe tad siddhaye ca aṃśa antaram āśrayitavyam
tathā tatra tatra iti anavasthā
saṅghāta tvam ca ātmanaḥ
iti ca ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāve virodha udbhāvanam
nanu ca grāhaka avabhāsaḥ śrutyā
sva siddhānta śraddhā vipralabdha buddhi bhiḥ abhihitaḥ
kvacid astu nāma pratyayaḥ
sa tu āgantuka ātma pratiyogika prākaṭya prakāśa ādi pada abhidheya artha dharma anumita jñāna viśiṣṭa mānasa pratyakṣa siddha ātma nibandhanaḥ
iti prābhākara mate bhāṭṭasya api pratyavasthānam

original: ucyate / aho khalu svānubhava eva vibhramaḥ parīkṣakāṇām,
analyzed: ucyate aho khalu sva anubhavaḥ eva vibhramaḥ parīkṣakāṇām

original: yat viṣayānubhavasamaye pūrvāvasthāto na kañcidviśeṣamayamātmano 'vabudhyata iti /

uktam hi etad ṛti dṛśaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ
jñāyate na vā iti na vidmaḥ

original: mama vā pratibhāsate parasya vetyapi na vidma iti na
analyzed: mama vā pratibhāsate parasya vā iti api na vidmaḥ iti na
jātucit evam pratītiḥ asti

original: so 'yaṃ parasaṃcetitāt svasaṃcetitasyātiśayaḥ sarvatra parisphurannasati grāhakāvabhāse nopapadyeta /

anumita jñāna ālambana tve ca ajñāsiṣam iti eva pratibhāsaḥ syāt
na jānāmi iti
jñāna janya artha atiśaya darśana tad vyāpti anusandhāna anumāna udaya samaye num itsita jñānasya ativṛtta tvāt
jñāna anumāna asambhavaḥ pūrvam eva uktaḥ
mānasa pratyakṣa tvam ca ātma grāhi adhī nirastam
tathā asati hi sva para vedyayoḥ anatiśayaḥ syāt
iti prābhākarīyam sva pakṣa sādhanam
nanu katham iva grāhaka anavabhāse sva para vedyayoḥ anatiśaya prasaṅgaḥ
nahi grāhaka siddhi nibandhanaḥ sva para vedya viśeṣaḥ
sva samaveta viṣaya bodha janmanā para samaveta bodha janmanā ca tad viśeṣa upapatteḥ
sva para sambandhi bodha viśeṣa uda vyavasthā api svīya parakīya indriya artha sannikarṣa ādi jñāna hetu sāmagrī bheda nibandhanā
na ca ātma siddhiḥ api tad sāmagrī anupraveśam arhati
indriya ādeḥ iva anavabhāsamānasya eva hetu tva sambhavāt
na ca viṣaya bodhaḥ eva ātma bodhaḥ iti sāmpratam
na hi artha antara siddhiḥ artha antarasya siddhiḥ bhavati
atiprasaṅgāt
api ca yad adhīnā bhāvānām rūpa bheda vyavasthā
tat api hi saṃvedanam tadānīm nilīna rūpam eva indriya ādi vat
kutas tu punar tad āśrayasya ātmanaḥ pratibhāsa prasaktiḥ
yat āhuḥ idam aham jānāmi iti tritaya avabhāsaḥ sārvatrikaḥ iti
tat api anubhava anārūḍham eva anantaram eva pratikṣiptam iti
iti bhāṭṭena prābhākara mata dūṣaṇam
astu tarhi grāhaka tayā eva sarva artha grahaṇa samayeṣu ātma siddhiḥ
abhyupagantavyā hi saṃvidaḥ svatas siddhiḥ
sarva prakāra sādhana antara nirākaraṇāt
satyāḥ ca tasyāḥ kadācid anavabhāsa adarśanāt ca
yathā ca saṃvidaḥ
prakāśa avyabhicāraḥ

original: tathā prapañcitaṃ prathamādhikaraṇa iti nātropakṣipya pratikṣeptavyam /
analyzed: tathā prapañcitam prathama adhikaraṇe iti na atra upakṣipya pratikṣeptavyam

original: sato 'pi prameyajātasya svāpādisamaye 'nupalabderabhyupagataṃ tāvat saṃvidaḥ tatsādhakatvam /

original: tat upapattibhirupapadyamānamapi yathāpratīti vyavaharatāṃ na cittamanurañjayati /

original: yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti cātra prayogaḥ //17//

atra bhāṭṭa matam upakṣipati syāt matam iti

original: tatra saṃvidi hetau viśeṣaṇāṃśasya siddhatvādviśeṣyāṃśaṃ tāvatsādhayati na ca tadi ti /

original: saṃvedane sādhyasyāpi sattvamāśaṅkate na ca tadapī ti /

original: kintu svakāryeṇaiva nivṛttiriṣyate jñānasyeti cettatrāha kārye ti /

kāryasya viro
dhi tvam nāśaka tva lakṣaṇam ced dvi kṣaṇa avasthāyi tvam syāt jñānasya

original: atra tu sahānavasthānalakṣaṇa eva virodho vivakṣitaḥ /

dvi kṣaṇa avasthāyi tve tu naiyāyika prakriyayā mānasa pratyakṣa upapatteḥ tad niṣedha anupapatteḥ iti bodhyam
naiyāyika mate pi dvitīya tṛtīya ādi jñāna viṣayaka jñāna ādhāra anuvṛtti prasaṅgaḥ bodhyaḥ
ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa tva anumāne virodham api āha aindriyika tvasya iti
tathā ca pakṣa tā avacchedaka ātma tva viruddham sādhyam iti bhāvaḥ

sādhya śūnyaḥ nu ayat daṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: athāpi siddhāntaprakriyayā jñānāvasthārūpatvātsukhādeḥ jñānasya ca svayaṃprakāśatvātsvayaṃprakāśatvaṃ sukhāderhṛdi nidhāya sādhyavikalatvameva  #
analyzed: atha api siddhānta prakriyayā jñāna avasthā rūpa tvāt sukha ādeḥ jñānasya ca svayam prakāśa tvāt svayam prakāśa tvam sukha ādeḥ hṛdi nidhāya sādhya vikala tvam eva

original: anvayaddaṣṭānte sādhyasya sādhanasya vā virahena tadavacchedena sādhyavyāptigraho hetau sambhavatīti vyāpyatvāsiddhirvivakṣitā /
analyzed: anvaya daṣṭānte sādhyasya sādhanasya vā virahena tad avacchedena sādhya vyāpti grahaḥ hetau sambhavati iti vyāpya tva asiddhiḥ vivakṣitā
nanu sukha duḥkhayoḥ apratyakṣa tve pratyakṣa vat avabhāsaḥ tayoḥ katham
tatra āha indriye ti
yathā atīndriya tve pi indriyāṇām mama idam cakṣuḥ

original: ahaṃ cakṣuṣmān paśyāmīti pratyakṣavadavabhāsaścakṣurādeḥ kadāciccākṣuṣādivṛtti kāle nānācakṣurādivṛtti pratisandhānavataścetanasyendriyaviṣayasaṃskāraprācuryaprayuktaḥ,
analyzed: aham cakṣuṣmān paśyāmi iti pratyakṣa vat avabhāsaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ kadācid cākṣuṣa ādi vṛtti kāle nānā cakṣuḥ ādi vṛtti pratisandhānavataḥ cetanasya indriya viṣaya saṃskāra prācurya prayuktaḥ
tadvat indriya avasthā rūpa sukha dūḥkha parāmarśaḥ api pratyakṣa samāna ākāraḥ tad abhyāsa bāhulyāt iti arthaḥ
atra nidarśanam manaḥ vasthā ti
anumeya manaḥ vādinaḥ buddhi vyatiriktam manaḥ numānena sādhayantaḥ

original: kāmasaṅkalpādīnāṃ manovṛttirūpatvaṃ kāmaḥsaṅkalpaḥ- sarvaṃ mana eve ti śrutyāpratīyate / teṣāṃ ca

original: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatve sādhakasyāsambhavamuktvā bādhakamapyāha ekasye ti /

original: ātmano niraṃśatvaviruddhaṃ ca sāṃśatvamevaṃ sati prasajyata ityarthaḥ /

anubhave ca sva anurūpa saṃskāra ādhāna niruddhe sadṛśa saṃbandhi darśana ādi samudbodhita nija bīja anusāreṇa smaraṇam upajāyate
na ca iha ātma svarūpa bodhasya jātucit nirodhaḥ janma vā
nitya ātma sattā prayukta tvāt
nimitta antara abhāvaḥ ca anantaram eva vyākariṣyate
tat evam anuvartamāne eva anubhave katham smṛtiḥ udayam āsādayet

original: ya evāhaṃ pūrvedyurāsaṃ sa evāhamadyāpīti smṛtisaṃbhinnapratyayo 'pi kālāvacchinnasvarūpagocaraḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ eva aham pūrvedyus āsam saḥ eva aham adya api iti smṛti saṃbhinna pratyayaḥ kāla avacchinna sva rūpa gocaraḥ
na svarūpa mātre
aviśadaḥ ca svāpa ādau sva anubhavaḥ nirvikalpakaḥ ca

original: paṭīyasā savikalpakenāvagamena smṛtibījamādhīyata iti ca kutastatprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: paṭīyasā sa vikalpakena avagamena smṛti bījam ādhīyate iti ca kutas tad prasaṅgaḥ
sāmyāt ca ananubhava abhimānaḥ śarīra tad dhāraṇa prayatna ananusaṃdhāna vat
na ca avikṛta svābhāvika bodha mātreṇa avasthāne svāpa mokṣayoḥ aviśeṣa āpattiḥ
kleśa vāsanānām guṇa abhibhavasya ca ekatra bhāvāt
itaratra tad atyanta nivṛtteḥ

original: asaṃprajñātasamādhāvapi paramavairāgyaśālinā paṭutaranirodhasaṃskāreṇa caritādhikāriṇā apavargiṇā viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃprajñāta samādhau api parama vairāgya śālinā paṭutara nirodha saṃskāreṇa carita adhikāriṇā apavargiṇā viśeṣaḥ
iti jñāna nitya tve prasakta ākṣepāṇām pariharaṇam

original: kathaṃ punarnidrāyā avṛttitve prabuddhasya pratyavamarśāḥ sukhamahamasvāpsamityādyāḥ?
analyzed: katham punar nidrāyāḥ avṛtti tve prabuddhasya pratyavamarśāḥ sukham aham asvāpsam ityādyāḥ
na hi ananubhūta gocarāḥ smṛtayaḥ saṃbhavanti
sattva saciva samullasita tamaḥ guṇa anubhava bhāvita bhāvanā yoniḥ khalu sukham aham asvāpsam
prasannam me manaḥ
laghūni me gātrāṇi iti pratyavamarśaḥ
rajaḥ tamaḥ samudreke tu duḥkham aham asvāpsam
bhramati anavasthitam me cittam iti

original: sattvarajasī tvabhibhūya nitāntamudbhūte tamasi gāḍhamūḍhaṃ supto 'smi,
analyzed: sattva rajasī tu abhibhūya nitāntam udbhūte tamasi gāḍham ūḍham suptaḥ smi
gurūṇi me gātrāṇi
muṣitam iva manaḥ
mīlitam iva iti
satyam evam
datta uttaram hi etat
na eva amī vāsanā yonayaḥ pratyayāḥ
api tu tātkālika śarīra indriya āmanaḥ vasthā viśeṣa paryālocana nimittā
ānumānikāḥ iti
evaṃrūpā hi imā iyatas prasannam me manaḥ
samyak āhāra pariṇāma vaśāt laghūni ca aṅgāni
atas sukham aham asvāpsam iti
svāpa avasthāyām vā
indriya uparama tāratamya vaśāt aviśada tātkālika tad tad anukūla pratikūla viṣaya anusandhāna nibandhana tayā api smaraṇam upapadyate iti na vṛtti antara tvam
nidrāyāḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi pāramarṣaṃ sūtram “abhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirnidrā ” iti /
analyzed: katham tarhi pāramarṣam sūtram abhāva pratyaya ālambanā vṛttiḥ nidrā iti
nirodha para tvāt prakaraṇasya na vṛtti svarūpe tātparyam viparyaya vat
na hi a tad rūpa pratiṣṭham mithyājñānam kiñcid asti
sarva saṃvidām artha avyabhicārāt
sa ca adhikaraṇa siddhaḥ
sādhayiṣyate ca upariṣṭāt
kaivalya bhāgi yat cit tad pratyanīka tayā nidrā ādeḥ nirodhya tvena upadeśaḥ
iti nidrāyāḥ vṛtti rūpa tva niṣedhanam
astu vā pūrva ukta pramāṇa ādi vṛtti abhāva kāraṇa bhūta pracitatama tamaḥ guṇa avalambanā vṛttiḥ eva nidrā
santu ca prabuddha pratyavamarśāḥ ca smaraṇāni
tathā sati apya
nava rata anuvṛtta bodha tayā sthitam eva puṃsaḥ bodha svabhāva tvam

original: āha-bodhakāraṇānuvṛttyāpi bodhānuvṛttirupapadyata iti kathaṃ tathāsvābhāvyaniścayaḥ? ittham -
analyzed: āha bodha kāraṇa anuvṛttyā api bodha anuvṛttiḥ upapadyate iti katham tathāsvābhāvya niścayaḥ ittham
evam viṣaya prakāśa kādācitkatvena ātmanaḥ dharma bhūtam jñānam āgantukam eva
ātma svarūpa prakāśaḥ na sarvadā
kintu viṣaya jñāna kāle eva jñānataḥ

original: na svataḥ iti pratyavasthānaprasaṅge jñānasya nityatvaṃ tāvadvyavasthāpayati atrāhu riti /
analyzed: na svatas iti pratyavasthāna prasaṅge jñānasya nitya tvam tāvat vyavasthāpayati atra āhuḥ iti

tat ca ātmanaḥ nitya tvāt nityam eva

original: ātmasvarūpanirūpakadharmatvācca jñānasya na jñānarahitamātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ vyavatiṣṭeta prakāśarahitamiva tejaḥ /
analyzed: ātma svarūpa nirūpaka dharma tvāt ca jñānasya na jñāna rahitam ātmanaḥ svarūpam vyavatiṣṭeta prakāśa rahitam iva tejaḥ
atas muktau api jñānavat tvam upeyam
jñāna śūnyasya anātma tvāt iti śloka dvaya arthaḥ

original: nanu jñānābhāve 'pi jñānaśaktimadātmasvarūpaṃ muktikāla ityatrāha citiśaktaye ti /

luptam uttara ardham asya

original: muktau kadāpi jñānasyānudayāttacchaktirapi tadā naṣṭaiveti ātmanāśa eva pratijñāto bhavet /
analyzed: muktau kadāpi jñānasya anudayāt tad śaktiḥ api tadā naṣṭā eva iti ātma nāśaḥ eva pratijñātaḥ bhavet
svarūpa nirūpaka dharma nivṛttau svarūpa nivṛtteḥ avaśyambhāvāt iti arthaḥ
nanu jñānasya jñānaśakteḥ vā na ātma svarūpa nirūpaka tvam

original: kintu āgantukamapi tadātmana eveṣyate dharmabhūtaṃ na ghaṭāderityātmanātmavyavasthopapadyata iti cet;
analyzed: kintu āgantukam api tat ātmanaḥ evā iṣyate dharma bhūtam na ghaṭa ādeḥ iti ātmanā ātma vyavasthā upapadyate iti ced
mā evam jñānasya ātma svarūpa nirūpaka dharma tāyāḥ sthāpayiṣyamāṇa tvāt
jaḍa ātma vādasya trayī anta viruddha tvena sadbhiḥ anādaraṇīya tvāt ca iti hārdam
citi śaktye tyādi vivṛṇoti buddhī tyādinā

original: pāṣāṇakalpasya muktātmano 'cidvyāvartakacicchaktayāśrayaṇaṃ vyarthamityāha api ce ti /
analyzed: pāṣāṇa kalpasya mukta ātmanaḥ cit vyāvartaka cicchaktayā āśrayaṇam vyartham iti āha api ca iti
lupta ardha vivaraṇam syāt idam

original: nanu nityatve jñānasyā'tmatvamapīṣyatāṃ tasyaiveti śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati na caivaṃ satī ti /

paramvaram
tasya ti

kiñca kalpanāyām eva lāghava gaurava carcā avasaraḥ
na tu sphuṭa pratipanne boddhṛ ātmani iti āha sākṣāt ca iti

original: ahaṃ jānāmīti jñātrātmapratyakṣasya bhramatvamiti cettatrāha anubhave ti /

viṣaya saṃbandhaḥ eva tasya bodhaḥ nāma

original: ato boddhṛtvapratipattirātmana upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca citimātre ti /

original: viṣayacaitanyasaṃbandhasya bodhatvābhimatasya saṃyogarūpatve tasya dviṣṭhatvādviṣayasyāpi boddhṛtvaprasaṅga ityāha sambandhasye ti /

śaṅkate na ca kārye ti

original: yathā kāryakāraṇabhāvasya hetuhetumadubhayanirūpyatve 'pi hetuhetumatorvyavasthā idamasya kāraṇam,

original: evaṃ cidviṣayasaṃbandhasya viṣayaviṣayinirūpyatve 'pi boddhṛbodhyavyavasthā ghaṭata iti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /

original: yadyapi kāryasya kāraṇasya ca saṃbandhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kathyate /

original: paraṃ tu kāryatvaṃ kāraṇanirūpitaṃ kāryaniṣṭhaṃ svapūrvavartikāraṇāpekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ svaprākkālāvacchedena kāryavyāpakakāraṇakatvaparyasāyi,

original: kāraṇatvaṃ ca kāryanirūpitaṃ kāraṇaniṣṭhaṃ svottarabhāvikāryāpekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaniyataprākkālavartitvaparyavasāyi bhinnabhinnameva tatra  #

original: atra tu eka evobhayasamavetaḥ saṃyoga iti vyavasthādurghaṭetyarthaḥ /

original: yadyapi saṃyogasyobhayaniṣṭhatve 'pi anuyogitāsaṃbandhena tasya cinniṣṭhatvāccita eva boddhṛtvam,

atha api na cit mātra tvam ātmanaḥ

original: ciccetyayorapi parasparāpekṣāniyamalakṣaṇā eva saṃbandho 'stviti śaṅkate ihāpī ti /

apekṣāyāḥ hetuḥ prayojana rūpaḥ arthaḥ na asti iti arthaḥ

original: nanvarthānāṃ vāsanādoṣāccaitanya eva kalpitatvādadhiṣṭhānatayā cito 'pekṣā syādevetyatrā'ha nirastaśce
analyzed: nanu arthānām vāsanā doṣāt caitanye eva kalpita tvāt adhiṣṭhāna tayā citā upekṣā syāt eva iti atra āha nirastaḥ ca
evam arthasya utpattau cit apekṣām pratikṣipya

āgantuka atiśayaḥ ca svadharma bhūta jñāna vikāsa rūpaḥ eva

original: tadāśraya ātmeti na bodhamātramātmeti sāmpratamiti bhāvaḥ /

original: nanvevamātmano bodhasvarūpatvavadbodhasvabhāvatvamapi na saṃbhavati anityasya bodhasya nityātmasvabhāvatvāyogāt /

original: arthiprakāśakādācitkatvāya bodhakādācitkatāyā eva mantavyatvāditi śaṅkate nanvevam iti /
analyzed: arthi prakāśa kādācitkatvāya bodha kādācitkatāyāḥ eva mantavya tvāt iti śaṅkate nanu evam iti

original: jñānasya kriyātvamāgantukatvaṃ ca sādhayituṃ sāmānyavyāptiṃ śikṣayati arthāntare ti /
analyzed: jñānasya kriyā tvam āgantuka tvam ca sādhayitum sāmānya vyāptim śikṣayati artha antare ti
artha antaram grāma ādi
janaka dravya antaraṃgantā
gantavya deśa prāptiḥ grāma puruṣa saṃyogaḥ

original: ubhayaniṣṭho 'pyayaṃ puruṣapravṛttimūlatvena puruṣāsādhāraṇaḥ puruṣaniṣṭhāgantukagamanakriyājanyo dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /

akriye ti

original: kulaparamparayā prāpte kṣetrādau janmata eva svatvaṃ yasya bhāgino 'nyasyābhāvāt,

original: abhāvaprāptetyatra bhāvaprāpteti svabhāvaprāpteti vānyathā vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate /

original: kintu jīvanameva vyāpāra iti śaṅkate tajjīvanameve ti /

original: asmadaniṣṭaṃ sādhayituṃ pravṛttasya bhavator'thāntareṇa nigrahaṇamevāsmākaṃ lābha iti bhāvaḥ/
analyzed: asmad aniṣṭam sādhayitum pravṛttasya bhavataḥ ṛtha antareṇa nigrahaṇam eva asmākam lābhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: svabhāvaprāptakṣetrādisvatve vyabhicārādevāgantukadharmajanyatvamapi na sādhayituṃ śakyata iti cānusandheyam /
analyzed: svabhāva prāpta kṣetra ādi sva tve vyabhicārāt eva āgantuka dharma janya tvam api na sādhayitum śakyate iti ca anusandheyam
evam artha prakāśa kādācitkatvena jñāna āgantuka tva sādhanam dūṣitam

original: prakārāntareṇa ca tatsādhanaṃ dūṣayitumanuvadati na ca hetubhede ti /
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa ca tat sādhanam dūṣayitum anuvadati na ca hetu bhede ti
jñānam āgantukam kāla avacchinna tayā pratīteḥ
gamana ādi vat
jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa ādi janyam tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāva tvāt indhana ādi janya pāka ādi vat iti prayoga dvayam atra garbhitam
vyabhicāreṇa eva dūṣayati āditye ti
svābhāvikasya api āditya prakāśasya tad tad prakāśya deśa saṃbandhasya kāla traya paricchinna tayā
tad viśiṣṭa viṣayiṇī kāla paricchinna tva pratītiḥ na prakāśa svarūpasya kādācitkatva sādhikā iti
śaṅkate svārasika tve ti
svārasika tvam svābhāvika tvam

original: viśiṣṭe vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṅkāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena viśiṣṭe kālāvacchedapratītirviśeṣaṇe paryavasyati /
analyzed: viśiṣṭe vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṅkāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena viśiṣṭe kāla avaccheda pratītiḥ viśeṣaṇe paryavasyati
anitya tva anumānam ca viśiṣṭa viṣayam
na tu svarūpa mātra viṣayam

original: tathā ca yadrūpāvacchinnasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ tasyānityatvameva svarūpamātrasya ca na kālāvacchedapratītiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca yad rūpa avacchinnasya kāla avaccheda pratītiḥ tasya anitya tvam eva sva rūpa mātrasya ca na kāla avaccheda pratītiḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: svarūpamātrasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ pakṣe 'pyasiddheti pariharati ihāpī ti /
analyzed: svarūpa mātrasya kāla avaccheda pratītiḥ pakṣe pi asiddhā iti pariharati iha api iti

original: avacchinattikālāvacchinnatvaṃ yathā bhavettathā svasaṃbandhena viśinaṣṭi caitanyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: avacchinatti kāla avacchinna tvam yathā bhavet tathā sva saṃbandhena viśinaṣṭi caitanyam iti arthaḥ

original: jñāne tasyaupādhikatvaniścaya ekāntataḥ kuta iti punaḥ śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /

sa ca ātmanaḥ jñānavat tvena eva iti yāvat

original: tenātmanaḥ svarūpata eva prakāśamānasya svāpe jñānavattvenāprakāśe 'pi na kṣatiḥ /

original: yogipratyakṣe ātmacintane ca dehaṃ vinā'tmabhānamuktvā laukikapratyakṣe 'pi tadāha jānāmī ti /
analyzed: yogi pratyakṣe ātma cintane ca deham vinā ātma bhānam uktvā laukika pratyakṣe tat āha jānāmi iti

original: mano yathānuvartate na tathā śarīramekamiti yāvat /

original: tasya ca nātmasvabhāvatvamiti tatra vyabhicāra iti mandāśaṅkāmapanudati liṅgasye ti /

original: apinānuvṛttireva nāsti pralaye mokṣe ceti vyajyate /

original: svāpe 'pi bodhānuvṛttau samādhimuktayoḥ svāpāviśeṣaprasaṅga ityākṣepāntaramanūdya pariharati na cāvikṛte ti /

sattva kāryam ca laghu tva ādiḥ
iṣat udbuddha rajaḥ sahitatamaḥ ālambana tve duḥkha tvam calatva ādi ca

original: svāpe tama anubhave satyeva tajjasaṃskārataḥ prabodhe sukhamasvāpsamityādipratisandhānasyopapattiḥ nānyatheti /

original: nidrāyā vṛttirūpatvābhāve pātañjalasūtrasya kā gatiriti śaṅkate kathaṃ tarhī ti /

original: nanvevamapi tattatkālasya jñānena grahaṇaṃ na syādadyatanena,

dūra tve pi buddhyā sannikarṣaḥ ghaṭate iti uktam
idānīm buddhi apekṣayā adūra tvam eva na iti āha na atīte iti

original: buddhyadūratvameva buddhisannikarṣo bodhyabodhaboddhṛsādhāraṇa iti tu siddhāntaḥ // 34 //

original: deśaikye grāhakaikye ca vyañjakaikyaṃ hi darśitam /

original: gādisthā yugapadbhānto na bhindyuḥ svāśrayān katham // 38 //

ayuta siddha saṃbandha tvāt

akārya kāraṇayoḥ vā tayoḥ nirantara sthitiḥ
caitanya saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ anyatarasya
saṃbandha mātrasya vā prakāśa tve jñātṛ jñāna jñeya śarīra indriyeṣu avyāpti ativyāptī yathāyogam ādarśayitavye
tattva antara prakāśa abhyupagamaḥ tu anupalabdhi bādhitaḥ na dūṣaṇa antaram prayojayati
atas yat vyavahāra udaya anuguṇam jñānam
tat prakāśate iti eva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ

na hi svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogam arhanti

original: evaṃ cetsaṃyogasamavāyavirahiṇo 'pi padārthasya nimittabhedānusāreṇa vyavahārahetuḥ saṃviditi yuktamāśrayitum /

ucyate uktam atra
na nimitta kāraṇam anurudhya kāryam sva kāryam ārabhate iti

bahuvrīhi samāsa āśrayaṇe saṃvid antara abhāvena tasyām tad abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: bhāvanāyāḥ sādhyasādhanetikartavyatānvayitve 'pi bhāvanānyayinyaprāpte sādhanāṃśa eva vidhitātparyamiti mīmāṃsakāḥ /

original: sa ca tattadindriyayogyārthenaiva tattadaindriyikajñanasyeti na cākṣuṣādinā

original: cākṣuṣādijñānasya rasādina saṃbandha eva nāstīti tu kaścana pakṣaḥ /

original: indriyārthabhimukhatayā jñānasya prasaraṇe śrīmadgītāvākyaṃ pramāṇayati ' tadasye ' ti /

original: ātmagrahaṇapravṛttaṃ jñānamindriyārthapravaṇaṃ mana indriyadvārā viṣayābhimukhaṃ nayatītyarthaḥ indriyadvārājñānasya prasaraṇe manorvākyam  #

indriyāṇām iti
kṣarati bāhya viṣayam abhisarati
tena indriya dvāreṇa caitanyam ipi nissarati carma bhastrikā chidra dvārā iva jalam iti arthaḥ
a prahāya eva iti

original: saṅkocavikāśaśālino jñānasyātmadharmasyāparityajyaivātmasaṃbandhaṃ vikāsāvasthayā bāhyārthasaṃbandho ghaṭata iti yāvat /
analyzed: saṅkoca vikāśa śālinaḥ jñānasya ātma dharmasya a parityajya eva ātma saṃbandham vikāsa avasthayā bāhya artha saṃbandhaḥ ghaṭate iti yāvat
guṇasya api āśrayāt anyatra gamane nidarśanam āha dṛśyante iti
guṇa tvam ca ayuta siddha prakāra tva lakṣaṇam dravya adravya sādhāraṇam atra vācyam
śabda gandhayoḥ adravyayoḥ āloka prabhayoḥ ca dravyayoḥ guṇa tvena upādānāt
guṇasya gatimat tva ādi tu āśraya aṃśa dvārā
na ca evam dharmi ativarti tvam asiddham iti vācyam
prasiddha āśraya śaṅkhapuṣpa ādi ativarti tve tātparyāt
dūrāt gandhaḥ vāti iti śrutiḥ gandhasya gatim āha
śabdasya gatimat tvam śaṅkhanādaḥ yaḥ m ityādi upalabdheḥ dūre
nanu ākāśa guṇa tvāt śabdasya āśraya dvārā api gatiḥ na upapadyate iti atra āha ati sūkṣmaḥ iti
bhautikaḥ bhūta janitaḥ
bherī daṇḍa abhighāta ādinā udbhūte vāyau śabdaḥ jāyate

original: āśrayavāyyaṃśaviśaraṇavaśācca nānādikṣu tasyāpi sambandho ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: āśraya vāyi aṃśa viśaraṇa vaśāt ca nānā dikṣu tasya api sambandhaḥ ghaṭate iti bhāvaḥ
ati sūkṣma tvāt dūra gantṛ tvam vāyoḥ
āśraya dharmaḥ ca āśrayayiṇi upacaritaḥ iti bodhyam
nanu ākāśa guṇasya śabdasya vibhu tvāt eva na gamana apekṣā
yat kṛte vāyavīya tvam kalpyeta

original: vyañjakayogideśa evopalambhaniyamācca na vibhutve 'pi sarvatropalambhaprasaṅga iti śaṅkate ' nanu nabha ' iti /

tad tad jñāna āśraya tvam na syāt pakṣe smin

original: ataḥ svāśrayāśrayatvasaṃbandhena jñānavattvameva jñātṛtvamatra pakṣe vācyamiti viṣaye na jñātṛtvaprasaṅga iti /
analyzed: atas sva āśraya āśraya tva saṃbandhena jñānavat tvam eva jñātṛ tvam atra pakṣe vācyam iti viṣaye na jñātṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ iti
pariharati viṣayeṇa iti
viṣayeṇa iti hetau tṛtīyā
viṣaya śabdaḥ viṣaya vyāpāra paraḥ
evam agre cātanyena iti atra api

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-arthagrahaṇārthaṃ vyāpriyamāṇaṃ hi caitanyameva / tathāca
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ artha grahaṇa artham vyāpriyamāṇam hi caitanyam eva tathā ca

original: viṣayacaitanyasaṃyogasya tattadarthajñānatve 'pi tasya svānukūlavyāpṛtimaccaitanyāśrayatvasaṃbandhenātmanyeva sattvāttasyaiva jñātṛtvaṃ nārthāderityupalambhabalādvyavasthāpyam,
analyzed: viṣaya caitanya saṃyogasya tad tad artha jñāna tve pi tasya sva anukūla vyāpṛtimat caitanya āśraya tva saṃbandhena ātmani eva sattvāt tasya eva jñātṛ tvam na artha ādeḥ iti upalambha balāt vyavasthāpyam

original: yathā ālokārthasaṃyogasyaiva prakāśatve 'pi prakāśakatvaṃ svadharmabhūtālokaprasaraṇavaśātsūryādereva nārthasya tadvaditi /
analyzed: yathā āloka artha saṃyogasya eva prakāśa tve pi prakāśaka tvam sva dharma bhūta āloka prasaraṇa vaśāt sūrya ādeḥ eva na arthasya tadvat iti
yat vā viṣaya anuyogika saṃyoga abhāvāt iti viṣayeṇa ityādeḥ arthaḥ
tasya saṃyogaḥ viṣaya pratiyogika saṃyogaḥ

original: evaṃ prathamaṃ pakṣamupapādya tattadarthasaṃbaddhaṃ caitanyameva tattadarthajñānamiti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ śaṅkāsamādhānamukhena vyavasthāpayati  #
analyzed: evam prathamam pakṣam upapādya tad tad artha saṃbaddham caitanyam eva tad tad artha jñānam iti dvitīyam pakṣam śaṅkā samādhāna mukhena vyavasthāpayati  /
atha iti
prakāśaḥ prakāśakaḥ

original: tattadarthasaṃbaddhālokāśrayasyaiva sūryādeḥ prakāśakatvamiva tattadarthasaṃbaddhacaitanyavata ātmana eva jñātṛtvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad tad artha saṃbaddha āloka āśrayasya eva sūrya ādeḥ prakāśaka tvam iva tad tad artha saṃbaddha caitanyavataḥ ātmanaḥ eva jñātṛ tvam iti arthaḥ
ayam eva mukhyaḥ pakṣaḥ
jñātṛ tvasya sākṣāt ātmani saṅgateḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: ananyasādhana ityuktamananyādhīnasiddhitvaṃ caitanyasvabhāvatvaṃ cātmano nigamayati tatsiddhamiti /
analyzed: ananya sādhanaḥ iti uktam ananya adhīna siddhi tvam caitanya svabhāva tvam ca ātmanaḥ nigamayati tat siddham iti
caitanya svabhāvaḥ eva jñātṛ tva svabhāvaḥ eva
anena jñānasya āgantuka tvam nirastam
ātmanam vidan eva āste nitya ananya adhīna sva prakāśavān eva āste
anena ātmanaḥ prakāśasya āgantuka tvam
jñāna prayukta tvam ca vyāvartitam
nimitta bheda anusāreṇa indriya liṅga ādi jñāna artha sannikarṣa upādhi anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānataḥ
śiṣṭam spaṣṭam
svayam prakāśasya ātmanaḥ śābda ādi pramāṇa dhī gocara tvam api sādhayati tat evam ityādinā
asphuṭa prakāśe mīnaḥ nidarśanam
a viveka grahaṇe ca kṣīram
tad upapādana nyāya anugatāḥ ātma anātma viveka upapādaka avayava pañcaka ātmaka nyāya prayojyāḥ
anumāna bhedāḥ anumāna viśeṣāḥ
vacanāni pramāṇa vākyāni śāstra anugatāni
taiḥ api iti

original: anumānāgamānāṃ parokṣaikahetutvena prasphuṭaprakāśāsampādakatvāttāvanmātre 'paritoṣaḥ prasphuṭātmaprakāśākāṅkṣiṇāṃ yukta eva hi /
analyzed: anumāna āgamānām parokṣa eka hetu tvena prasphuṭa prakāśa a sampādaka tvāt tāvat mātre paritoṣaḥ prasphuṭa ātma prakāśa ākāṅkṣiṇām yuktaḥ eva hi

original: mana ādigatajñānāvāraṇadoṣakṣapaṇaṃ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānena sampadyata iti yamaniyameti dyotitam /

analyzed: nirodha abhyāsaḥ yoga abhyāsaḥ
yogāḥ citta vṛtti nirodhaḥ iti hi yoga sūtram
yoga abhyāsa paripākataḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ kāluṣya nivṛttyā udrikta viśuddha sattve manasi ātma viveka sākṣātkāra yogya tā iti nirodha abhyāsa ityādeḥ arthaḥ
vailakṣaṇyasya ātma gatasya a parokṣa jñānāya
prayatante ātma tattva cintana pravṛttim ācaranti
bhāvanā iti
nirantara anucintana lakṣaṇe yoge bhāvanā prakarṣa paryante niṣpanne sati
ca aparokṣa jñānam yoga ja dharma anugṛhīta viśuddha manaḥ janya ātma tattva sākṣātkāraḥ
iti arthaḥ
evam ātmā svatas siddhi anna āgamena anumānataḥ
yoga abhyāsa bhuvā spaṣṭam pratyakṣeṇa prakāśyate
iti ātma pramāṇa nirūpaṇa prakaraṇam
atha asya kāla avaccheda parīkṣā

original: tatra sugatamatānusāriṇaḥ sanmātrānubandhinīṃ kṣaṇikatāmācakṣāṇā nityātmadarśanameva sarvānarthamūlaṃ manyamānāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginamenaṃ saṅgirante;
analyzed: tatra sugata mata anusāriṇaḥ sanmātra anubandhinīm kṣaṇikatām ācakṣāṇāḥ nitya ātma darśanam eva sarva anartha mūlam manyamānāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginam enam saṅgirante
yat sat tat kṣaṇikam
san ca ayam ātmā iti
katham punar sanmātra anubandhinī kṣaṇika tā
akṣaṇikasya sattā anupapatteḥ
yat na kasmaicid kāryāya
antatas sārvajñya vijñāna gotara tvāya api na prabhavati

original: na tasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃbhāvyata ityarthakriyākāritaiva sattā bhāvānām /
analyzed: na tasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃbhāvyate iti artha kriyā kāritā eva sattā bhāvānām

original: na ca sā svavyāpakabhūtakramayaugapadyavirahiṇyakṣaṇike saṃbhavinītyanyatra niravakāśatayā kṣaṇikatayaivānubadhyate /
analyzed: na ca sā sva vyāpaka bhūta krama yaugapadya virahiṇī akṣaṇike saṃbhavinī iti anyatra niravakāśa tayā kṣaṇika tayā eva anubadhyate
katham punar krama yaugapadyayoḥ arthakriyā vyāpaka tvam
katham vā tayoḥ akṣaṇikāt nivṛttiḥ śrūyatām
uktam artham saṅgṛhṇāti evam ātmā iti

original: svaprakāśasyātmano dharmabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayādigrahaṇe dehādivailakṣaṇyagrahaṇe cātmana upayujyata ityetāvatā siddham /
analyzed: sva prakāśasya ātmanaḥ dharma bhūtam jñānam viṣaya ādi grahaṇe deha ādi vailakṣaṇya grahaṇe ca ātmanaḥ upayujyate iti etāvatā siddham
evam ātmani pramāṇa parīkṣā vṛttā
atha nitya tvam vyavasthāvayitum vicāram upakramate atha asya iti
asya ātmanaḥ
pravartate iti śeṣaḥ
tatra iti

original: ātmanaḥ kālasaṃbandhe vicāraviṣaye kṣaṇamātrakālasaṃbandhinaṃ vināśinamātmānamāmananti kecana vādinaḥ (saugatāḥ) iti yāvat /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ kāla saṃbandhe vicāra viṣaye kṣaṇa mātra kāla saṃbandhinam vināśinam ātmānam āmananti kecana vādinaḥ saugatāḥ iti yāvat
kāla saṃbandhaḥ kṣaṇikatva lakṣaṇaḥ eva iti amīṣām āśayaḥ
sattvāt kṣaṇika tvam ātmanaḥ iti uktam
sattvasya kṣaṇika tva vyāpya tve siddhe śobhanam idam
tat eva kuta
iti atas sattvam kṣaṇikatva vyāpti arham pariṣkaroti yat na iti
arthakriyā kartṛ tvam eva sattvam
tat ca kṣaṇikatva vyāpyam iti āśayaḥ
sārvajñya vijñānam buddha jñānam
kṣaṇikatva vyāptim eva upapādayati na ca sā iti

original: taccākṣaṇike sthire 'ghaṭamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ kṣaṇike vyavaśtāpayatīti sattva kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamevetyāpatatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca akṣaṇike sthire ghaṭamānam kartṛ tvam kṣaṇike vyavaśtāpayati iti sattva kṣaṇikatva vyāpyam eva iti āpatati iti bhāvaḥ
krama yaugapadya anyatarasya kartṛ tva vyāpaka tvam tasya
sthire sambhavam ca upapādayitum praśnaḥ katham punar iti
uttaram śrūyatām ityādinā
artha kriyāsu bhāvānām kartṛ tvasya dvayī gatiḥ
krameṇa yugapad vā iti na vidhā antara saṃbhavaḥ
bhāva abhāva vat anayoḥ anyatara nivṛttau anyatara vyavasthānāt arthakriyā janane bhāvānām na tṛtīya prakāra saṃbhavaḥ iti kramākrama pratibaddhā eva arthakriyā
na ca akṣa
ṇike krama yaugapadye saṃbhavataḥ
etāvān eva ātmasiddhi granthā bhāgaḥ upalabhyate
iti śrīmat viśiṣṭa advaita siddhānta pravartana dhurandhara parama ācārya
artha iti kiñcid artha kriyā karaṇam krameṇa
kiñcid ca a krameṇa yugapad
yaugapadya asaṃbhave kramaḥ

original: tadabhāve ca yaugapadyaṃ niyatamiti kramayaugapadyānyataravyāpyaivārthakriyā bhavatītyarthaḥ //44/
analyzed: tad abhāve ca yaugapadyam niyatam iti krama yaugapadya anyatara vyāpyā eva arthakriyā bhavati iti arthaḥ
bhavatu evam
athā api sthire katham na sā
tatra āha na ca iti
grantha bhāgaḥ grimaḥ kvāpi na itas samupalabhyate
vyākhyānam vihitam yāvat upalabdhasya sārataḥ
iti śrī nāgapurī tirunāṅgūra
divya deśa abhijanena prativādi bhayaṅkara ācārya anvaya bhūṣaṇa vidvas varya śrī kṛṣṇam ācārya ākhya ācārya varya putra ratnena

catur tantrī pārāvāra pārīṇa diganta viśrānta kīrti dayāmūrti śrīmat bhāṣyakāra divya vaṃśa avatīrṇa śrī bhūtapurī nivāsa rasika vidvat sārvabhauma hārīta śrīmadā sūri rāmānuja ācārya deśika indra caraṇa kamala varivasyā samadhigata pada vākya pramāṇa tantrahṛdayena
śrī vaiṣṇava dāsena prabhaaṇṇaṅgara ācāryeṇa nyāya vyākaraṇa śiromaṇinā ubhaya vedānta viduṣā
praṇītam ātmasiddheḥ vyākhyānam siddhāñjanam jayatāt ciram
